# <a name="chapter-4---description-of-azure-rtos-netx-duo-services"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-103">4장 - Azure RTOS NetX Duo 서비스 설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-103">Chapter 4 - Description of Azure RTOS NetX Duo Services</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-104">이 장에서는 모든 Azure RTOS NetX Duo 서비스를 알파벳 순서로 설명합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-104">This chapter contains a description of all Azure RTOS NetX Duo services in alphabetic order.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-105">서비스 이름은 모든 유사한 서비스가 함께 그룹화되도록 설계되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-105">Service names are designed so all similar services are grouped together.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-106">예를 들어 모든 ARP 서비스는 이 장의 시작 부분에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-106">For example, all ARP services are found at the beginning of this chapter.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-107">NetX Duo에는 IPv6 기반 프로토콜 및 작업을 지원하기 위해 도입된 여러 가지 새로운 서비스가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-107">There are numerous new services in NetX Duo introduced to support IPv6-based protocols and operations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-108">Net Duo의 IPv6 지원 서비스에는 접두사 ***nxd***가 있습니다. \*는 IPv4 및 IPv6 이중 스택 작업을 위해 설계되었음을 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-108">IPv6-enabled services in Net Duo have the prefix \***nxd**,\* indicating that they are designed for IPv4 and IPv6 dual stack operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-109">NetX의 기존 서비스는 NetX Duo에서 완벽하게 지원됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-109">Existing services in NetX are fully supported in NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-110">NetX 애플리케이션은 최소한의 이식 노력으로 NetX Duo로 마이그레이션할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-110">NetX applications can be migrated to NetX Duo with minimal porting effort.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-111">BSD 호환 소켓 API는 고성능 NetX Duo API를 충분히 활용할 수 없는 레거시 애플리케이션 코드에 사용할 수 있습니다. BSD 호환 소켓 API에 대한 자세한 내용은 부록 D를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-111">*Note that a BSD-Compatible Socket API is available for legacy application code that cannot take full advantage of the high-performance NetX Duo API. Refer to Appendix D for more information on the BSD-Compatible Socket API*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-112">각 설명의 “반환 값” 섹션에서 **BOLD** 로 표시된 값은 API 오류 검사를 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 데 사용되는 NX_DISABLE_ERROR_CHECKING 옵션의 영향을 받지 않지만, 굵게 표시되지 않은 값은 완전히 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-112">In the "Return Values" section of each description, values in **BOLD** are not affected by the NX_DISABLE_ERROR_CHECKING option used to disable the API error checking, while values in non-bold are completely disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-113">“허용되는 원본” 섹션은 각 NetX Duo 서비스를 호출할 수 있는 항목을 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-113">The "Allowed From" sections indicate from which each NetX Duo service can be called.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-115">ARP 캐시의 모든 동적 항목 무효화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-115">Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-116">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-116">Prototype</span></span>     

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-117">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-117">Description</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-118">이 서비스는 현재 ARP 캐시에 있는 모든 동적 ARP 항목을 무효화합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-118">This service invalidates all dynamic ARP entries currently in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-119">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-120">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-121">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-122">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) ARP 캐시 무효화에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-122">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP cache invalidate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) ARP가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 호출자가 스레드가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-126">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-126">Allowed From</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-127">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-127">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-128">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-128">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-129">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-129">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-130">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-130">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the dynamic ARP entries were
   successfully invalidated. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-148">동적 ARP 항목 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-148">Set dynamic ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-149">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-149">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);  
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-150">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-150">Description</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-151">이 서비스는 ARP 캐시의 동적 항목을 할당하고 지정된 IP를 실제 주소 매핑으로 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-151">This service allocates a dynamic entry from the ARP cache and sets up the specified IP to physical address mapping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-152">실제 주소를 0으로 지정하면 실제 주소를 확인하기 위해 실제 ARP 요청이 네트워크로 전송됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-152">If a zero physical address is specified, an actual ARP request is sent to the network in order to have the physical address resolved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-153">ARP 에이징이 활성이거나 ARP 캐시가 고갈되었고 최근에 사용된 ARP 항목이 아닌 경우에도 이 항목이 제거됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-153">Also note that this entry will be removed if ARP aging is active or if the ARP cache is exhausted and this is the least recently used ARP entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-154">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-154">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-155">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-155">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-156">**ip_address** 매핑할 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-156">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-157">**physical_msw** 실제 주소의 상위 16비트(47-32)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-157">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-158">**physical_lsw** 실제 주소의 하위 32비트(31-0)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-158">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-159">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-159">Return Values</span></span>    

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-160">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) ARP 동적 항목 설정에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-160">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP dynamic entry set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**(0x17) ARP 캐시에 사용할 수 있는 ARP 항목이 더 이상 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IP 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 인스턴스 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-166">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-166">Allowed From</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-167">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-167">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-168">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-168">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-169">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-169">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-170">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-170">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a dynamic ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                  0x1022, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a dynamic mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   10:22:00:00:12:34. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-187">nx_arp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-187">nx_arp_enable</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-188">ARP(주소 확인 프로토콜)를 사용하도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-188">Enable Address Resolution Protocol (ARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-189">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-189">Prototype</span></span>    

```c
UINT nx_arp_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    VOID *arp_cache_memory,
    ULONG arp_cache_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-190">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-190">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-191">이 서비스는 특정 IP 인스턴스에 대해 NetX Duo의 ARP 구성 요소를 초기화합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-191">This service initializes the ARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-192">ARP 초기화에는 ARP 메시지를 보내고 받는 데 필요한 ARP 캐시 및 다양한 ARP 처리 루틴 설정이 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-192">ARP initialization includes setting up the ARP cache and various ARP processing routines necessary for sending and receiving ARP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-193">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-193">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-194">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-194">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-195">**arp_cache_memory** ARP 캐시를 지정할 메모리 영역에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-195">**arp_cache_memory** Pointer to memory area to place ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-196">**arp_cache_size** 각 ARP 항목은 52바이트이므로 총 ARP 항목 수는 52로 나뉘는 크기입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-196">**arp_cache_size** Each ARP entry is 52 bytes, the total number of ARP entries is, therefore, the size divided by 52.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-197">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-197">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-198">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) ARP를 사용하도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-198">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 또는 캐시 메모리 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR**(0x09) 사용자 제공 ARP 캐시 메모리가 너무 작습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) User supplied ARP cache memory is too small.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**(0x15) 이 구성 요소는 이미 사용하도록 설정되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-203">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-203">Allowed From</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-204">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-204">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-205">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-205">Preemption Possible</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-206">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-206">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-207">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-207">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ARP and supply 1024 bytes of ARP cache memory for
   previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_enable(&ip_0, (void *) pointer, 1024);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP was successfully enabled for this IP
instance.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-225">ARP 항목 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-225">Delete an ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-226">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-227">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-228">이 서비스는 IP 내부 ARP 테이블에서 지정된 IP 주소에 대한 ARP 항목을 제거합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-228">This service removes an ARP entry for the given IP address from its IP internal ARP table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-229">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-229">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-230">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-230">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-231">**ip_address** 지정된 IP 주소를 가진 ARP 항목을 삭제해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-231">**ip_address** ARP entry with the specified IP address should be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-232">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-232">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-233">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) ARP를 사용하도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-233">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**(0x16) 지정된 IP 주소를 가진 항목을 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) No entry with the specified IP address can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 또는 캐시 메모리 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 지정된 IP 주소가 유효하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Specified IP address is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-238">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-238">Allowed From</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-239">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-239">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-240">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-240">Preemption Possible</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-241">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-242">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete the ARP entry with the IP address 1.2.3.4. */
status = nx_arp_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4));

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP entry with the specified IP address
   is deleted.*/
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-251">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-251">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-252">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-252">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-253">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-253">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-254">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-254">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-255">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-255">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-256">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-256">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-257">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-257">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-258">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-258">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_gratuitous_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-260">무상 ARP 요청 송신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-260">Send gratuitous ARP request</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-261">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-261">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_gratuitous_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*response_handler)(NX_IP *ip_ptr, NX_PACKET *packet_ptr));
```                               
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-262">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-263">이 서비스는 인터페이스 IP 주소가 유효한 동안 모든 실제 인터페이스를 통해 무상 ARP 요청을 전송합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-263">This service goes through all the physical interfaces to transmit gratuitous ARP requests as long as the interface IP address is valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-264">이어서 ARP 응답을 받으면 제공된 응답 처리기가 호출되어 무상 ARP에 대한 응답을 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-264">If an ARP response is subsequently received, the supplied response handler is called to process the response to the gratuitous ARP.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-265">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-266">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-266">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-267">**response_handler** 응답 처리 함수에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-267">**response_handler** Pointer to response handling function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-268">NX_NULL이 제공되면 응답은 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-268">If NX_NULL is supplied, responses are ignored.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-269">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-270">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 무상 ARP 송신에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gratuitous ARP send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-271">**NX_NO_PACKET**(0x01) 사용 가능한 패킷이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) ARP가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 현재 IP 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Current IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 호출자가 스레드가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-276">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-276">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-277">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-277">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-278">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-278">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-279">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-279">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-280">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-280">Example</span></span>

```
/* Send gratuitous ARP without any response handler. */
status = nx_arp_gratuitous_send(&ip_0, NX_NULL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the gratuitous ARP was successfully
   sent. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_hardware_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-298">제공된 IP 주소에 해당하는 실제 하드웨어 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-298">Locate physical hardware address given an IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-299">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-299">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_hardware_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-300">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-300">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-301">이 서비스는 제공된 IP 주소와 연결된 ARP 캐시에서 실제 하드웨어 주소를 찾으려고 시도합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-301">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied IP address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-302">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-302">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-303">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-303">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-304">**ip_address** 검색할 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-304">**ip_address** IP address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-305">**physical_msw** 물리적 주소의 상위 16비트(47-32)를 반환하는 변수를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-305">**physical_msw** Pointer to the variable for returning the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-306">**physical_lsw** 실제 주소의 하위 32비트(31-0)를 반환하는 변수에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-306">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the variable for returning the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-307">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-307">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-308">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) ARP 하드웨어 주소 찾기에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-308">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP hardware address find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-309">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**(0x16) ARP 캐시에 매핑이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-309">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IP 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 또는 메모리 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-314">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-314">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-315">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-315">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-316">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-316">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-317">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-317">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-318">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-318">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the hardware address associated with the IP address of
   1.2.3.4 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_hardware_address_find(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                      &physical_msw,
                                      &physical_lsw);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables physical_msw and
   physical_lsw contain the hardware address.*/
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-329">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-329">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-330">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-330">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-331">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-331">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-332">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-332">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-333">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-333">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-334">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-334">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-335">nx_arp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-335">nx_arp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-336">ARP 활동에 대한 정보 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-336">Retrieve information about ARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-337">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-337">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *arp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *arp_requests_received,
    ULONG *arp_responses_sent,
    ULONG *arp_responses_received,
    ULONG *arp_dynamic_entries,
    ULONG *arp_static_entries,
    ULONG *arp_aged_entries,
    ULONG *arp_invalid_messages);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-338">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-338">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-339">이 서비스는 연결된 IP 인스턴스의 ARP 활동에 대한 정보를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-339">This service retrieves information about ARP activities for the associated IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-340">대상 포인터가 NX_NULL이면 해당 특정 정보가 호출자에게 반환되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-340">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-341">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-341">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-342">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-342">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-343">**arp_requests_sent** 이 IP 인스턴스에서 보낸 총 ARP 요청 대상에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-343">**arp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-344">**arp_requests_received** 네트워크에서 받은 총 ARP 요청 대상에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-344">**arp_requests_received** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-345">**arp_responses_sent** 이 IP 인스턴스에서 보낸 총 ARP 응답 대상에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-345">**arp_responses_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP responses sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-346">**arp_responses_received** 네트워크에서 수신된 총 ARP 응답 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-346">**arp_responses_received** Pointer to the destination for the total ARP responses received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** 현재 동적 ARP 항목 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of dynamic ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-348">**arp_static_entries** 현재 고정 ARP 항목 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-348">**arp_static_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of static ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-349">**arp_aged_entries** 오래되고 잘못된 총 ARP 항목 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-349">**arp_aged_entries** Pointer to the destination of the total number of ARP entries that have aged and became invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-350">**arp_invalid_messages** 수신되었으나 유효하지 않은 총 ARP 메시지 대상에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-350">**arp_invalid_messages** Pointer to the destination of the total invalid ARP messages received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-351">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-351">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-352">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) ARP 정보 검색에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-356">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-357">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-357">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-358">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-358">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-359">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-359">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-360">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-360">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Pickup ARP information for ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_info_get(&ip_0, &arp_requests_sent,
                         &arp_requests_received,
                         &arp_responses_sent,
                         &arp_responses_received,
                         &arp_dynamic_entries,
                         &arp_static_entries,
                         &arp_aged_entries,
                         &arp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the ARP information has been stored in
   the supplied variables. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-378">제공된 물리적 주소에 해당하는 IP 주소 찾기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-378">Locate IP address given a physical address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-379">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-379">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw, 
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-380">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-380">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-381">이 서비스는 제공된 물리적 주소와 연결된 ARP 캐시에서 IP 주소를 찾으려고 시도합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-381">This service attempts to find an IP address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-382">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-382">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-383">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-383">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-384">**ip_address** 매핑된 IP 주소가 있는 경우, 반환 IP 주소를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-384">**ip_address** Pointer to return IP address, if one is found that has been mapped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-385">**physical_msw** 검색할 물리적 주소의 상위 16비트(47-32)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-385">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-386">**physical_lsw** 검색할 물리적 주소의 하위 32비트(31-0)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-386">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-387">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-387">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-388">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) ARP IP 주소 찾기에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP IP address find</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-389">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**(0x16) ARP 캐시에 매핑이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-389">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 또는 메모리 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**(0x4D) Physical_msw 및 physical_lsw는 둘 다 0입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-394">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-394">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-395">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-395">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-396">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-396">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-397">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-397">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-398">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-398">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the IP address associated with the hardware address of
   0x0:0x01234 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address, 0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables ip_address contains the
   associated IP address. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entries_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-416">모든 정적 ARP 항목 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-416">Delete all static ARP entries</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-417">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-417">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entries_delete(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-418">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-418">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-419">이 서비스는 ARP 캐시의 모든 고정 항목을 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-419">This service deletes all static entries in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-420">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-420">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-421">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-421">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-422">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-422">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-423">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 고정 항목이 삭제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-423">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Static entries are deleted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 ip_ptr 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-427">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-427">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-428">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-428">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-429">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-429">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-430">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-431">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-431">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete all the static ARP entries for IP Instance 0, assuming
   "ip_0" is the NX_IP structure for IP Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entries_delete(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS all static ARP entries in the ARP cache
   have been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-449">ARP 캐시에 고정 IP-하드웨어 매핑 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-449">Create static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-450">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-450">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-451">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-451">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-452">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스의 ARP 캐시에 고정 IP-물리적 주소 매핑을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-452">This service creates a static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-453">고정 ARP 항목에는 ARP 정기 업데이트가 적용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-453">Static ARP entries are not subject to ARP periodic updates.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-454">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-454">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-455">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-455">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-456">**ip_address** 매핑할 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-456">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-457">**physical_msw** 매핑할 물리적 주소의 상위 16비트(47-32)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-457">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-458">**physical_lsw** 매핑할 물리적 주소의 하위 32비트(31-0)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-458">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to map.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-459">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-459">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ARP 고정 항목 만들기에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**(0x17) ARP 캐시에 사용할 수 있는 ARP 항목이 더 이상 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IP 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**(0x4D) Physical_msw 및 physical_lsw는 둘 다 0입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-467">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-467">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-468">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-468">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-469">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-469">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-470">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-470">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-471">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-471">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_create(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a static mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   0x00:0x1234. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span> 
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-489">ARP 캐시에서 고정 IP-하드웨어 매핑 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-489">Delete static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-490">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-490">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-491">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-492">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스의 ARP 캐시에서 이전에 만든 고정 IP-물리적 주소 매핑을 찾아서 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-492">This service finds and deletes a previously created static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-493">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-493">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-494">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-494">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-495">**ip_address** 정적으로 매핑된 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-495">**ip_address** IP address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-496">**physical_msw** 정적으로 매핑된 물리적 주소의 상위 16비트(47-\*\*32)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-496">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47 - \*\*32) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-497">**physical_lsw** 정적으로 매핑된 물리적 주소의 하위 32비트(31-\*\*0)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-497">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31 - \*\*0) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-498">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-498">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-499">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) ARP 고정 항목 삭제에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-499">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-500">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**(0x16) ARP 캐시에서 고정 ARP 항목을 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-500">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Static ARP entry was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IP 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**(0x4D) Physical_msw 및 physical_lsw는 둘 다 0입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-506">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-506">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-507">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-507">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-508">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-508">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-509">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-509">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-510">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-510">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created static ARP entry
   was successfully deleted. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-520">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-520">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-521">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-521">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-522">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-522">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-523">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-523">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-524">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-524">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-525">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-525">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>

## <a name="nx_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-527">nx_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-527">nx_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-528">ICMP(Internet Control Message Protocol) 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-528">Enable Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-529">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-529">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-530">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-530">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-531">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스의 ICMP 구성 요소를 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-531">This service enables the ICMP component for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-532">ICMP 구성 요소는 인터넷 오류 메시지와 ping 요청 및 회신을 처리해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-532">The ICMP component is responsible for handling Internet error messages and ping requests and replies.</span></span> 

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-533">이 서비스는 IPv4용 ICMP 서비스만 사용하도록 설정합니다. ICMPv4와 ICMPv6를 모두 사용하도록 설정하려면 애플리케이션에서 **nxd_icmp_enable** 서비스를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-533">*This service only enables ICMP for IPv4 service. To enable both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6, applications shall use the **nxd_icmp_enable** service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-534">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-534">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-535">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-535">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-536">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-537">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) ICMP를 사용하도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**(0x15) ICMP는 이미 사용하도록 설정되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) ICMP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-541">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-541">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-542">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-542">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-543">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-543">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-544">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-544">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-545">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-545">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ICMP on the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP is enabled. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-546">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-546">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="nx_icmp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-554">ICMP 활동에 대한 정보 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-554">Retrieve information about ICMP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-555">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-555">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *pings_sent,
    ULONG *ping_timeouts,
    ULONG *ping_threads_suspended,
    ULONG *ping_responses_received,
    ULONG *icmp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *icmp_unhandled_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-556">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-556">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-557">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스의 ICMP 활동에 대한 정보를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-557">This service retrieves information about ICMP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-558">대상 포인터가 NX_NULL이면 해당 특정 정보가 호출자에게 반환되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-558">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-559">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-559">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-560">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-560">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-561">**pings_sent** 송신된 총 ping 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-561">**pings_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of pings sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-562">**ping_timeouts** 총 ping 시간 제한 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-562">**ping_timeouts** Pointer to destination for the total number of ping timeouts.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-563">**ping_threads_suspended** ping 요청에서 일시 중단된 총 스레드 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-563">**ping_threads_suspended** Pointer to destination of the total number of threads suspended on ping requests.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-564">**ping_responses_received** 수신된 총 ping 응답 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-564">**ping_responses_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of ping responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-565">**icmp_checksum_errors** 총 ICMP 체크섬 오류 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-565">**icmp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of ICMP checksum errors.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages** 처리되지 않은 총 ICMP 메시지 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of un-handled ICMP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-567">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-567">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-568">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) ICMP 정보 검색에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-568">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-569">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-569">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-572">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-573">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-573">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-574">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-574">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-575">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-575">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-576">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-576">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve ICMP information from previously created IP
   instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_info_get(&ip_0, &pings_sent, &ping_timeouts,
                          &ping_threads_suspended,
                          &ping_responses_received,
                          &icmp_checksum_errors,
                          &icmp_unhandled_messages);
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_icmp_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-584">nx_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-584">nx_icmp_ping</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-585">지정된 IP 주소로 ping 요청 송신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-585">Send ping request to specified IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-586">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-586">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    CHAR *data, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-587">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-588">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 주소로 ping 요청을 송신하고 지정된 시간 동안 ping 응답 메시지를 기다립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-588">This service sends a ping request to the specified IP address and waits for the specified amount of time for a ping response message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-589">응답이 수신되지 않는 경우 오류가 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-589">If no response is received, an error is returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-590">응답이 수신되는 경우 response_ptr이 가리키는 변수에 전체 응답 메시지가 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-590">Otherwise, the entire response message is returned in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-591">IPv6 대상에 ping 요청을 보내기 위해 애플리케이션은 ***nxd_icmp_ping** _ 또는 _ _nxd_icmp_source_ping_* 서비스를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-591">To send a ping request to an IPv6 destination, applications shall use the ***nxd_icmp_ping** _ or _ *_nxd_icmp_source_ping_** service.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-592">NX_SUCCESS가 반환되는 경우 애플리케이션은 수신된 패킷이 더 이상 필요하지 않으면 이 패킷을 해제해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-592">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-593">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-594">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-594">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-595">**ip_address** ping할 IP 주소입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-595">**ip_address** IP address, in host byte order, to ping.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-596">**data** ping 메시지의 데이터 영역에 대한 데이터 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-596">**data** Pointer to data area for ping message.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-597">**data_size** ping 데이터의 바이트 수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-597">**data_size** Number of bytes in the ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-598">**response_ptr** ping 응답 메시지를 반환하는 패킷 포인터를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-598">**response_ptr** Pointer to packet pointer to return the ping response message in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-599">**wait_option** ping 응답을 대기할 ThreadX 타이머 틱 수를 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-599">**wait_option** Defines the number of ThreadX timer ticks to wait for a ping response.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-600">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-600">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="5f002-601">대기 옵션</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-601">Wait Option</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="5f002-602">값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-602">Value</span></span>                           |
| -----------------------|---------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="5f002-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span></span>             | <span data-ttu-id="5f002-604">(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-604">(0x00000000)</span></span>                    |
| <span data-ttu-id="5f002-605">시간 제한 값(틱)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-605">timeout value in ticks</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="5f002-606">(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-606">(0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="5f002-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="5f002-608">0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-608">0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>                      |

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-609">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-609">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-610">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) ping에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-610">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-611">response_ptr이 가리키는 변수에 응답 메시지 포인터가 배치되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-611">Response message pointer was placed in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-612">**NX_NO_PACKET**(0x01) ping 요청 패킷을 할당할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-612">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Unable to allocate a ping request packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-613">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 지정된 데이터 영역은 이 IP 인스턴스의 기본 패킷 크기를 초과합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-613">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Specified data area exceeds the default packet size for this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-614">**NX_NO_RESPONSE**(0x29) 요청된 IP에서 응답하지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-614">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Requested IP did not respond.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-615">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort 호출에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-615">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IP 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP 또는 응답 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-620">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-620">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-621">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-621">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-622">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-622">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-623">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-623">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-624">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-624">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Issue a ping to IP address 1.2.3.5 from the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_ping(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5), "abcd", 4,
                      &response_ptr, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, a ping response was received from IP
   address 1.2.3.5 and the response packet is contained in the
   packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same "abcd"
   four bytes of data. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-632">nx_igmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-632">nx_igmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-633">IGMP(Internet Group Management Protocol) 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-633">Enable Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-634">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-634">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-635">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-635">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-636">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스에서 IGMP 구성 요소를 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-636">This service enables the IGMP component on the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-637">IGMP 구성 요소는 IP 멀티캐스트 그룹 관리 작업에 대한 지원을 제공해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-637">The IGMP component is responsible for providing support for IP multicast group management operations.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-638">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-638">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-639">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-639">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-640">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-640">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-641">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IGMP를 사용하도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-642">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-642">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-643">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-643">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-644">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**(0x15) 이 구성 요소는 이미 사용하도록 설정되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-644">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-645">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-645">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-646">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-646">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-647">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-647">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-648">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-648">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-649">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-649">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IGMP on the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_igmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IGMP is enabled. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-654">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-654">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
