## <a name="nx_igmp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-662">nx_igmp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-662">nx_igmp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-663">ARP 활동에 대한 정보 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-663">Retrieve information about IGMP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-664">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-664">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *igmp_reports_sent,
    ULONG *igmp_queries_received,
    ULONG *igmp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *current_groups_joined);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-665">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-665">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-666">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스의 IGMP 활동에 대한 정보를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-666">This service retrieves information about IGMP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-667">대상 포인터가 NX_NULL이면 해당 특정 정보가 호출자에게 반환되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-667">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-668">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-668">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-669">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-669">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-670">**igmp_reports_sent** 송신된 총 ICMP 보고서 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-670">**igmp_reports_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of ICMP reports sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-671">**igmp_queries_received** 멀티캐스트 라우터에 수신된 총 쿼리 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-671">**igmp_queries_received** Pointer to destination for the total number of queries received by multicast router.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-672">**igmp_checksum_errors** 수신 패킷의 총 IGMP 체크섬 오류 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-672">**igmp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of IGMP checksum errors on receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-673">**current_groups_joined** 이 IP 인스턴스를 통해 조인된 현재 그룹 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-673">**current_groups_joined** Pointer to destination of the current number of groups joined through this IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-674">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-674">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-675">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IGMP 정보 검색에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-675">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-676">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-676">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-677">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-677">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-678">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-678">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-679">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-679">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-680">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-680">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-681">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-681">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-682">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-682">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-683">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-683">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve IGMP information from previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_igmp_info_get(&ip_0, &igmp_reports_sent,
                          &igmp_queries_received,
                          &igmp_checksum_errors,
                          &current_groups_joined);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IGMP information was retrieved. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-690">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-690">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-693">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-693">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-694">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-694">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-695">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-695">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>

## <a name="nx_igmp_loopback_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-696">nx_igmp_loopback_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-696">nx_igmp_loopback_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-697">IGMP 루프백 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-697">Disable IGMP loopback</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-698">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-698">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_loopback_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-699">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-699">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-700">이 서비스는 조인된 모든 후속 멀티캐스트 그룹에 대해 IGMP 루프백을 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-700">This service disables IGMP loopback for all subsequent multicast groups joined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-701">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-701">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-702">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-702">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-703">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-703">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-704">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IGMP 루프백을 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-704">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP loopback disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-705">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) IGMP가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-705">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-706">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-706">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-707">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 호출자가 스레드나 초기화가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-707">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-708">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-708">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-709">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-709">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-710">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-710">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-711">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-711">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-712">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-712">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable IGMP loopback for all subsequent multicast groups
   joined. */
status = nx_igmp_loopback_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS IGMP loopback is disabled. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_loopback_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-725">nx_igmp_loopback_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-725">nx_igmp_loopback_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-726">IGMP 루프백 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-726">Enable IGMP loopback</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-727">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-727">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_loopback_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-728">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-728">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-729">이 서비스는 조인된 모든 후속 멀티캐스트 그룹에 대해 IGMP 루프백을 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-729">This service enables IGMP loopback for all subsequent multicast groups joined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-730">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-730">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-731">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-731">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-732">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-732">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-733">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IGMP 루프백을 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-733">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP loopback disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-734">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) IGMP가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-734">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-735">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-735">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-736">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 호출자가 스레드나 초기화가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-736">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-737">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-737">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-738">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-738">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-739">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-739">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-740">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-740">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-741">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-741">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IGMP loopback for all subsequent multicast
   groups joined. */
status = nx_igmp_loopback_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS IGMP loopback is enabled. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-751">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-751">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-752">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-752">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-753">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-753">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-754">인터페이스를 통해 IP 인스턴스를 지정된 멀티캐스트 그룹에 조인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-754">Join IP instance to specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-755">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-755">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-756">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-756">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-757">이 서비스는 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스를 통해 IP 인스턴스를 지정된 멀티캐스트 그룹에 조인합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-757">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-758">동일한 그룹이 조인된 횟수를 추적하도록 내부 카운터가 유지 관리됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-758">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-759">멀티캐스트 그룹에 조인한 후에는 IGMP 구성 요소가 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스를 통해 이 그룹 주소를 사용하는 IP 패킷의 수신을 허용하며 이 IP가 이 멀티캐스트 그룹의 멤버임을 라우터에 보고합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-759">After joining the multicast group, the IGMP component will allow reception of IP packets with this group address via the specified network interface and also report to routers that this IP is a member of this multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-760">IGMP 멤버 자격 조인, 보고, 탈퇴 메시지도 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스를 통해 송신됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-760">The IGMP membership join, report, and leave messages are also sent via the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-761">IGMP 그룹 멤버 자격 보고를 송신하지 않고 IPv4 멀티캐스트 그룹에 조인하려면 애플리케이션에서 서비스 ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join*** 을 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-761">To join an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-762">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-762">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-763">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-763">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-764">**group_address** 조인할 클래스 D IP 멀티캐스트 그룹 주소입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-764">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-765">**interface_index** NetX Duo 인스턴스에 연결된 인터페이스 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-765">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-766">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-766">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-767">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 멀티캐스트 그룹 조인에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-767">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-768">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**(0x17) 멀티캐스트 그룹을 더 이상 조인할 수 없습니다. 최대값이 초과되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-768">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-769">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-769">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-770">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 디바이스 인덱스가 잘못된 네트워크 인터페이스를 가리킵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-770">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-771">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 제공된 멀티캐스트 그룹 주소가 잘못된 클래스 D 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-771">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-772">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-772">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-773">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) IP 멀티캐스트 지원이 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-773">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP multicast support is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-774">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-774">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-775">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-775">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-776">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-776">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-777">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-777">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-778">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-778">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance joins the multicast group
   244.0.0.200, via the interface at index 1 in the IP interface
   list. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join
                                 (&ip IP_ADDRESS(244,0,0,200),
                                  INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully joined
   the multicast group. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-790">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-790">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-791">인터페이스를 통해 지정된 멀티캐스트 그룹 탈퇴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-791">Leave specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-792">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-792">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-793">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-793">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-794">이 서비스는 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스를 통해 지정된 멀티캐스트 그룹에서 탈퇴합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-794">This service leaves the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-795">동일한 그룹이 멤버로 포함된 횟수를 추적하도록 내부 카운터가 유지 관리됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-795">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been a member of.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-796">멀티캐스트 그룹에서 탈퇴한 후에는 IGMP 구성 요소가 적절한 멤버 자격 보고를 보내고, 이 노드의 멤버가 없는 경우 그룹에서 탈퇴할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-796">After leaving the multicast group, the IGMP component will send out proper membership report, and may leave the group if there are no members from this node.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-797">IGMP 그룹 멤버 자격 보고를 송신하지 않고 IPv4 멀티캐스트 그룹에서 탈퇴하려면 애플리케이션에서 서비스 ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave*** 를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-797">To leave an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-798">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-798">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-799">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-799">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-800">**group_address** 탈퇴할 클래스 D IP 멀티캐스트 그룹 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-800">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to leave.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-801">IP 주소는 호스트 바이트 순서로 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-801">The IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-802">**interface_index** NetX Duo 인스턴스에 연결된 인터페이스 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-802">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-803">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-803">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-804">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 멀티캐스트 그룹 조인에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-804">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-805">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**(0x16) 로컬 멀티캐스트 테이블에서 지정된 멀티캐스트 그룹 주소를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-805">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) The specified multicast group address cannot be found in the local multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-806">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-806">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-807">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 디바이스 인덱스가 잘못된 네트워크 인터페이스를 가리킵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-807">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-808">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 제공된 멀티캐스트 그룹 주소가 잘못된 클래스 D 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-808">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-809">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-809">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-810">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) IP 멀티캐스트 지원이 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-810">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP multicast support is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-811">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-811">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-812">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-812">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-813">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-813">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-814">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-814">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-815">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-815">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Leave the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave
                                (&ip IP_ADDRESS(244,0,0,200),
                                 INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully leaves
   the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-827">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-827">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-828">IP 인스턴스를 지정된 멀티캐스트 그룹에 조인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-828">Join IP instance to specified multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-829">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-829">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG group_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-830">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-830">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-831">이 서비스는 IP 인스턴스를 지정된 멀티캐스트 그룹에 조인합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-831">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-832">동일한 그룹이 조인된 횟수를 추적하도록 내부 카운터가 유지 관리됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-832">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-833">호스트가 그룹을 조인하려는 것을 나타내는, 네트워크에서 송신된 첫 번째 조인 요청인 경우 드라이버에서 IGMP 보고서 송신 명령이 실행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-833">The driver is commanded to send an IGMP report if this is the first join request out on the network indicating the host's intention to join the group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-834">조인 후에는 IGMP 구성 요소가 이 그룹 주소를 사용하는 IP 패킷을 수신할 수 있으며 이 IP는 해당 멀티캐스트 그룹의 멤버임을 라우터에 보고합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-834">After joining, the IGMP component will allow reception of IP packets with this group address and report to routers that this IP is a member of this multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-835">IGMP 그룹 멤버 자격 보고를 송신하지 않고 IPv4 멀티캐스트 그룹에 조인하려면 애플리케이션에서 서비스 ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join*** 을 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-835">To join an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-836">기본 디바이스가 아닌 디바이스에서 멀티캐스트 그룹을 조인하려면 **nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join** 서비스를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-836">*To join a multicast group on a non-primary device, use the service **nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-837">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-838">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-838">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-839">**group_address** 조인할 클래스 D IP 멀티캐스트 그룹 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-839">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-840">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-840">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-841">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 멀티캐스트 그룹 조인에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-841">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-842">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**(0x17) 멀티캐스트 그룹을 더 이상 조인할 수 없습니다. 최대값이 초과되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-842">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-843">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 디바이스 인덱스가 잘못된 네트워크 인터페이스를 가리킵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-843">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-844">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 잘못된 IP 그룹 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-844">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP group address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-845">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-845">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-846">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-846">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-847">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-847">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-848">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-849">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-849">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-850">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-850">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-851">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-851">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-852">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-852">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance ip_0 joins the multicast group
   224.0.0.200. */
status = nx_igmp_multicast_join(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, this IP instance has successfully
   joined the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-865">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-865">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-866">IP 인스턴스를 지정된 멀티캐스트 그룹에서 탈퇴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-866">Cause IP instance to leave specified multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-867">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-867">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG group_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-868">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-868">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-869">이 서비스를 사용하면 나가기 요청 수와 조인 요청 수가 일치하는 경우 IP 인스턴스가 지정된 멀티캐스트 그룹에서 나가도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-869">This service causes an IP instance to leave the specified multicast group, if the number of leave equests matches the number of join requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-870">일치하지 않으면 내부 조인 수만 감소합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-870">Otherwise, the internal join count is simply decremented.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-871">IGMP 그룹 멤버 자격 보고를 송신하지 않고 IPv4 멀티캐스트 그룹에서 탈퇴하려면 애플리케이션에서 서비스 ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave*** 를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-871">To leave an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-872">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-872">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-873">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-873">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-874">**group_address** 탈퇴할 멀티캐스트 그룹입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-874">**group_address** Multicast group to leave.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-875">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-875">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-876">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 멀티캐스트 그룹 조인에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-876">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-877">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**(0x16) 이전 조인 요청을 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-877">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Previous join request was not found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-878">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 디바이스 인덱스가 잘못된 네트워크 인터페이스를 가리킵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-878">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-879">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 잘못된 IP 그룹 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-879">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP group address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-880">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-880">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-881">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-881">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-882">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-882">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-883">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-883">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-884">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-884">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-885">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-885">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-886">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-886">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-887">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-887">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Cause IP instance to leave the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
status = nx_igmp_multicast_leave(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, this IP instance has successfully left
   the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_change_notifiy"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-900">nx_ip_address_change_notifiy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-900">nx_ip_address_change_notifiy</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-901">IP 주소가 변경되면 애플리케이션에 알림</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-901">Notify application if IP address changes</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-902">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-902">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_change_notify(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID(*change_notify)(NX_IP *, VOID *),
    VOID *additional_info);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-903">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-903">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-904">이 서비스는 IPv4 주소가 변경될 때마다 호출되는 애플리케이션 알림 함수를 등록합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-904">This service registers an application notification function that is called whenever the IPv4 address is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-905">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-905">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-906">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-906">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-907">**change_notify** IP 변경 알림 함수를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-907">**change_notify** Pointer to IP change notification function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-908">이 매개 변수가 NX_NULL이면 IP 주소 변경 알림이 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-908">If this parameter is NX_NULL, IP address change notification is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-909">**additional_info** IP 주소가 변경되면 알림 함수에도 제공되는 선택적 추가 정보를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-909">**additional_info** Pointer to optional additional information that is also supplied to the notification function when the IP address is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-910">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-910">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-911">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 주소 변경 알림에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-911">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address change notification.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-912">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-912">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-913">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-913">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-914">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-914">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-915">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-915">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-916">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-916">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-917">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-918">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-918">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Register the function "my_ip_changed" to be called whenever the
   IP address is changed. */
status = nx_ip_address_change_notify(&ip_0, my_ip_changed,
                                      NX_NULL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "my_ip_changed" function will be
   called whenever the IP address changes. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-943">nx_ip_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-943">nx_ip_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-944">IPv4 주소 및 네트워크 마스크 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-944">Retrieve IPv4 address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-945">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-945">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-946">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-946">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-947">이 서비스는 기본 네트워크 인터페이스의 IPv4 주소 및 해당 서브넷 마스크를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-947">This service retrieves IPv4 address and its subnet mask of the primary network interface.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]   
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-948">*보조 디바이스의 정보를 가져오려면 **nx_ip_interface_address_get*** 서비스를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-948">\*To obtain information of the secondary device, use the service \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_get\*\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-949">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-949">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-950">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-950">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-951">**ip_address** IP 주소 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-951">**ip_address** Pointer to destination for IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-952">**network_mask** 네트워크 마스크 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-952">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-953">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-953">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-954">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 주소 가져오기에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-954">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-955">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP 또는 반환 변수 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-955">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return variable pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-956">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-956">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-957">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-957">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-958">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-958">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-959">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-959">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-960">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-960">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-961">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-961">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the IP address and network mask from the previously created
   IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_address_get(&ip_0, &ip_address, &network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables ip_address and
   network_mask contain the IP and network mask respectively. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-986">nx_ip_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-986">nx_ip_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-987">IPv4 주소 및 네트워크 마스크 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-987">Set IPv4 address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-988">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-988">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-989">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-989">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-990">이 서비스는 기본 네트워크 인터페이스의 IPv4 주소 및 네트워크 마스크를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-990">This service sets IPv4 address and network mask for the primary network interface.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-991">*보조 디바이스의 IP 주소 및 네트워크 마스크를 설정하려면 **nx_ip_interface_address_set*** 서비스를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-991">\*To set IP address and network mask for the secondary device, use the service \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_set\*\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-992">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-992">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-993">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-993">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-994">**ip_address** 새 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-994">**ip_address** New IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-995">**network_mask** 새 네트워크 마스크입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-995">**network_mask** New network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-996">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-997">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 주소 설정에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IP 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-999">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-999">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1000">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1000">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1001">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1001">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1002">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1002">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1003">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1003">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1004">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1004">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1005">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1005">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the IP address and network mask to 1.2.3.4 and 0xFFFFFF00 for
   the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_address_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                           0xFFFFFF00UL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance now has an IP address of
   1.2.3.4 and a network mask of 0xFFFFFF00. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1030">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1030">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1031">보조 패킷 풀 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1031">Configure an auxiliary packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1032">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1032">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *aux_pool);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1033">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1033">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1034">이 서비스는 IP 인스턴스에서 보조 패킷 풀을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1034">This service configures an auxiliary packet pool in the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1035">메모리 제한 시스템의 경우 IP 스레드에서 더 작은 패킷을 전송할 수 있도록 하기 위해 사용자는 MTU의 패킷 크기로 기본 패킷 풀을 만들고, 더 작은 패킷 크비로 보조 패킷 풀을 만들어 메모리 효율성을 높일 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1035">For a memory-constrained system, the user may increase memory efficiency by creating the default packet pool with packet size of MTU, and creating an auxiliary packet pool with smaller packet size for the IP thread to transmit small packets with.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1036">보조 풀에 권장되는 패킷 크기는 256바이트이며, IPv6 및 IPsec을 모두 사용할 수 있다고 가정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1036">The recommended packet size for the auxiliary pool is 256 bytes, assuming IPv6 and IPsec are both enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1037">기본적으로 IP 인스턴스는 보조 패킷 풀을 허용하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1037">By default the IP instance does not accept the auxiliary packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1038">이 기능을 사용하도록 설정하려면 NetX Duo 라이브러리를 컴파일할 때 NX_DUAL_PACKET_POOL_ENABLE을 정의해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1038">To enable this feature, *NX_DUAL_PACKET_POOL_ENABLE* must be defined when compiling the NetX Duo library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1039">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1039">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1040">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1040">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1041">**aux_pool** IP 인스턴스에 대해 구성할 보조 패킷 풀입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1041">**aux_pool** The auxiliary packet pool to be configured for the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1042">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1042">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1043">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 주소 설정에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1043">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1044">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) 라이브러리에서 이중 패킷 풀 기능이 컴파일되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1044">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The dual packet pool feature is not compiled in the library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1045">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 포인터나 풀 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1045">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer or pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1046">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1046">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1047">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1047">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1048">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1048">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1049">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1049">Preemption Possible</span></span>  

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1050">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1050">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1051">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1051">Example</span></span>

```c
#define SMALL_PAYLOAD_SIZE 256
NX_PACKET small_pool;

nx_packet_pool_create(&small_pool, "small pool", SMALL_PAYLOAD_SIZE,
                       small_pool_memory_ptr, small_pool_size);

/* Add the small packet pool to the IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set(&ip_0, &small_pool);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance now is able to use the
   small pool for transmitting small datagram. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1058">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1058">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1059">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1059">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1060">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1060">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1064">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1064">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1065">nx_ip_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1065">nx_ip_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1066">IP 인스턴스 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1066">Create an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1067">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1067">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    CHAR *name, ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask, 
    NX_PACKET_POOL *default_pool,
    VOID (*ip_network_driver)(NX_IP_DRIVER *),
    VOID *memory_ptr, 
    ULONG memory_size,
    UINT priority);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1068">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1068">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1069">이 서비스는 사용자 제공 IP 주소 및 네트워크 드라이버를 사용하여 IP 인스턴스를 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1069">This service creates an IP instance with the user supplied IP address and network driver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1070">또한 애플리케이션은 내부 패킷 할당에 사용할 IP 인스턴스에 대해 이전에 만든 패킷 풀을 제공해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1070">In addition, the application must supply a previously created packet pool for the IP instance to use for internal packet allocation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1071">제공된 애플리케이션 네트워크 드라이버는 이 IP의 스레드가 실행될 때까지 호출되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1071">Note that the supplied application network driver is not called until this IP's thread executes.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1072">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1072">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1073">**ip_ptr** 새 IP 인스턴스를 만들 제어 블록을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1073">**ip_ptr** Pointer to control block to create a new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1074">**name** 새 IP 인스턴스의 이름입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1074">**name** Name of this new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1075">**ip_address** 새 IP 인스턴스의 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1075">**ip_address** IP address for this new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1076">**network_mask** 서브넷 및 슈퍼넷 지정에 사용할 IP 주소의 네트워크 부분을 나타내는 마스크입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1076">**network_mask** Mask to delineate the network portion of the IP address for sub-netting and super-netting uses.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1077">**default_pool** 이전에 만든 NetX Duo 패킷 풀의 제어 블록을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1077">**default_pool** Pointer to control block of previously created NetX Duo packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1078">**ip_network_driver** IP 패킷 송신 및 수신에 사용되는 사용자 제공 네트워크 드라이버입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1078">**ip_network_driver** User-supplied network driver used to send and receive IP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1079">**memory_ptr** IP 도우미 스레드 스택 영역의 메모리 영역을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1079">**memory_ptr** Pointer to memory area for the IP helper thread’s stack area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1080">**memory_size** IP 도우미 스레드 스택의 메모리 영역 바이트 수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1080">**memory_size** Number of bytes in the memory area for the IP helper thread’s stack.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1081">**priority** IP 도우미 스레드 우선 순위입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1081">**priority** Priority of IP helper thread.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1082">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1082">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1083">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 인스턴스 만들기에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1083">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP instance creation.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1084">**NX_NOT_IMPLEMENTED**(0x4A) NetX Duo 라이브러리가 잘못 구성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1084">**NX_NOT_IMPLEMENTED** (0x4A) NetX Duo library is configured incorrectly.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1085">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP, 네트워크 드라이버 함수 포인터, 패킷 풀 또는 메모리 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1085">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP, network driver function pointer, packet pool, or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1086">**NX_SIZE_ERROR**(0x09) 제공된 스택 크기가 너무 작습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1086">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) The supplied stack size is too small.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1087">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1087">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1088">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 제공된 IP 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1088">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) The supplied IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1089">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**(0x21) 제공된 IP 스레드 우선 순위가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1089">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x21) The supplied IP thread priority is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1090">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1090">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1091">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1091">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1092">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1092">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1093">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1093">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1094">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1094">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create an IP instance with an IP address of 1.2.3.4 and a network
   mask of 0xFFFFFF00UL. The "ethernet_driver" specifies the entry
   point of the application specific network driver and the
   "stack_memory_ptr" specifies the start of a 1024 byte memory
   area that is used for this IP instance’s helper thread. */
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance ip_0",
                      IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4),
                      0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0, ethernet_driver,
                      stack_memory_ptr, 1024, 1);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has been created. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1119">nx_ip_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1119">nx_ip_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1120">이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1120">Delete previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1121">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1121">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_delete(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1122">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1122">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1123">이 서비스는 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스를 삭제하고 IP 인스턴스가 소유하는 모든 시스템 리소스를 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1123">This service deletes a previously created IP instance and releases all of the system resources owned by the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1124">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1124">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1125">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1125">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1126">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1126">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1127">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 삭제에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1127">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP deletion.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1128">**NX_SOCKETS_BOUND**(0x28) 이 IP 인스턴스는 여전히 UDP 또는 TCP 소켓과 바인딩되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1128">**NX_SOCKETS_BOUND** (0x28) This IP instance still has UDP or TCP sockets bound to it.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1129">IP 인스턴스를 삭제하려면 먼저 모든 소켓을 바인딩 해제하고 삭제해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1129">All sockets must be unbound and deleted prior to deleting the IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1130">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1130">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1131">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1131">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1132">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1132">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1133">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1133">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1134">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1134">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1135">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1135">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1136">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1136">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_delete(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_driver_direct_command"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1161">nx_ip_driver_direct_command</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1161">nx_ip_driver_direct_command</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1162">네트워크 드라이버에 대해 명령 실행</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1162">Issue command to network driver</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1163">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1163">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_driver_direct_command
    (NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT command,
    ULONG *return_value_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1164">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1164">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1165">이 서비스는 ***nx_ip_create*** 호출 중 지정된 애플리케이션의 기본 네트워크 인터페이스 드라이버에 대해 직접 인터페이스를 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1165">This service provides a direct interface to the application's primary network interface driver specified during the ***nx_ip_create*** call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1166">애플리케이션별 명령을 사용하면 NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND 이상의 숫자 값을 제공할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1166">Application-specific commands can be used providing their numeric value is greater than or equal to NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1167">보조 디바이스에 대해 명령을 실행하려면 **nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command** 서비스를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1167">*To issue command for the secondary device, use the **nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command** service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1168">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1168">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1169">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1169">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1170">**command** 숫자 명령 코드입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1170">**command** Numeric command code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1171">표준 명령은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1171">Standard commands are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1172">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS(10)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1172">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1173">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED(11)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1173">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1174">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE(12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1174">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1175">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT(13)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1175">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1176">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT(14)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1176">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1177">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT(15)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1177">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1178">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS(16)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1178">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1179">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND(50)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1179">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1180">**return_value_ptr** 호출자의 반환 변수를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1180">**return_value_ptr** Pointer to return variable in the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1181">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1181">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1182">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 네트워크 드라이버 직접 명령이 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1182">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful network driver direct command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1183">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND**(0x44) 처리되지 않거나 구현되지 않은 네트워크 드라이버 명령입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1183">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) Unhandled or unimplemented network driver command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1184">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP 또는 반환 값 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1184">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return value pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1185">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1185">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1186">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 잘못된 인터페이스 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1186">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1187">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1187">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1188">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1188">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1189">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1189">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1190">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1190">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1191">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1191">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Make a direct call to the application-specific network driver
   for the previously created IP instance. For this example, the
   network driver is interrogated for the link status. */
status = nx_ip_driver_direct_command(&ip_0, NX_LINK_GET_STATUS,
                                     &link_status);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link_status variable contains a
   NX_TRUE or NX_FALSE value representing the status of the
   physical link. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1216">nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1216">nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1217">네트워크 드라이버에 대해 명령 실행</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1217">Issue command to network driver</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1218">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1218">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT command,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *return_value_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1219">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1219">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1220">이 서비스는 IP 인스턴스의 애플리케이션 네트워크 디바이스 드라이버에 대해 직접 명령을 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1220">This service provides a direct command to the application's network device driver in the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1221">애플리케이션별 명령을 사용하면 *NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND* 이상의 숫자 값을 제공할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1221">Application-specific commands can be used providing their numeric value is greater than or equal to *NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1222">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1222">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1223">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1223">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1224">**command** 숫자 명령 코드입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1224">**command** Numeric command code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1225">표준 명령은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1225">Standard commands are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1226">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS(10)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1226">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1227">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED(11)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1227">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1228">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE(12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1228">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1229">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT(13)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1229">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1230">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT(14)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1230">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1231">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT(15)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1231">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1232">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS(16)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1232">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1233">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND(50)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1233">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1234">**interface_index** 명령을 송신해야 하는 대상 네트워크 인터페이스 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1234">**interface_index** Index of the network interface the command should be sent to.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1235">**return_value_ptr** 호출자의 반환 변수를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1235">**return_value_ptr** Pointer to return variable in the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1236">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1236">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1237">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 네트워크 드라이버 직접 명령이 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1237">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful network driver direct command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1238">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND**(0x44) 처리되지 않거나 구현되지 않은 네트워크 드라이버 명령입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1238">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) Unhandled or unimplemented network driver command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1239">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 잘못된 인터페이스 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1239">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1240">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP 또는 반환 값 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1240">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return value pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1241">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1241">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1242">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1243">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1243">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1244">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1244">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1245">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1245">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1246">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1246">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Make a direct call to the application-specific network driver
   for the previously created IP instance. For this example, the
   network driver is interrogated for the link status. */

/* Set the interface index to the primary device. */
UINT interface_index = 0;

status = nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command(&ip_0,
                                               NX_LINK_GET_STATUS,
                                               interface_index,
                                               &link_status);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link_status variable contains a
   NX_TRUE or NX_FALSE value representing the status of the
   physical link. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_forwarding_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1271">nx_ip_forwarding_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1271">nx_ip_forwarding_disable</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1272">IP 전달을 사용하지 않도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1272">Disable IP packet forwarding</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1273">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1273">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_forwarding_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1274">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1274">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1275">이 서비스는 NetX Duo IP 구성 요소 내부에서 IP 패킷 전달을 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1275">This service disables forwarding IP packets inside the NetX Duo IP component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1276">IP 작업을 만들 때 이 서비스는 자동으로 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1276">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1277">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1277">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1278">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1278">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1279">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1279">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1280">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 전달을 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1280">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP forwarding disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1281">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1283">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1283">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1284">초기화, 스레드, 타이머</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1284">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1285">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1285">Preemption Possible</span></span>  

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1286">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1286">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1287">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1287">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable IP forwarding on this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_forwarding_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP forwarding has been disabled on the
   previously created IP instance. */
```
