## <a name="nx_ip_forwarding_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1312">nx_ip_forwarding_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1312">nx_ip_forwarding_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1313">IP 패킷 전달 사용하도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1313">Enable IP packet forwarding</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1314">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1314">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_forwarding_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1315">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1315">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1316">이 서비스는 NetX Duo IP 구성 요소 내부에서 IP 패킷 전달을 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1316">This service enables forwarding IP packets inside the NetX Duo IP component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1317">IP 작업을 만들 때 이 서비스는 자동으로 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1317">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1318">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1318">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1319">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1319">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1320">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1320">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1321">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 전달을 사용하도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1321">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP forwarding enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1322">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1322">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1323">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1323">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1324">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1324">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1325">초기화, 스레드, 타이머</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1325">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1326">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1326">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1327">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1327">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1328">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1328">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IP forwarding on this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_forwarding_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP forwarding has been enabled on the
   previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_fragment_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1353">nx_ip_fragment_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1353">nx_ip_fragment_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1354">IP 패킷 조각화를 사용하지 않도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1354">Disable IP packet fragmenting</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1355">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1355">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_fragment_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1356">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1356">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1357">이 서비스는 IPv4 및 nd IPv6 패킷 조각화 및 리어셈블 기능을 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1357">This service disables IPv4 and IPv6 packet fragmenting and reassembling functionality.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1358">이 서비스는 리어셈블 대기 중인 패킷이 있는 경우 해당 패킷을 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1358">For packets waiting to be reassembled, this service releases these packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1359">IP 작업을 만들 때 이 서비스는 자동으로 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1359">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1360">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1360">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1361">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1361">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1362">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1362">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1363">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 조각화를 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1363">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP fragment disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1364">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1364">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1365">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1365">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1366">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) IP 인스턴스에서 IP 조각화가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1366">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP Fragmentation is not enabled on the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1367">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1367">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1368">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1368">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1369">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1369">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1370">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1370">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1371">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1371">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable IP fragmenting on this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_fragment_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, disables IP fragmenting on the
   previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_fragment_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1396">nx_ip_fragment_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1396">nx_ip_fragment_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1397">IP 패킷 조각화를 사용하도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1397">Enable IP packet fragmenting</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1398">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1398">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_fragment_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1399">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1399">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1400">이 서비스는 IPv4 및 IPv6 패킷 조각화 및 리어셈블 기능을 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1400">This service enables IPv4 and IPv6 packet fragmenting and reassembling functionality.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1401">IP 작업을 만들 때 이 서비스는 자동으로 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1401">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1402">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1402">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1403">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1403">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1404">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1404">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1405">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 조각화를 사용하도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1405">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP fragment enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1406">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1406">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1407">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1407">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1408">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) NetX Duo에 IP 조각화 기능이 컴파일되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1408">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP Fragmentation features is not compiled into NetX Duo.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1409">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1409">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1410">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1410">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1411">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1411">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1412">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1412">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1413">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1413">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IP fragmenting on this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_fragment_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP fragmenting has been enabled on the
   previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1439">IPv4 게이트웨이 주소 지우기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1439">Clear the IPv4 gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1440">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1440">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_clear(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1441">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1441">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1442">이 서비스는 인스턴스에 구성된 IPv4 게이트웨이 주소를 지웁니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1442">This service clears the IPv4 gateway address configured in the instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1443">IP 인스턴스에서 IPv6 기본 라우터를 지우려면 애플리케이션은 ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete*** 서비스를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1443">To clear an IPv6 default outer from the IP instance, applications shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1444">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1444">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1445">**ip_ptr** IP 제어 블록 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1445">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1446">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1446">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1447">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 게이트웨이 주소를 지웠습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1447">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully cleared the IP gateway address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1448">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) 잘못된 IP 제어 블록입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1448">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1449">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 시스템 초기화 또는 스레드 컨텍스트에서 서비스가 호출되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1449">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1450">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1450">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1451">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1451">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1452">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1452">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1453">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1453">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1454">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1454">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Clear the gateway address of IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_clear(&ip_0);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the gateway address was successfully
   cleared from the IP instance. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1455">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1455">See Also</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1456">-nx_ip_gateway_address_get -nx_ip_gateway_address_set -nx_ip_info_get -nx_ip_static_route_add -nx_ip_static_route_delete -nxd_ipv6_default_router_add -nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete -nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get -nxd_ipv6_default_router_get -nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1456">-nx_ip_gateway_address_get -nx_ip_gateway_address_set -nx_ip_info_get -nx_ip_static_route_add -nx_ip_static_route_delete -nxd_ipv6_default_router_add -nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete -nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get -nxd_ipv6_default_router_get -nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1457">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1457">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1458">IPv4 게이트웨이 주소 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1458">Get the IPv4 gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1459">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1459">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1460">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1461">이 서비스는 IP 인스턴스에 구성된 IPv4 게이트웨이 주소를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1461">This service retrieves the IPv4 gateway address configured in the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1462">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1462">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1463">**ip_ptr** IP 제어 블록 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1463">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1464">**ip_address** 게이트웨이 주소가 저장된 메모리에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1464">**ip_address** Pointer to the memory where the gateway address is stored</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1465">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1465">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1466">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 가져오는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1466">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1467">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP 제어 블록 포인터 또는 IP 주소 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1467">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or ip address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1468">**NX_NOT_FOUND**(0x4E) 게이트웨이 주소를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1468">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Gateway address not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1469">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 시스템 초기화 또는 스레드 컨텍스트에서 서비스가 호출되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1469">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1470">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1470">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1471">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1471">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1472">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1472">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1473">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1473">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1474">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1474">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG ip_address;

/* Get the gateway address of IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_get(&ip_0, &ip_address);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the gateway address was successfully
   got. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1480">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1480">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1481">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1481">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1487">게이트웨이 IP 주소 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1487">Set Gateway IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1488">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1488">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1489">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1490">이 서비스는 IPv4 게이트웨이 IP 주소를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1490">This service sets the IPv4 gateway IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1491">전송을 위한 네트워크 외부 트래픽은 모두 이 게이트웨이로 라우트됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1491">All out-of-network traffic are routed to this gateway for transmission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1492">게이트웨이는 네트워크 인터페이스 중 하나를 통해 직접 액세스할 수 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1492">The gateway must be directly accessible through one of the network interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1493">IPv6 게이트웨이 주소를 구성하려면 ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_add*** 서비스를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1493">To configure IPv6 gateway address, use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_add.***</span></span> 

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1494">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1494">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1495">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1495">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1496">**ip_address** 게이트웨이 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1496">**ip_address** IP address of the gateway.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1497">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1497">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1498">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 게이트웨이 IP 주소 설정에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1498">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful Gateway IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1499">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 인스턴스 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1500">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IP 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1500">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1501">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1501">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1502">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1502">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1503">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1503">Initialization, thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1504">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1504">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1505">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1505">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1506">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1506">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup the Gateway address for previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,99);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, all out-of-network send requests are
   routed to 1.2.3.99. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1519">IP 활동에 대한 정보 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1519">Retrieve information about IP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1520">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1520">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_received,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_received,
    ULONG *ip_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *ip_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_receive_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *ip_send_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_received);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1521">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1521">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1522">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스의 IP 활동에 대한 정보를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1522">This service retrieves information about IP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1523">대상 포인터가 NX_NULL이면 해당 특정 정보가 호출자에게 반환되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1523">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1524">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1524">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1525">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1525">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1526">**ip_total_packets_sent** 송신된 총 IP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1526">**ip_total_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of IP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent** 송신된 총 바이트 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1528">**ip_total_packets_received** 총 IP 수신 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1528">**ip_total_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received** 수신된 총 IP 바이트 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1530">**ip_invalid_packets** 잘못된 총 IP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1530">**ip_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid IP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped** 삭제된 총 수신 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1532">**ip_receive_checksum_errors** 수신 패킷의 총 체크섬 오류 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1532">**ip_receive_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of checksum errors in receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped** 삭제된 총 송신 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of send packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent** 송신된 총 조각 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent** Pointer to destination of the total number of fragments sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1535">**ip_total_fragments_received** 수신된 총 조각 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1535">**ip_total_fragments_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of fragments received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1536">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1537">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 정보 검색에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1538">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1538">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1539">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1540">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1540">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1541">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1541">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1542">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1542">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1543">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1543">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1544">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1544">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve IP information from previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_ip_info_get(&ip_0,
                        &ip_total_packets_sent,
                        &ip_total_bytes_sent,
                        &ip_total_packets_received,
                        &ip_total_bytes_received,
                        &ip_invalid_packets,
                        &ip_receive_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_receive_checksum_errors,
                        &ip_send_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_total_fragments_sent,
                        &ip_total_fragments_received);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1570">인터페이스 IP 주소 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1570">Retrieve interface IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1571">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1571">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_get (
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1572">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1572">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1573">이 서비스는 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스의 IPv4 주소를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1573">This service retrieves the IPv4 address of a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1574">IPv6 주소를 검색하려면 애플리케이션에서 ***nxd_ipv6_address_get*** 서비스를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1574">To retrieve IPv6 address, application shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_address_get***</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1575">기본 디바이스가 아닌 경우 지정된 디바이스가 이전에 이미 IP 인스턴스에 연결되어 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1575">*The specified device, if not the primary device, must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1576">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1576">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1577">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1577">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1578">**interface_index** 인터페이스 인덱스로, IP 인스턴스에 연결된 네트워크 인터페이스의 인덱스와 값이 동일합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1578">**interface_index** Interface index, the same value as the index to the network interface attached to the IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1579">**ip_address** 디바이스 인터페이스 IP 주소 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1579">**ip_address** Pointer to destination for the device interface IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1580">**network_mask** 디바이스 인터페이스 네트워크 마스크 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1580">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for the device interface network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1581">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1581">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1582">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 주소 가져오기에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1582">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1583">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1583">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1586">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1586">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1587">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1587">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1588">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1588">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1589">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1589">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1590">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1590">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Get device IP address and network mask for the specified
   interface index 1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_get(ip_ptr,INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                     &ip_address,
                                     &network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface address was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1605">주소 매핑이 필요한지 여부 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1605">Configure whether address mapping is needed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1606">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1606">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT mapping_needed);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1607">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1607">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1608">이 서비스는 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스에 대해 IP 주소-MAC 주소 매핑에 필요한지 여부를 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1608">This service configures whether IP address to MAC address mapping is needed for the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1609">일반적으로 이 서비스는 기본 인터페이스에 IP 주소-계층 2(MAC) 주소 매핑이 필요한지 여부를 IP 스택에 알리기 위해 인터페이스 디바이스 드라이버에서 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1609">This service is typically called from the interface device driver to notify the IP stack whether the underlying interface requires IP address to layer two (MAC) address mapping.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1610">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1611">**ip_ptr** IP 제어 블록 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1611">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1612">**interface_index** 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1612">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1613">**mapping_needed** NX_TRUE(주소 매핑이 필요함), NX_FALSE(주소 매핑이 필요하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1613">**mapping_needed** NX_TRUE -- address mapping needed NX_FALSE -- address mapping not needed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1614">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1614">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1615">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 성공적으로 구성했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1615">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful configure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1616">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 디바이스 인덱스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1616">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1617">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 제어 블록 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 시스템 초기화 또는 스레드 컨텍스트에서 서비스가 호출되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1619">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1619">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1620">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1620">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1621">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1621">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1622">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1622">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1623">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1623">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
UCHAR mapping_needed = NX_TRUE;

/* Configure address mapping needed specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(&ip_0,
                                             PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                             mapping_needed);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the address mapping needed was
   successfully configured. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1632">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1632">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1633">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1633">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1634">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1634">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1635">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1635">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1636">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1636">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1637">nx_ip_interface_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1637">nx_ip_interface_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1638">인터페이스 IP 주소 및 네트워크 마스크 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1638">Set interface IP address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1639">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1639">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1640">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1640">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1641">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인터페이스의 IPv4 주소 및 네트워크 마스크를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1641">This service sets the IPv4 address and network mask for the specified IP interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1642">IPv6 인터페이스 주소를 구성하기 위해 애플리케이션은 ***nxd_ipv6_address_set*** 서비스를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1642">To configure IPv6 interface address, application shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_address_set***.</span></span> 
 
> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1643">지정된 인터페이스가 이전에 이미 IP 인스턴스에 연결되어 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1643">*The specified interface must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span> 

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1644">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1644">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1645">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1645">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1646">**interface_index** NetX Duo 인스턴스에 연결된 인터페이스 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1646">**interface_index** Index of the interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1647">**ip_address** 새 네트워크 인터페이스 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1647">**ip_address** New network interface IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1648">**network_mask** 새 인터페이스 네트워크 마스크입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1648">**network_mask** New interface network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1649">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1649">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1650">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 주소 설정에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1650">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1651">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1651">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1652">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1652">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1653">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1653">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1654">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 잘못된 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1654">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1655">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1655">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1656">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1656">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1657">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1657">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1658">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1658">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1659">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1659">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Set device IP address and network mask for the specified
   interface index 1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_set(ip_ptr, INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                     ip_address,
                                     network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface IP address and mask was
   successfully set. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1666">nx_ip_interface_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1666">nx_ip_interface_detach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1667">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1667">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1668">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1668">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1673">nx_ip_interface_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1673">nx_ip_interface_attach</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1674">IP 인스턴스에 네트워크 인터페이스 연결</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1674">Attach network interface to IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1675">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1675">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_attach(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    CHAR *interface_name,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask,
    VOID(*ip_link_driver)(struct NX_IP_DRIVER_STRUCT *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1676">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1676">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1677">이 서비스는 IP 인터페이스에 실제 네트워크 인터페이스를 추가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1677">This service adds a physical network interface to the IP interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1678">IP 인스턴스는 기본 인터페이스를 사용하여 만들어지므로 각각의 추가 인터페이스는 기본 인터페이스에 대한 보조 인스턴스가 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1678">Note the IP instance is created with the primary interface so each additional interface is secondary to the primary interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1679">IP 인스턴스에 연결된 총 네트워크 인터페이스 수(기본 인터페이스 포함)는 **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** 를 초과할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1679">The total number of network interfaces attached to the IP instance (including the primary interface) cannot exceed **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1680">IP 스레드가 아직 실행되지 않은 경우 모든 실제 인터페이스를 초기화하는 IP 스레드 시작 프로세스의 일부로 보조 인터페이스가 초기화됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1680">If the IP thread has not been running yet, the secondary interfaces will be initialized as part of the IP thread startup process that initializes all physical interfaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1681">IP 스레드가 아직 실행되고 있지 않으면 보조 인터페이스가 ***nx_ip_interface_attach*** 서비스의 일부로 초기화됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1681">If the IP thread is not running yet, the secondary interface is initialized as part of the ***nx_ip_interface_attach*** service.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1682">ip_ptr은 유효한 NetX Duo IP 구조를 가리켜야 합니다. IP 인스턴스의 네트워크 인터페이스 수에 대해 **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** 를 구성해야 합니다. 기본값은 1입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1682">*ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure. **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** must be configured for the number of network interfaces for the IP instance. The default value is one*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1683">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1683">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1684">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1684">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1685">**interface_name** 인터페이스 이름 문자열을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1685">**interface_name** Pointer to interface name string.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1686">**ip_address** 디바이스 IP 주소입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1686">**ip_address** Device IP address in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1687">**network_mask** 디바이스 네트워크 마스크입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1687">**network_mask** Device network mask in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1688">**ip_link_driver** 인터페이스 이더넷 드라이버입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1688">**ip_link_driver** Ethernet driver for the interface.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1689">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1689">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1690">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 항목이 고정 라우팅 테이블에 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1690">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry is added to static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1691">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**(0x17) 최대 인터페이스 수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1691">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Max number of interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1692">NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES를 초과했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1692">NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES is exceeded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1693">IPv6를 사용하도록 설정하는 경우 이 오류는 드라이버에 IPv6 멀티캐스트 작업을 처리할 수 있을만큼 충분한 리소스가 없을 수도 있음을 나타낼 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1693">If IPv6 is enabled, this error may also indicate that the driver may not have enough resource to handle IPv6 multicast operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1694">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY**(0x52) 제공된 IP 주소는 이 IP 인스턴스에서 이미 사용되고 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1694">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) The supplied IP address is already used on this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1695">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1695">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1696">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 포인터 입력입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1696">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1697">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 잘못된 IP 주소 입력입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1697">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address input.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1698">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1698">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1699">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1699">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1700">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1700">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1701">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1701">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1702">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1702">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Attach secondary device for device IP address 192.168.1.68 with
   the specified Ethernet driver. */
status = nx_ip_interface_attach(ip_ptr, “secondary_port”,
                                IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,68),
                                0xFFFFFF00UL,
                                nx_etherDriver);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface was successfully added to
   the IP instance interface table. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_capability_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1716">nx_ip_interface_capability_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1716">nx_ip_interface_capability_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1717">인터페이스 하드웨어 기능 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1717">Get interface hardware capability</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1718">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1718">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_capability_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *interface_capability_flag);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1719">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1719">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1720">이 서비스는 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스에서 기능 플래그를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1720">This service retrieves the capability flag from the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1721">이 서비스를 사용하려면 ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** 옵션을 사용하도록 설정한 상태로 Netx Duo 라이브러리를 빌드해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1721">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1722">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1722">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1723">**ip_ptr** IP 제어 블록 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1723">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1724">**interface_index** 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1724">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1725">**interface_capability_flag** 기능 플래그의 메모리 공간을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1725">**interface_capability_flag** Pointer to memory space for the capability flag</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1726">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1726">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1727">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 인터페이스 기능 정보를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully obtained interface capability information.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1728">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) 이 빌드에서는 인터페이스 기능이 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1728">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Interface capability feature is not supported in this build.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1729">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 인터페이스 인덱스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1729">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1730">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) 잘못된 IP 제어 블록 포인터 또는 잘못된 기능 플래그 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or Invalid capability flag pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 시스템 초기화 또는 스레드 컨텍스트에서 서비스가 호출되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1732">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1733">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1733">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1734">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1734">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1735">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1735">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1736">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1736">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       capability_flag;

/* Get the hardware capability flag of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_capability_get(&ip_0,
                                        PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                        &capability_flag);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the capability flag from the primary
   interface was successfully retrieved. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1747">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1747">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1748">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1748">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1749">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1749">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_capability_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1750">nx_ip_interface_capability_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1750">nx_ip_interface_capability_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1751">하드웨어 기능 플래그 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1751">Set the hardware capability flag</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1752">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1752">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_capability_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG interface_capability_flag);
```                           
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1753">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1753">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1754">이 서비스는 네트워크 디바이스 드라이버에서 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스에 대해 기능 플래그를 구성하는 데 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1754">This service is used by the network device driver to configure the capability flag for a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1755">이 서비스를 사용하려면 ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** 옵션을 정의한 상태로 Netx Duo 라이브러리를 컴파일해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1755">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be compiled with the option ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1756">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1756">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1757">**ip_ptr** IP 제어 블록 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1757">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1758">**interface_index** 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1758">**interface_index** Index of network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1759">**interface_capability_flag** 출력에 대한 기능 플래그입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1759">**interface_capability_flag** Capability flag for output</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1760">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1760">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1761">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 인터페이스 하드웨어 기능 플래그를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1761">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set interface hardware capability flag.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1762">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) 이 빌드에서는 인터페이스 기능이 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1762">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Interface capability feature is not supported in this build.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1763">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 인터페이스 인덱스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1763">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1764">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 제어 블록 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1764">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1765">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 시스템 초기화 또는 스레드 컨텍스트에서 서비스가 호출되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1765">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1766">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1766">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1767">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1767">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1768">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1768">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1769">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1769">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1770">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1770">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG capability_flag = \
                 NX_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY_IPV4_TX_CHECKSUM |\
                 NX_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY_IPV4_RX_CHECKSUM;
UINT device_index = 0;

/* Set the hardware capability flag of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_capability_set(&ip_0,
                                        PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                        capability_flag);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the hardware capability flag was
   successfully set. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1779">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1779">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1780">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1780">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1781">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1781">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1782">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1782">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1783">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1783">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_detach"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1784">nx_ip_interface_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1784">nx_ip_interface_detach</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1785">IP 인스턴스에서 지정된 인터페이스 분리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1785">Detach the specified interface from the IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1786">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1786">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1787">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1787">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1788">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인터페이스를 IP 인스턴스에서 분리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1788">This service detaches the specified IP interface from the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1789">인터페이스가 분리되면 연결된 모든 TCP 소켓이 닫히고, 이 인터페이스에 대한 ND 캐시 및 ARP 항목이 해당 테이블에서 제거됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1789">Once an interface is detached, all connected TCP sockets closed, and ND cache and ARP entries for this interface are removed from their respective tables.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1790">이 인터페이스에 대한 IGMP 멤버 자격이 제거됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1790">IGMP memberships for this interface are removed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1791">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1791">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1792">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1792">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1793">**index** 제거할 인터페이스의 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1793">**index** Index of the interface to be removed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1794">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1795">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 실제 인터페이스를 제거했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1795">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully removed a physical interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1796">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1796">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1797">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1797">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1798">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1798">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1799">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1799">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1800">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1800">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1801">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1801">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1802">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1802">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Detach interface 1. */
status = nx_ip_interface_detach(&IP_0, INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface is successfully detached
   from the IP instance. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1811">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1811">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1812">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1812">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1813">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1813">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1814">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1814">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1815">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1815">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1816">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1816">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1817">네트워크 인터페이스 매개 변수 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1817">Retrieve network interface parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1818">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1818">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    CHAR **interface_name,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask,
    ULONG *mtu_size,
    ULONG *physical_address_msw,
    ULONG *physical_address_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1819">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1819">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1820">이 서비스는 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스의 네트워크 매개 변수에 대한 정보를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1820">This service retrieves information on network parameters for the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1821">모든 데이터는 호스트 바이트 순서대로 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1821">All data are retrieved in host byte order.</span></span> 

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1822">ip_ptr은 유효한 NetX Duo IP 구조를 가리켜야 합니다. 기본 인터페이스가 아닌 경우 지정된 인터페이스가 이전에 이미 IP 인스턴스에 연결되어 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1822">*ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure. The specified interface, if not the primary interface, must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1823">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1823">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1824">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1824">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1825">**interface_index** 네트워크 인터페이스를 지정하는 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1825">**interface_index** Index specifying network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1826">**interface_name** 네트워크 인터페이스 이름이 포함된 버퍼를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1826">**interface_name** Pointer to the buffer that holds the name of the network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1827">**ip_address** 인터페이스 IP 주소 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1827">**ip_address** Pointer to the destination for the IP address of the interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1828">**network_mask** 네트워크 마스크 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1828">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for network mask.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1829">**mtu_size** 이 인터페이스의 최대 전송 단위 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1829">**mtu_size** Pointer to destination for maximum transfer unit for this interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1830">**physical_address_msw** 디바이스 MAC 주소의 상위 16비트 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1830">**physical_address_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1831">**physical_address_lsw** 디바이스 MAC 주소의 하위 32비트 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1831">**physical_address_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1832">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1832">Return Values</span></span>   

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1833">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 인터페이스 정보를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1833">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Interface information has been obtained.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1834">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 포인터 입력입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1834">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1835">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 잘못된 IP 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1835">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1836">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 시스템 초기화 또는 스레드 컨텍스트에서 서비스가 호출되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1836">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1837">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1837">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1838">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1838">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1839">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1839">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1840">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1840">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1841">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1841">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve interface parameters for the specified interface (index
   1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ip_interface_info_get(ip_ptr, INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                  &name_ptr, &ip_address,
                                  &network_mask,
                                  &mtu_size,
                                  &physical_address_msw,
                                  &physical_address_lsw);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface information is
   successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_mtu_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1855">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1855">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1856">네트워크 인터페이스의 MTU 값 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1856">Set the MTU value of a network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1857">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1857">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_mtu_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG mtu_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1858">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1858">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1859">이 서비스는 디바이스 드라이버에서 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 IP MTU 값을 구성하는 데 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1859">This service is used by the device driver to configure the IP MTU value for the specified network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1860">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1861">**ip_ptr** IP 제어 블록 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1861">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1862">**interface_index** 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1862">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1863">**mtu_size** IP MTU 크기입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1863">**mtu_size** IP MTU size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1864">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1864">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1865">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) MTU 값을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1865">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set MTU value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1866">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 인터페이스 인덱스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1866">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1867">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 제어 블록 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1867">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1868">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 시스템 초기화 또는 스레드 컨텍스트에서 서비스가 호출되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1868">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1869">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1869">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1870">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1870">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1871">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1871">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1872">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1872">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1873">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1873">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       mtu_size = 1500;

/* Set the MTU size of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_mtu_set(&ip_0,
                                 PRIMARY_INTERFACE, mtu_size);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the MTU size was successfully set. */
```
