## <a name="nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1887">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1887">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1888">네트워크 디바이스의 실제 주소 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1888">Get the physical address of a network device</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1889">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1889">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1890">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1890">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1891">이 서비스는 IP 인스턴스에서 네트워크 인터페이스의 실제 주소를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1891">This service retrieves the physical address of a network interface from the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1892">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1892">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1893">**ip_ptr** IP 제어 블록 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1893">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1894">**interface_index** 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1894">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1895">**physical_msw** 디바이스 MAC 주소의 상위 16비트 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1895">**physical_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1896">**physical_lsw** 디바이스 MAC 주소의 하위 32비트 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1896">**physical_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1897">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1897">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1898">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 가져오는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1898">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1899">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 인터페이스 인덱스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1899">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1900">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) 잘못된 IP 제어 블록 포인터 또는 물리적 주소 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1900">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or physical address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1901">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 시스템 초기화 또는 스레드 컨텍스트에서 서비스가 호출되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1901">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1902">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1902">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1903">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1903">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1904">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1904">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1905">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1905">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1906">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1906">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG   physical_msw;
ULONG   physical_lsw;

/* Get the physical address of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get(&ip_0,
                                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                              &physical_msw,
                                              &physical_lsw);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the physical address was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1920">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1920">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1921">지정된 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 실제 주소를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1921">Set the physical address for a specified network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1922">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1922">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw,
    UINT update_driver);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1923">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1924">이 서비스는 애플리케이션 또는 디바이스 드라이버에서 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스의 MAC 주소에 대해 실제 주소를 구성하는 데 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1924">This service is used by the application or a device driver to configure the physical address of the MAC address of the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1925">새 MAC 주소는 인터페이스 구조의 제어 블록에 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1925">The new MAC address is applied to the control block of the interface structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1926">***update_driver*** 플래그를 설정하면 드라이버 수준 명령이 실행되어 디바이스 드라이버가 이더넷 컨트롤러로 프로그래밍된 MAC 주소를 업데이트할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1926">If the ***update_driver*** flag is set, a driver-level command is issued so the device driver is able to update its MAC address programmed into the Ethernet controller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1927">일반적인 상황에서 이 서비스는 초기화 단계 동안 인터페이스 디바이스 드라이버에서 호출되어 해당 MAC 주소를 IP 스택에 알립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1927">In a typical situation, this service is called from the interface device driver during initialization phase to notify the IP stack of its MAC address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1928">이 경우에는 ***update_driver*** 플래그를 설정하면 안 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1928">In this case, the ***update_driver*** flag should not be set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1929">사용자 애플리케이션에서 이 루틴을 호출하여 런타임에 인터페이스 MAC 주소를 다시 구성할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1929">This routine can also be called from user application to reconfigure the interface MAC address at run time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1930">이 사용 사례에서는 새 MAC 주소를 디바이스 드라이버에 적용할 수 있도록 ***update_driver*** 플래그를 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1930">In this use case, the ***update_driver*** flag should be set, so the new MAC address can be applied to the device driver.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1931">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1931">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1932">**ip_ptr** IP 제어 블록 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1932">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1933">**interface_index** 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1933">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1934">**physical_msw** 디바이스 MAC 주소의 상위 16비트 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1934">**physical_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1935">**physical_lsw** 디바이스 MAC 주소의 하위 32비트 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1935">**physical_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1936">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1937">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1937">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1938">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND**(0x4B) 드라이버가 인식할 수 없는 명령입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1938">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x4B) Command not recognized by the driver</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1939">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 인터페이스 인덱스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1939">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1940">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 제어 블록 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1940">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1941">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 시스템 초기화 또는 스레드 컨텍스트에서 서비스가 호출되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1941">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1942">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1942">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1943">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1943">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1944">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1944">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1945">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1945">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1946">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1946">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       physical_msw = 0x00CF;
ULONG       physical_lsw = 0x01020304;

/* Set the physical address of specified device. */
status = nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set(&ip_0,
                                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                              physical_msw,
                                              physical_lsw,
                                              NX_TRUE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the physical address was successfully
   set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_status_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1960">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1960">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1961">IP 인스턴스의 상태 확인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1961">Check status of an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1962">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1962">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_status_check(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index
    ULONG needed_status,
    ULONG *actual_status,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1963">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1963">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1964">이 서비스는 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스의 네트워크 인터페이스 상태를 확인하고 선택적으로 지정된 상태가 될 때까지 대기합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1964">This service checks and optionally waits for the specified status of the network interface of a previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1965">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1965">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1966">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1966">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1967">**interface_index** 다음과 같이 비트 맵 형식으로 정의된 요청된 인터페이스 인덱스 번호 needed_status IP 상태입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1967">**interface_index** Interface index number needed_status IP status requested, defined in bit-map form as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1968">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE**(0x0001)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1968">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1969">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED**(0x0002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1969">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1970">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED**(0x0004)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1970">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1971">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED**(0x0008)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1971">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1972">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED**(0x0010)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1972">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1973">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED**(0x0020)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1973">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1974">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED**(0x0040)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1974">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1975">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE**(0x0080)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1975">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1976">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED**(0x0100)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1976">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1977">**actual_status** 설정된 실제 비트 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1977">**actual_status** Pointer to destination of actual bits set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1978">wait_option 요청된 상태 비트를 사용할 수 없는 경우 서비스가 작동하는 방식을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1978">wait_option Defines how the service behaves if the requested status bits are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1979">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1979">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1980">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1980">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1981">**시간 제한 값**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1981">**timeout value** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1982">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1982">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1983">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1983">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1984">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 상태 확인에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1984">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP status check.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1985">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL**(0x43) 지정된 시간 제한 내에 상태 요청이 충족되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1985">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Status request was not satisfied within the timeout specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1986">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었거나 잘못된 상태였거나, 실제 상태 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1986">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP pointer is or has become invalid, or actual status pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1987">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**(0x0a) 필요한 상태 옵션이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1987">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid needed status option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1988">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1988">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1989">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) Interface_index가 범위를 벗어났습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1989">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface_index is out of range.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-1990">또는 인터페이스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1990">or the interface is not valid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1991">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1991">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1992">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1992">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1993">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1993">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-1994">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1994">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-1995">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-1995">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 10 ticks for the link up status on the previously created IP
   instance. */
status = nx_ip_interface_status_check(&ip_0, 1, NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED,
                                      &actual_status, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the secondary link for the specified IP
   instance is up. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2009">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2009">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2010">링크 상태 변경 알림 콜백 함수 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2010">Set the link status change notify callback function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2011">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2011">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID(*link_status_change_notify)(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT interface_index, UINT link_up));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2012">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2012">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2013">이 서비스는 링크 상태 변경 알림 콜백 함수를 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2013">This service configures the link status change notify callback function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2014">기본 또는 보조 인터페이스 상태가 변경되는 경우(예: IP 주소가 변경되는 경우) 사용자 제공 link_status_change_notify 루틴이 호출됩니다. link_status_change_notify가 NULL인 경우 링크 상태 변경 알림 콜백 기능이 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2014">The user-supplied *link_status_change_notify* routine is invoked when either the primary or secondary interface status is changed (such as IP address is changed.) If *link_status_change_notify* is NULL, the link status change notify callback feature is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2015">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2015">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2016">**ip_ptr** IP 제어 블록 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2016">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2017">**link_status_change_notify** 실제 인터페이스 변경 시 호출되는 사용자 제공 콜백 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2017">**link_status_change_notify** User-supplied callback function to be called upon a change to the physical interface.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2018">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2018">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2019">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2019">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2020">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP 제어 블록 포인터 또는 새 물리적 주소 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2020">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or new physical address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2021">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 시스템 초기화 또는 스레드 컨텍스트에서 서비스가 호출되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2021">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2022">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2022">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2023">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2023">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2024">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2024">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2025">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2025">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2026">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2026">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Configure a callback function to be used when the physical
   interface status is changed. */
status = nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set(&ip_0,
                                             my_change_cb);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the link status change notify function
   is set. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2037">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2037">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2038">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2038">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2039">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2039">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_max_payload_size_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2040">nx_ip_max_payload_size_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2040">nx_ip_max_payload_size_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2041">최대 패킷 데이터 페이로드 계산</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2041">Compute maximum packet data payload</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2042">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2042">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_max_payload_size_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *dest_address,
    UINT if_index,
    UINT src_port,
    UINT dest_port,
    ULONG protocol,
    ULONG *start_offset_ptr,
    ULONG *payload_length_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2043">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2043">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2044">이 서비스는 대상에 도달하기 위해 IP 조각화가 필요하지 않은 최대 애플리케이션 페이로드 크기를 찾습니다. 예를 들어, 로컬 인터페이스 MTU 크기와 같거나 낮을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2044">This service finds the maximum application payload size that will not require IP fragmentation to reach the destination; e.g., payload is at or below the local interface MTU size.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2045">(또는 IPv6 경로 MTU 검색을 통해 얻은 경로 MTU 값)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2045">(or the Path MTU value obtained via IPv6 Path MTU discovery).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2046">IP 헤더 및 상위 애플리케이션 헤더 크기(TCP 또는 UDP)를 총 페이로드에서 뺍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2046">IP header and upper application header size (TCP or UDP) are subtracted from the total payload.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2047">NetX Duo IPsec 보안 정책이 이 엔드포인트에 적용되는 경우 IPsec 헤더(ESP/AH) 및 관련 오버헤드(예: 초기 벡터)도 MTU에서 뺍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2047">If NetX Duo IPsec Security Policy applies to this end-point, the IPsec headers (ESP/AH) and associated overhead, such as Initial Vector, are also subtracted from the MTU.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2048">이 서비스는 IPv4 및 IPv6 패킷 모두에 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2048">This service is applicable for both IPv4 and IPv6 packets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2049">매개 변수 *if_index* 는 패킷을 보내는 데 사용할 인터페이스를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2049">The parameter *if_index* specifies the interface to use for sending out the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2050">멀티홈 시스템의 경우 대상이 브로드캐스트(IPv4 전용), 멀티캐스트 또는 IPv6 링크-로컬 주소인 경우 호출자는 *if_index* 매개 변수를 지정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2050">For a multihome system, the caller needs to specify the *if_index* parameter if the destination is a broadcast (IPv4 only), multicast, or IPv6 link-local address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2051">이 서비스는 호출자에게 다음 두 값을 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2051">This service returns two values to the caller:</span></span>

1) <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2052">start_offset_ptr: TCP/UDP/IP/IPsec 헤더 다음에 나오는 위치입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2052">start_offset_ptr: This is the location after the TCP/UDP/IP/IPsec headers;</span></span>
2) <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2053">payload_length_ptr: 애플리케이션이 MTU를 초과하지 않고 전송할 수 있는 데이터의 양입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2053">payload_length_ptr: the amount of data application may transfer without exceeding MTU.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2054">해당 NetX 서비스가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2054">There is no equivalent NetX service.</span></span>

### <a name="restrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2055">제한</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2055">Restrictions</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2056">이전에 IP 인스턴스를 만들어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2056">The IP instance must be previously created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2057">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2057">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2058">**ip_ptr** IP 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2058">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2059">**dest_address** 패킷 대상 주소를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2059">**dest_address** Pointer to packet destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2060">**if_index** 사용할 인터페이스의 인덱스를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2060">**if_index** Indicates the index of the interface to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2061">**src_port** 원본 포트 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2061">**src_port** Source port number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2062">**dest_port** 대상 포트 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2062">**dest_port** Destination port number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2063">**protocol** 사용할 상위 계층 프로토콜입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2063">**protocol** Upper layer protocol to be used</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2064">**start_offset_ptr** 최대 패킷 페이로드의 데이터 시작을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2064">**start_offset_ptr** Pointer to the start of data for maximum packet payload</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2065">**payload_length_ptr** 헤더를 제외한 페이로드 크기를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2065">**payload_length_ptr** Pointer to payload size excluding headers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2066">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2066">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2067">**NX_SUCCESS**(0X00) 페이로드를 계산했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2067">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Payload successfully computed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2068">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 인터페이스 인덱스가 잘못되었거나 인터페이스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2068">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is invalid, or the interface is not valid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2069">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IP 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2069">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2070">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었거나 대상 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2070">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer, or invalid destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2071">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 잘못된 주소를 제공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2071">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid address supplied</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2072">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) 잘못된 프로토콜(UDP 또는 TCP 아님)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2072">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Invalid protocol (not UDP or TCP)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2073">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 시스템 초기화 또는 스레드 컨텍스트에서 서비스가 호출되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2073">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2074">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2074">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2075">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2075">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2076">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2076">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2077">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2077">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2078">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2078">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following example determines the maximum payload for UDP
   packet to remote host. */
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
status = nx_ip_max_payload_size_find(&ip_0,
                                     &dest_ipv6_address,
                                     PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                     source_port,
                                     dest_port, NX_PROTOCOL_UDP,
                                     &start_offset,
                                     &payload_length);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates the packet payload
   payload_length starting at the offset start_offset is
   successfully computed. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2103">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2103">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2104">원시 패킷 송신/수신을 사용하지 않도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2104">Disable raw packet sending/receiving</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2105">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2105">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2106">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2107">이 서비스는 이 IP 인스턴스의 원시 IP 패킷 전송 및 수신을 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2107">This service disables transmission and reception of raw IP packets for this IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2108">이전에 원시 패킷 서비스를 사용하도록 설정했으며 수신 큐에 원시 패킷이 있는 경우 이 서비스는 수신된 원시 패킷을 모두 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2108">If the raw packet service was previously enabled, and there are raw packets in the receive queue, this service will release any received raw packets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2109">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2109">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2110">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2110">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2111">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2111">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2112">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 원시 패킷을 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2112">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2113">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2113">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2114">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2114">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2115">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2116">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2116">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2117">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2117">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2118">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2118">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2119">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2119">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable raw packet sending/receiving for this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_disable(&ip_0);
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, raw IP packet sending/receiving has
   been disabled for the previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2129">nx_ip_raw_packet_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2129">nx_ip_raw_packet_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2130">원시 패킷 처리를 사용하도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2130">Enable raw packet processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2131">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2131">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2132">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2132">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2133">이 서비스는 이 IP 인스턴스에 대해 원시 IP 패킷 전송 및 수신을 사용할 수 있도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2133">This service enables transmission and reception of raw IP packets for this IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2134">수신 TCP, UDP, ICMP 및 IGMP 패킷은 여전히 NetX Duo에서 처리됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2134">Incoming TCP, UDP, ICMP, and IGMP packets are still processed by NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2135">상위 계층 프로토콜 유형을 알 수 없는 패킷은 원시 패킷 수신 루틴에서 처리됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2135">Packets with unknown upper layer protocol types are processed by raw packet reception routine.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2136">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2136">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2137">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2137">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2138">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2138">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2139">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 원시 패킷을 사용하도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2139">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2140">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2140">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2141">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2141">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2142">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2142">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2143">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2143">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2144">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2144">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2145">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2145">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2146">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2146">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable raw packet sending/receiving for this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, raw IP packet sending/receiving has
   been enabled for the previously created IP instance. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2152">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2152">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2156">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2156">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2157">원시 IP 패킷 필터 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2157">Set raw IP packet filter</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2158">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2158">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT (*raw_packet_filter)(NX_IP *, ULONG, NX_PACKET *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2159">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2159">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2160">이 서비스는 IP 원시 패킷 필터를 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2160">This service configures the IP raw packet filter.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2161">사용자 애플리케이션에서 구현하는 원시 패킷 필터 함수를 사용하면 애플리케이션에서 사용자가 제공한 기준에 따라 원시 패킷을 수신할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2161">The raw packet filter function, implemented by user application, allows an application to receive raw packets based on user-supplied criteria.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2162">NetX Duo BSD 래퍼 계층은 원시 패킷 필터 기능을 사용하여 BSD 계층의 원시 소켓을 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2162">Note that NetX Duo BSD wrapper layer uses the raw packet filter feature to handle raw socket in the BSD layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2163">이 서비스를 사용하려면 ***NX_ENABLE_IP_RAW_PACKET_FILTER*** 옵션을 정의한 상태로 Netx Duo 라이브러리를 빌드해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2163">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IP_RAW_PACKET_FILTER*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2164">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2164">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2165">**ip_ptr** IP 제어 블록 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2165">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2166">**raw_packet_filter** 원시 패킷 필터의 함수 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2166">**raw_packet_filter** Function pointer of the raw packet filter</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2167">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2167">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2168">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 원시 패킷 필터 루틴을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2168">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the raw packet filter routine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2169">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT**(0x4B) 원시 패킷 지원을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2169">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) Raw packet support is not available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2170">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 제어 블록 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2170">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2171">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2171">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2172">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2172">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2173">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2173">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2174">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2174">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2175">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2175">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2176">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2176">Example</span></span>

```c
UINT raw_packet_filter(NX_IP *ip_ptr, ULONG protocol,
                       NX_PACKET *packet_ptr)
{

/* Simply filter protocol. */
if(protocol == NX_IP_RAW)
   return NX_SUCCESS;
else
   return NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL;
}

void raw_packet_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

/* Set the raw packet filter of IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set(&ip_0,
                                     raw_packet_filter);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the raw packet filter of IP instance
   was successfully set. */
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2183">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2183">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2184">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2184">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2185">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2185">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2186">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2186">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2187">원시 IP 패킷 수신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2187">Receive raw IP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2188">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2188">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_receive(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2189">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2189">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2190">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스에서 원시 IP 패킷을 수신합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2190">This service receives a raw IP packet from the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2191">원시 패킷 수신 큐에 IP 패킷이 있는 경우 첫 번째(가장 오래된) 패킷이 호출자에게 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2191">If there are IP packets on the raw packet receive queue, the first (oldest) packet is returned to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2192">그렇지 않고 사용할 수 있는 패킷이 없는 경우 대기 옵션에 지정된 대로 호출자가 일시 중단될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2192">Otherwise, if no packets are available, the caller may suspend as specified by the wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]   
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2193">NX_SUCCESS가 반환되는 경우 애플리케이션은 수신된 패킷이 더 이상 필요하지 않으면 해당 패킷을 해제해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2193">*If NX_SUCCESS, is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2194">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2194">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2195">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2195">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2196">**packet_ptr** 수신된 원시 IP 패킷이 배치될 포인터를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2196">**packet_ptr** Pointer to pointer to place the received raw IP packet in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2197">**wait_option** 사용할 수 있는 패킷이 없는 경우 서비스가 작동하는 방식을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2197">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if packets are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2198">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2198">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2199">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2199">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2200">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**(0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2200">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2201">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2201">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2202">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2202">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2203">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 원시 패킷 수신에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2203">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2204">**NX_NO_PACKET**(0x01) 사용할 수 있는 패킷이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2204">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet was available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2205">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort 호출에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2205">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2206">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2206">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2207">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP 또는 반환 패킷 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2207">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2208">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2208">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2209">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2209">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2210">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2210">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2211">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2211">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2212">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2212">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2213">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2213">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a raw IP packet for this IP instance, wait for a maximum
   of 4 timer ticks. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_receive(&ip_0, &packet_ptr, 4);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the raw IP packet pointer is in the
   variable packet_ptr. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2214">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2214">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2215">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2215">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2216">nx_ip_raw_packet_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2216">nx_ip_raw_packet_enable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2217">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2217">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2218">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2218">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2219">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2219">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2220">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2220">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2221">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2221">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2222">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2222">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2223">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2223">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2224">원시 IP 패킷 송신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2224">Send raw IP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2225">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2225">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG destination_ip,
    ULONG type_of_service);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2226">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2227">이 서비스는 원시 IPv4 패킷을 대상 IP 주소로 송신합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2227">This service sends a raw IPv4 packet to the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2228">이 루틴은 즉시 반환되므로 IP 패킷이 실제로 송신되었는지를 알 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2228">Note that this routine returns immediately, and it is therefore not known whether the IP packet has actually been sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2229">네트워크 드라이버는 전송이 완료되면 패킷을 해제해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2229">The network driver will be responsible for releasing the packet when the transmission is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2230">멀티홈 시스템의 경우 NetX Duo는 대상 IP 주소를 사용하여 적절한 네트워크 인터페이스를 찾고 인터페이스의 IP 주소를 원본 주소로 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2230">For a multihome system, NetX Duo uses the destination IP address to find an appropriate network interface and uses the IP address of the interface as the source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2231">대상 IP 주소가 브로드캐스트 또는 멀티캐스트면 유효한 첫 번째 인터페이스가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2231">If the destination IP address is broadcast or multicast, the first valid interface is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2232">이 경우 애플리케이션은 ***nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send*** 를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2232">Applications use the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send*** in this case.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2233">원시 IPv6 패킷을 송신하기 위해 애플리케이션은 \***nxd_ip_raw_packet_send,** _ 또는 _ \**_nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send_* 서비스를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2233">To send a raw IPv6 packet, application shall use the service ***nxd_ip_raw_packet_send,** _ or _ *_nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send._**</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2234">오류가 반환되지 않는 한 이 호출 후 애플리케이션은 패킷을 해제하면 안 됩니다. 애플리케이션이 패킷을 해제하면 전송 후 네트워크 드라이버가 패킷을 해제하므로 예측할 수 없는 결과가 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2234">*Unless an error is returned, the application should not release the packet after this call. Doing so will cause unpredictable results because the network driver will release the packet after transmission*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2235">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2235">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2236">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2236">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2237">**packet_ptr** 송신할 원시 IP 패킷을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2237">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the raw IP packet to send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2238">**destination_ip** 대상 IP 주소로, 특정 호스트 IP 주소나 네트워크 브로드캐스트, 내부 루프백, 멀티캐스트 주소일 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2238">**destination_ip** Destination IP address, which can be a specific host IP address, a network broadcast, an internal loop-back, or a multicast address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2239">**type_of_service** 전송할 서비스 유형을 정의합니다. 올바른 값은 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2239">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2240">**NX_IP_NORMAL**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2240">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2241">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY**(0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2241">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2242">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA**(0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2242">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2243">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE**(0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2243">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2244">**NX_IP_MIN_COST**(0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2244">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2245">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2245">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2246">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 원시 패킷 송신에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2246">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet send initiated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2247">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IP 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2247">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2248">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 원시 IP 기능이 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2248">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP feature is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2249">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**(0x0A) 잘못된 유형의 서비스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2249">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type of service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2250">**NX_UNDERFLOW**(0x02) 공간이 부족하여 패킷에서 IP 헤더를 앞에 추가할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2250">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room to prepend an IP header on the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2251">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 패킷 뒤에 추가 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2251">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2252">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP 또는 패킷 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2252">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2253">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2253">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2254">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2254">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2255">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2255">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2256">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2256">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2257">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2257">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2258">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2258">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Send a raw IP packet to IP address 1.2.3.5. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr,
                               IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5),
                               NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the raw IP packet pointed to by
   packet_ptr has been sent. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2263">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2263">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2264">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2264">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2265">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2265">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2266">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2266">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2267">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2267">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2268">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2268">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2269">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2269">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2270">지정된 네트워크 인터페이스를 통해 원시 IP 패킷 송신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2270">Send raw IP packet through specified network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2271">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2271">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG destination_ip,
    UINT address_index,
    ULONG type_of_service);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2272">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2272">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2273">이 서비스는 지정된 로컬 IPv4 주소를 원본 주소로 사용하고 연결된 네트워크 인터페이스를 통해 원시 IP 패킷을 대상 IP 주소로 송신합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2273">This service sends a raw IP packet to the destination IP address using the specified local IPv4 address as the source address, and through the associated network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2274">이 루틴은 즉시 반환되므로 IP 패킷이 실제로 송신되었는지를 알 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2274">Note that this routine returns immediately, and it is, therefore, not known if the IP packet has actually been sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2275">네트워크 드라이버는 전송이 완료되면 패킷을 해제해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2275">The network driver will be responsible for releasing the packet when the transmission is complete.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2276">이 서비스는 패킷이 실제로 송신되었는지를 알 방법이 없다는 점에서 다른 서비스와 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2276">This service differs from other services in that there is no way of knowing if the packet was actually sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2277">패킷이 인터넷에서 손실될 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2277">It could get lost on the Internet.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2278">원시 IP 처리는 사용하도록 설정되어 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2278">*Note that raw IP processing must be enabled*.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2279">이 서비스는 애플리케이션이 지정된 실제 인터페이스에서 원시 IPv4 패킷을 송신하도록 허용하는 점을 제외하고는 **nx_ip_raw_packet_send** 와 유사합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2279">*This service is similar to **nx_ip_raw_packet_send,** except that this service allows an application to send raw IPv4 packet from a specified physical interfaces*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2280">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2280">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2281">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 작업을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2281">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP task.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2282">**packet_ptr** 전송할 패킷을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2282">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2283">**destination_ip** 패킷을 송신할 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2283">**destination_ip** IP address to send packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2284">**address_index** 패킷을 송신할 인터페이스 주소 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2284">**address_index** Index of the address of the interface to send packet out on.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2285">**type_of_service** 패킷 서비스 유형입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2285">**type_of_service** Type of service for packet.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2286">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2286">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2287">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 패킷이 성공적으로 전송되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2287">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet successfully transmitted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2288">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 사용할 수 있는 적절한 발신 인터페이스가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2288">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) No suitable outgoing interface available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2289">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 원시 IP 패킷 처리가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2289">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP packet processing not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2290">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2290">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2291">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 포인터 입력입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2291">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2292">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**(0x0A) 잘못된 유형의 서비스가 지정되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2292">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type of service specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2293">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 잘못된 패킷 앞에 추가 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2293">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2294">**NX_UNDERFLOW**(0x02) 잘못된 패킷 앞에 추가 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2294">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2295">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 잘못된 인터페이스 인덱스가 지정되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2295">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index specified.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2296">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2296">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2297">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2297">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2298">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2298">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2299">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2299">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2300">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2300">Example</span></span>

```c
#define ADDRESS_IDNEX 1

/* Send packet out on interface 1 with normal type of service. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send(ip_ptr, packet_ptr,
                                      destination_ip,
                                      ADDRESS_INDEX,
                                      NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the packet was successfully
   transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2310">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2310">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2311">최대 원시 수신 큐 크기 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2311">Set maximum raw receive queue size</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2312">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2312">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG queue_max);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2313">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2313">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2314">이 서비스는 IP 원시 패킷 수신 큐의 최대 깊이를 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2314">This service configures the maximum depth of the IP raw packet receive queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2315">IP 원시 패킷 수신 큐는 IPv4 및 IPv6 패킷 모두와 공유됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2315">Note that the IP raw packet receive queue is shared with both IPv4 and IPv6 packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2316">원시 패킷 수신 큐가 사용자가 구성한 최대 깊이에 도달하면 새로 수신된 원시 패킷은 삭제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2316">When the raw packet receive queue reaches the userconfigured maximum depth, newly received raw packets are dropped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2317">기본 IP 원시 패킷 수신 큐 깊이는 20입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2317">The default IP raw packet receive queue depth is 20.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2318">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2318">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2319">**ip_ptr** IP 제어 블록 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2319">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2320">**queue_max** 큐 크기에 대한 새 값입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2320">**queue_max** New value for the queue size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2321">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2321">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2322">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 원시 수신 큐의 최대 깊이를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2322">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set raw receive queue maximum depth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2323">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 제어 블록 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2325">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2325">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2326">초기화 및 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2326">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2327">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2327">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2328">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2328">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2329">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2329">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG queue_max = 10;

/* Set the maximum size of the IP raw packet receive queue. */
status = nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set (&ip_0,
                                          queue_max);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the maximum size of the IP raw packet
   receive queue was successfully set. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2334">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2334">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2335">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2335">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2336">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2336">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2338">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2338">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_static_route_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2339">nx_ip_static_route_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2339">nx_ip_static_route_add</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2340">라우팅 테이블에 고정 경로 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2340">Add static route to the routing table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2341">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2341">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_static_route_add(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG network_address,
    ULONG net_mask,
    ULONG next_hop);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2342">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2343">이 서비스는 고정 라우팅 테이블에 항목을 추가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2343">This service adds an entry to the static routing table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2344">로컬 네트워크 디바이스 중 하나에서 *next_hop* 주소에 직접 액세스할 수 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2344">Note that the *next_hop* address must be directly accessible from one of the local network devices.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2345">이 서비스를 사용하려면 ip_ptr이 유효한 NetX Duo IP 구조를 가리켜야 하며 NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING이 정의된 상태로 NetX Duo 라이브러리가 빌드되어 있어야 합니다. 기본적으로 NetX Duo는 NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING이 정의되지 않은 상태로 빌드됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2345">*Note that ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure and the NetX Duo library must be built with NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined to use this service. By default NetX Duo is built without NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2346">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2346">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2347">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2347">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2348">**network_address** 대상 네트워크 주소입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2348">**network_address** Target network address, in host byte order</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2349">**net_mask** 대상 네트워크 마스크입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2349">**net_mask** Target network mask, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2350">**next_hop** 대상 네트워크의 다음 홉 주소입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2350">**next_hop** Next hop address for the target network, in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2351">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2351">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2352">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 항목이 고정 라우팅 테이블에 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry is added to the static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2353">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 고정 라우팅 테이블이 꽉 찼습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2353">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Static routing table is full.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2354">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) 이 기능은 컴파일되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2354">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) This feature is not compiled in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2355">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 로컬 인터페이스를 통해 다음 홉에 직접 액세스할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2355">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Next hop is not directly accessible via local interfaces.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2356">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2356">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2357">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 ip_ptr 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2357">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2358">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2358">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2359">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2359">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2360">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2360">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2361">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2361">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2362">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2362">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Specify the next hop for 192.168.1.68 through the gateway
   192.168.1.1. */
status = nx_ip_static_route_add(ip_ptr, IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,0),
                                0xFFFFFF00UL,
                                IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,1));

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the route was successfully added to the
   static routing table. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2367">nx_ip_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2367">nx_ip_info_get</span></span>
