- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2371">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2371">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2372">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2372">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2373">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2373">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_static_route_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2374">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2374">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2375">라우팅 테이블에서 고정 경로 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2375">Delete static route from routing table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2376">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2376">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_static_route_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG network_address,
    ULONG net_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2377">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2378">이 서비스는 고정 라우팅 테이블에서 항목을 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2378">This service deletes an entry from the static routing table.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2379">이 서비스를 사용하려면 ip_ptr이 유효한 NetX Duo IP 구조를 가리켜야 하며 NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING이 정의된 상태로 NetX Duo 라이브러리가 빌드되어 있어야 합니다. 기본적으로 NetX Duo는 NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING이 정의되지 않은 상태로 빌드됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2379">*Note that ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure and the NetX Duo library must be built with NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined to use this service. By default NetX Duo is built without NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2380">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2380">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2381">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2381">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2382">**network_address** 대상 네트워크 주소입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2382">**network_address** Target network address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2383">**net_mask** 대상 네트워크 마스크입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2383">**net_mask** Target network mask, in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2384">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2384">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2385">**NX_SUCCESS**(0X00) 고정 라우팅 테이블에서 성공적으로 삭제되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2385">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful deletion from the static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2386">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL**(0X43) 라우팅 테이블에서 항목을 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2386">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Entry cannot be found in the routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2387">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) 이 기능은 컴파일되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2387">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) This feature is not compiled in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2388">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 ip_ptr 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2388">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2389">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2389">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2390">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2390">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2391">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2391">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2392">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2392">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2393">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2393">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2394">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2394">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Remove the static route for 192.168.1.68 from the routing
   table.*/
status = nx_ip_static_route_delete(ip_ptr,
                                   IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,0),
                                   0xFFFFFF00UL,);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the route was successfully removed from
   the static routing table. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2395">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2395">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2396">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2396">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2397">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2397">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2398">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2398">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2399">nx_ip_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2399">nx_ip_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2400">nx_ip_static_route_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2400">nx_ip_static_route_add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2401">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2401">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2402">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2402">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2403">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2403">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2404">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2404">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2405">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2405">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_status_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2406">nx_ip_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2406">nx_ip_status_check</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2407">IP 인스턴스의 상태 확인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2407">Check status of an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2408">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2408">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_status_check(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG needed_status,
    ULONG *actual_status,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2409">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2409">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2410">이 서비스는 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스의 기본 네트워크 인터페이스 상태를 확인하고 선택적으로 지정된 상태가 될 때까지 대기합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2410">This service checks and optionally waits for the specified status of the primary network interface of a previously created IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2411">보조 인터페이스에 대한 상태를 가져오려면 애플리케이션은 ***nx_ip_interface_status_check*** 서비스를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2411">To obtain status on secondary interfaces, applications shall use the service ***nx_ip_interface_status_check.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2412">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2412">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2413">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2413">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2414">**needed_status** 요청된 IP 상태이며 다음과 같이 비트맵 형식으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2414">**needed_status** IP status requested, defined in bit-map form as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2415">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE**(0x0001)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2415">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2416">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED**(0x0002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2416">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2417">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED**(0x0004)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2417">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2418">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED**(0x0008)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2418">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2419">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED**(0x0010)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2419">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2420">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED**(0x0020)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2420">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2421">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED**(0x0040)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2421">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2422">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE**(0x0080)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2422">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2423">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED**(0x0100)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2423">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2424">**actual_status** 설정된 실제 비트 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2424">**actual_status** Pointer to destination of actual bits set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2425">**wait_option** 요청된 상태 비트를 사용할 수 없는 경우 서비스가 작동하는 방식을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2425">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the requested status bits are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2426">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2426">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2427">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2427">**NX_NO_WAIT** 0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2428">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2428">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2429">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2429">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2430">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2430">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2431">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 상태 확인에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2431">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP status check.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2432">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL**(0x43) 지정된 시간 제한 내에 상태 요청이 충족되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2432">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Status request was not satisfied within the timeout specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2433">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었거나 잘못된 상태였거나, 실제 상태 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2433">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP pointer is or has become invalid, or actual status pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2434">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**(0x0a) 필요한 상태 옵션이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2434">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid needed status option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2436">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2436">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2437">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2437">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2438">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2438">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2439">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2439">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2440">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2440">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 10 ticks for the link up status on the previously created IP
   instance. */
status = nx_ip_status_check(&ip_0, NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED,
                            &actual_status, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link for the specified IP instance
   is up. */
```

## <a name="nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2465">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2465">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2466">인터페이스를 통해 IP 인스턴스를 지정된 멀티캐스트 그룹에 조인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2466">Join IP instance to specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2467">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2467">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2468">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2468">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2469">이 서비스는 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스를 통해 IP 인스턴스를 지정된 멀티캐스트 그룹에 조인합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2469">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2470">IP 인스턴스가 멀티캐스트 그룹에 조인하면 IP 수신 논리는 지정된 멀티캐스트 그룹에서 상위 계층으로 데이터 패킷을 전달하기 시작합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2470">Once the IP instance joins a multicast group, the IP receive logic starts to forward data packets from the give multicast group to the upper layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2471">이 서비스는 IGMP 보고서를 보내지 않고 멀티캐스트 그룹에 조인합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2471">Note that this service joins a multicast group without sending IGMP reports.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2472">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2472">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2473">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2473">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2474">**group_address** 조인할 클래스 D IP 멀티캐스트 그룹 주소입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2474">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2475">**interface_index** NetX Duo 인스턴스에 연결된 인터페이스 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2475">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2476">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2476">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2477">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 멀티캐스트 그룹 조인에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2477">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2478">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**(0x17) 멀티캐스트 그룹을 더 이상 조인할 수 없습니다. 최대값이 초과되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2478">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2479">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터가 잘못되었거나 IP 인스턴스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP instance, or the IP instance is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2481">**NX_NOT_EANABLED**(0X14) 이 IP 인스턴스에서 IGMP를 사용하도록 설정하지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2481">**NX_NOT_EANABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled in this IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2482">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 제공된 멀티캐스트 그룹 주소가 잘못된 클래스 D 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2482">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2483">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 디바이스 인덱스가 잘못된 네트워크 인터페이스를 가리킵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2483">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2484">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2484">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2485">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2485">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2486">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2486">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2487">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2487">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2488">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2488">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance joins the multicast group
   224.0.0.200, via the interface at index 1 in the IP interface
   list. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join
                                 (&ip IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200),
                                  INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully joined
   the multicast group. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2492">nx_igmp_loopback_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2492">nx_igmp_loopback_enable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2493">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2493">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2494">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2494">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2496">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2496">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2497">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2497">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2498">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2498">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2499">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2499">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2500">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2500">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2501">인터페이스를 통해 지정된 멀티캐스트 그룹 탈퇴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2501">Leave specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2502">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2502">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2503">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2503">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2504">이 서비스는 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스를 통해 지정된 멀티캐스트 그룹에서 탈퇴합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2504">This service leaves the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2505">이 서비스는 그룹에서 탈퇴한 난 후에 IGMP 메시지가 생성되도록 트리거하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2505">After leaving the group, this service does not trigger IGMP messages being generated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2506">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2506">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2507">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2507">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2508">**group_address** 탈퇴할 클래스 D IP 멀티캐스트 그룹 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2508">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to leave.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2509">IP 주소는 호스트 바이트 순서로 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2509">The IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2510">**interface_index** NetX Duo 인스턴스에 연결된 인터페이스 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2510">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2511">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2511">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2512">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 멀티캐스트 그룹 조인에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2512">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2513">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**(0x16) 로컬 멀티캐스트 테이블에서 지정된 멀티캐스트 그룹 주소를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2513">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) The specified multicast group address cannot be found in the local multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2514">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 디바이스 인덱스가 잘못된 네트워크 인터페이스를 가리킵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2514">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2515">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 제공된 멀티캐스트 그룹 주소가 잘못된 클래스 D 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2515">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2516">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2516">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2517">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터가 잘못되었거나 IP 인스턴스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2517">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP instance, or the IP instance is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2518">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2518">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2519">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2519">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2520">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2520">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2521">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2521">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2522">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2522">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Leave the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave
                                (&ip, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200),
                                 INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully leaves
   the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2534">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2534">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2536">지정된 풀에서 패킷 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2536">Allocate packet from specified pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2537">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2537">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_allocate(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG packet_type,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2538">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2539">이 서비스는 지정된 풀의 패킷을 할당하고 지정된 패킷의 유형에 따라 패킷의 앞에 추가 포인터를 조정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2539">This service allocates a packet from the specified pool and adjusts the prepend pointer in the packet according to the type of packet specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2540">사용할 수 있는 패킷이 없는 경우 제공된 대기 옵션에 따라 서비스가 일시 중단됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2540">If no packet is available, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2541">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2542">**pool_ptr** 이전에 만든 패킷 풀을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2542">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2543">**packet_ptr** 할당된 패킷 포인터의 포인터를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2543">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the Pointer of the allocated packet Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2544">**packet_type** 요청된 패킷의 유형을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2544">**packet_type** Defines the type of packet requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2545">지원되는 패킷 유형 목록은 3장의 63페이지에서 “패킷 풀”을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2545">See “Packet Pools” on page 63 in Chapter 3 for a list of supported packet types.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2546">**wait_option** 패킷 풀에서 사용할 수 있는 패킷이 없는 경우의 틱 단위 대기 시간을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2546">**wait_option** Defines the wait time in ticks if there are no packets available in the packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2547">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2547">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**(0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2550">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2550">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2551">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2551">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2552">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 패킷 할당에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2552">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet allocate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET**(0x01) 사용 가능한 패킷이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2554">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort 호출에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2554">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2555">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**(0x4D) 패킷 크기가 프로토콜을 지원할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2555">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2556">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**(0x0A) 잘못된 패킷 유형입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2556">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid packet type.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 풀 또는 패킷 반환 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or packet return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 비스레드의 대기 옵션이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2559">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2559">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2560">초기화, 스레드, 타이머 및 ISR(애플리케이션 네트워크 드라이버)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2560">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2561">ISR 또는 타이머 컨텍스트에서 사용되는 경우 대기 옵션은 NX_NO_WAIT여야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2561">Wait option must be *NX_NO_WAIT* when used in ISR or in timer context.</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2562">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2562">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2563">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2563">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2564">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2564">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Allocate a new UDP packet from the previously created packet pool
   and suspend for a maximum of 5 timer ticks if the pool is
   empty. */
status = nx_packet_allocate(&pool_0, &packet_ptr,
                            NX_UDP_PACKET, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the newly allocated packet pointer is
   found in the variable packet_ptr. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2577">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2577">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_copy"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2578">nx_packet_copy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2578">nx_packet_copy</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2579">패킷 복사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2579">Copy packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2580">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2580">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_copy(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **new_packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2581">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2581">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2582">이 서비스는 제공된 패킷 풀에서 할당된 하나 이상의 새 패킷에 제공된 패킷의 정보를 복사합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2582">This service copies the information in the supplied packet to one or more new packets that are allocated from the supplied packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2583">성공하면 새 패킷을 가리키는 포인터가 **new_packet_ptr** 에서 가리키는 대상에 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2583">If successful, the pointer to the new packet is returned in destination pointed to by **new_packet_ptr**.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2584">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2584">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2585">**packet_ptr** 원본 패킷을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2585">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2586">**new_packet_ptr** 패킷의 새 복사본에 대한 포인터를 반환할 위치 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2586">**new_packet_ptr** Pointer to the destination of where to return the pointer to the new copy of the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2587">**pool_ptr** 복사본에 대해 패킷을 하나 이상 할당하는 데 사용되는, 이전에 만든 패킷 풀을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2587">**pool_ptr** Pointer to the previously created packet pool that is used to allocate one or more packets for the copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2588">**wait_option** 사용할 수 있는 패킷이 없는 경우 서비스가 대기하는 방식을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2588">**wait_option** Defines how the service waits if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2589">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2589">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**(0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2592">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2592">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2593">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2593">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2594">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 패킷 복사에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2594">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2595">**NX_NO_PACKET**(0x01) 패킷을 복사할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2595">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Packet not available for copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2596">**NX_INVALID_PACKET**(0x12) 원본 패킷이 비어 있거나 복사하는 데 실패했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2596">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Empty source packet or copy failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2597">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort 호출에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2597">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2598">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**(0x4D) 패킷 크기가 프로토콜을 지원할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2598">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 풀, 패킷 또는 대상 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW**(0x02) 잘못된 패킷 앞에 추가 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 잘못된 패킷 뒤에 추가 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet append pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 초기화 또는 ISR에 대기 옵션이 지정되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) A wait option was specified in initialization or in an ISR.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2603">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2603">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2604">초기화, 스레드, 타이머 및 ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2604">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2605">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2605">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2606">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2606">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2607">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2607">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET *new_copy_ptr;

/* Copy packet pointed to by "old_packet_ptr" using packets from
   previously created packet pool_0. */
status = nx_packet_copy(old_packet, &new_copy_ptr, &pool_0, 20);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, new_copy_ptr points to the packet copy. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_append"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2622">패킷 끝에 데이터 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2622">Append data to end of packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2623">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2623">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_append(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *data_start, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2624">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2624">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2625">이 서비스는 지정된 패킷 끝에 데이터를 추가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2625">This service appends data to the end of the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2626">제공된 데이터 영역은 패킷으로 복사됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2626">The supplied data area is copied into the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2627">사용할 수 있는 메모리가 부족하며 연결된 패킷 기능이 사용하도록 설정된 경우 패킷을 하나 이상 할당하여 요청을 충족합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2627">If there is not enough memory available, and the chained packet feature is enabled, one or more packets will be allocated to satisfy the request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2628">연결된 패킷 기능이 사용하도록 설정되지 않는 경우 NX_SIZE_ERROR가 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2628">If the chained packet feature is not enabled, *NX_SIZE_ERROR* is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2629">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2629">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2630">**packet_ptr** 패킷 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2630">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2631">**data_start** 패킷 뒤에 추가할 사용자 데이터 영역 시작 부분을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2631">**data_start** Pointer to the start of the user’s data area to append to the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2632">**data_size** 사용자 데이터 영역 크기입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2632">**data_size** Size of user’s data area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2633">**pool_ptr** 현재 패킷에 공간이 충분하지 않은 경우 다른 패킷을 할당할 패킷 풀을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2633">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool from which to allocate another packet if there is not enough room in the current packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2634">**wait_option** 사용할 수 있는 패킷이 없는 경우 서비스가 작동하는 방식을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2634">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2635">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2635">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**(0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2638">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2638">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2639">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2640">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 패킷 뒤에 추가에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2640">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet append.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET**(0x01) 사용 가능한 패킷이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort 호출에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2643">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**(0x4D) 패킷 크기가 프로토콜을 지원할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2643">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2644">**NX_UNDERFLOW**(0x02) 앞에 추가 포인터가 페이로드 시작보다 먼저입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2644">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2645">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 뒤에 추가 포인터가 페이로드 종료보다 나중입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2645">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 풀, 패킷 또는 데이터 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or data Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2647">**NX_SIZE_ERROR**(0x09) 잘못된 데이터 크기입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2647">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid data size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 비스레드의 대기 옵션이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2649">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2649">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2650">초기화, 스레드, 타이머 및 ISR(애플리케이션 네트워크 드라이버)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2650">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2651">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2651">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2652">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2652">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2653">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2653">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Append "abcd" to the specified packet. */
status = nx_packet_data_append(packet_ptr, "abcd", 4, &pool_0, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the additional four bytes "abcd" have
   been appended to the packet. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_extract_offset"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2668">오프셋을 통해 패킷에서 데이터 추출</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2668">Extract data from packet via an offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2669">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2669">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_extract_offset(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG offset,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG buffer_length,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2670">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2670">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2671">이 서비스는 패킷 앞에 추가 포인터의 지정된 오프셋에서 시작하여 지정된 크기(바이트)의 NetX Duo 패킷(또는 패킷 체인) 데이터를 지정된 버퍼에 복사합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2671">This service copies data from a NetX Duo packet (or packet chain) starting at the specified offset from the packet prepend pointer of the specified size in bytes into the specified buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2672">실제로 복사된 바이트 수는 *bytes_copied* 로 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2672">The number of bytes actually copied is returned in *bytes_copied.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2673">이 서비스는 패킷에서 데이터를 제거하지 않으며 앞에 추가 포인터 또는 다른 내부 상태 정보도 조정하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2673">This service does not remove data from the packet, nor does it adjust the prepend pointer or other internal state information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2674">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2674">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2675">**packet_ptr** 추출할 패킷을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2675">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2676">**offset** 현재 앞에 추가 포인터의 오프셋입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2676">**offset** Offset from the current prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2677">**buffer_start** 저장 버퍼 시작 부분을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2677">**buffer_start** Pointer to start of save buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2678">**buffer_length** 복사할 바이트 수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2678">**buffer_length** Number of bytes to copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2679">**bytes_copied** 실제로 복사된 바이트 수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2679">**bytes_copied** Number of bytes actually copied</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2680">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2680">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2681">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 패킷 복사에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2681">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2682">**NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR**(0x53) 잘못된 오프셋 값을 제공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2682">**NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR** (0x53) Invalid offset value was supplied</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 패킷 포인터 또는 버퍼 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer or buffer pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2684">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2684">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2685">초기화, 스레드, 타이머 및 ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2685">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2686">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2686">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2687">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2687">No</span></span>

```c
/* Extract 10 bytes from the start of the received packet buffer
   into the specified memory area. */
status = nx_packet_data_extract_offset(my_packet, 0, &data[0], 10,
                                       &bytes_copied) ;
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, 10 bytes were successfully copied into
   the data buffer. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_retrieve"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2702">패킷에서 데이터 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2702">Retrieve data from packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2703">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2703">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_retrieve(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2704">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2705">이 서비스는 제공된 패킷의 데이터를 제공된 버퍼에 복사합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2705">This service copies data from the supplied packet into the supplied buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2706">복사된 실제 바이트 수는 **bytes_copied** 가 가리키는 대상에 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2706">The actual number of bytes copied is returned in the destination pointed to by **bytes_copied**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2707">이 서비스는 패킷의 내부 상태를 변경하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2707">Note that this service does not change internal state of the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2708">검색되는 데이터는 패킷에서 계속 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2708">The data being retrieved is still available in the packet.</span></span> 

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2709">대상 버퍼는 패킷 콘텐츠를 포함할 수 있도록 크기가 충분히 커야 합니다. 그렇지 않으면 메모리가 손상되어 예기치 않은 결과가 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2709">*The destination buffer must be large enough to hold the packet's contents. If not, memory will be corrupted causing unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2710">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2710">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2711">**packet_ptr** 원본 패킷을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2711">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2712">**buffer_start** 버퍼 영역의 시작 부분을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2712">**buffer_start** Pointer to the start of the buffer area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2713">**bytes_copied** 복사된 바이트 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2713">**bytes_copied** Pointer to the destination for the number of bytes copied.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2714">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2714">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2715">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 패킷 데이터 검색에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2715">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet data retrieve.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2716">**NX_INVALID_PACKET**(0x12) 잘못된 패킷입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2716">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Invalid packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 패킷, 버퍼 시작 또는 복사된 바이트 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet, buffer start, or bytes copied pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2718">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2718">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2719">초기화, 스레드, 타이머 및 ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2719">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2720">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2720">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2721">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2721">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2722">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2722">Example</span></span>

```c
UCHAR                 buffer[512];
ULONG                 bytes_copied;

/* Retrieve data from packet pointed to by "packet_ptr". */
status = nx_packet_data_retrieve(packet_ptr, buffer, &bytes_copied);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, buffer contains the contents of the
   packet, the size of which is contained in "bytes_copied." */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2729">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2729">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2730">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2730">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2731">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2731">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2732">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2732">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2733">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2733">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2734">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2734">nx_packet_release</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2735">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2735">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_length_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2737">패킷 데이터의 길이 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2737">Get length of packet data</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2738">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2738">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_length_get(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr, 
    ULONG *length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2739">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2739">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2740">이 서비스는 지정된 패킷에서 데이터의 길이를 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2740">This service gets the length of the data in the specified packet.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2741">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2741">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2742">**packet_ptr** 패킷을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2742">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2743">**length** 패킷 길이 대상입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2743">**length** Destination for the packet length.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2744">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2744">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2745">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 패킷 길이를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2745">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet length get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 패킷 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2747">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2747">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2748">초기화, 스레드, 타이머 및 ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2748">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2749">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2749">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2750">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2750">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2751">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2751">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the length of the data in "my_packet." */
status = nx_packet_length_get(my_packet, &my_length);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, data length is in "my_length". */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2766">지정된 메모리 영역에 패킷 풀 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2766">Create packet pool in specified memory area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2767">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2767">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_create(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG payload_size,
    VOID *memory_ptr,
    ULONG memory_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2768">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2768">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2769">이 서비스는 사용자가 제공한 메모리 영역에 지정된 패킷 크기의 패킷 풀을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2769">This service creates a packet pool of the specified packet size in the memory area supplied by the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2770">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2770">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2771">**pool_ptr** 패킷 풀 제어 블록을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2771">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2772">**name** 패킷 풀의 애플리케이션 이름을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2772">**name** Pointer to application’s name for the packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2773">**payload_size** 풀에 있는 각 패킷의 바이트 수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2773">**payload_size** Number of bytes in each packet in the pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2774">이 값은 40바이트 이상이어야 하며 4로 균등하게 나뉘어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2774">This value must be at least 40 bytes and must also be evenly divisible by 4.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2775">**memory_ptr** 패킷 풀을 배치할 메모리 영역을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2775">**memory_ptr** Pointer to the memory area to place the packet pool in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2776">이 포인터는 ULONG 경계에 맞춰야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2776">The pointer should be aligned on an ULONG boundary.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2777">**memory_size** 풀 메모리 영역의 크기입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2777">**memory_size** Size of the pool memory area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2778">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2778">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2779">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 패킷 풀을 만드는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2779">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 풀 또는 메모리 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR**(0x09) 잘못된 블록 또는 메모리 크기입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid block or memory size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2783">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2783">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2784">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2784">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2785">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2785">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2786">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2786">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2787">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2787">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a packet pool of 32000 bytes starting at physical
   address 0x10000000. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, "Default Pool", 128,
                               (void *) 0x10000000, 32000);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet pool has been successfully
   created. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2802">이전에 만든 패킷 풀 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2802">Delete previously created packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2803">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2803">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT  nx_packet_pool_delete(NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2804">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2804">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2805">이 서비스는 이전에 만든 패킷 풀을 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2805">This service deletes a previously created packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2806">NetX는 패킷 풀의 패킷에서 현재 일시 중단된 스레드가 있는지 확인하고 일시 중단을 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2806">NetX Duo checks for any threads currently suspended on packets in the packet pool and clears the suspension.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2807">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2807">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2808">**pool_ptr** 패킷 풀 제어 블록 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2808">**pool_ptr** Packet pool control block pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2809">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2809">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2810">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 패킷 풀 삭제에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2811">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 풀 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2811">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2813">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2813">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2814">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2814">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2815">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2815">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2816">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2816">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2817">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2817">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created packet pool. */
status = nx_packet_pool_delete(&pool_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet pool has been successfully
   deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2832">패킷 풀에 대한 정보 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2832">Retrieve information about a packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2833">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2833">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_info_get(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG *total_packets,
    ULONG *free_packets,
    ULONG *empty_pool_requests,
    ULONG *empty_pool_suspensions,
    ULONG *invalid_packet_releases);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2834">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2834">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2835">이 서비스는 지정된 패킷 풀에 대한 정보를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2835">This service retrieves information about the specified packet pool.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2836">대상 포인터가 NX_NULL이면 해당 특정 정보가 호출자에게 반환되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2836">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2837">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2838">**pool_ptr** 이전에 만든 패킷 풀을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2838">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2839">**total_packets** 풀의 총 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2839">**total_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of packets in the pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2840">**free_packets** 현재 사용 가능한 총 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2840">**free_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of currently free packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2841">**empty_pool_requests** 풀이 비어 있는 경우의 총 할당 요청 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2841">**empty_pool_requests** Pointer to destination of the total number of allocation requests when the pool was empty.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** 비어 있는 풀의 총 일시 중단 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** Pointer to destination of the total number of empty pool suspensions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** 잘못된 총 패킷 해제 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid packet releases.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2844">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2844">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2845">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 패킷 풀 정보를 검색하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2845">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2848">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2849">초기화, 스레드 및 타이머</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2849">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2850">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2850">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2851">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2851">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2852">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2852">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve packet pool information. */
status = nx_packet_pool_info_get(&pool_0,
                                 &total_packets,
                                 &free_packets,
                                 &empty_pool_requests,
                                 &empty_pool_suspensions,
                                 &invalid_packet_releases);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, packet pool information was
   retrieved. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2857">nx_packet_data_append</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2857">nx_packet_data_append</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2859">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2859">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2864">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2864">nx_packet_release</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2865">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2865">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2867">패킷 풀 하위 워터마크 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2867">Set packet pool low watermark</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2868">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2868">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG low_watermark);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2869">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2869">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2870">이 서비스는 지정된 패킷 풀에 대한 하위 워터마크를 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2870">This service configures the low watermark for the specified packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2871">하위 워터마크 값이 설정되면 패킷 풀의 사용 가능한 패킷 수가 패킷 풀의 하위 워터마크보다 작은 경우 TCP 또는 UDP가 수신된 패킷을 큐에 대기하지 않으므로 패킷 풀에서 패킷이 고갈되지 않게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2871">Once the low watermark value is set, TCP or UDP will not queue up the received packets if the number of available packets in the packet pool is less than the packet pool's low watermark, preventing the packet pool from being starved of packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2872">이 서비스는 ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** 옵션을 정의한 상태로 Netx Duo 라이브러리를 빌드한 경우에 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2872">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2873">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2873">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2874">**pool_ptr** 패킷 풀 제어 블록을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2874">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2875">**low_watermark** 구성할 하위 워터마크 값입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2875">**low_watermark** Low watermark value to be configured</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2876">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2876">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2877">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 하위 워터마크 값을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the low watermark value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) 하위 워터마크 기능은 Netx Duo에 기본 제공되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The low watermark feature is not built into NetX Duo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 풀 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2881">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2881">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2882">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2882">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2883">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2883">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2884">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2884">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2885">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2885">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set pool_0 low watermark value to 2. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, 2);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the low watermark value is set for
   pool_0.*/
```
