## <a name="nx_packet_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2899">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2899">nx_packet_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2900">이전에 할당된 패킷 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2900">Release previously allocated packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2901">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2902">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2903">이 서비스는 지정된 패킷에 연결된 추가 패킷을 포함하여 패킷을 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2903">This service releases a packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2904">다른 스레드가 패킷 할당에서 차단된 경우 이 서비스가 해당 패킷에 제공되고 계속 진행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2904">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2905">패킷을 두 번 이상 해제하면 예기치 않은 결과가 발생할 수 있으므로 애플리케이션은 패킷을 한 번만 해제하도록 해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2905">*The application must prevent releasing a packet more than once, because doing so will cause unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2906">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2906">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2907">**packet_ptr** 패킷 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2907">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2908">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2908">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2909">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 패킷 해제에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 패킷 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW**(0x02) 앞에 추가 포인터가 페이로드 시작보다 먼저입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 뒤에 추가 포인터가 페이로드 종료보다 나중입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2913">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2913">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2914">초기화, 스레드, 타이머 및 ISR(애플리케이션 네트워크 드라이버)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2914">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2915">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2915">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2916">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2916">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2917">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2917">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet. */
status = nx_packet_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet has been returned to the
   packet pool it was allocated from. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2929">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2929">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2930">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2930">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_transmit_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2932">전송된 패킷 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2932">Release a transmitted packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2933">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2933">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_transmit_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2934">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2934">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2935">TCP가 아닌 패킷의 경우 이 서비스는 지정된 패킷에 연결된 추가 패킷을 포함하여 전송된 패킷을 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2935">For non-TCP packets, this service releases a transmitted packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2936">다른 스레드가 패킷 할당에서 차단된 경우 이 서비스가 해당 패킷에 제공되고 계속 진행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2936">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2937">전송된 TCP 패킷의 경우 패킷이 전송 중으로 표시되지만 패킷이 확인될 때까지 해제되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2937">For a transmitted TCP packet, the packet is marked as being transmitted but not released till the packet is acknowledged.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2938">이 서비스는 일반적으로 패킷이 전송된 후 애플리케이션 네트워크 드라이버에서 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2938">This service is typically called from the application's network driver after a packet is transmitted.</span></span>

> [!WARNING] 
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2939">네트워크 드라이버는 이 서비스를 호출하기 전에 실제 미디어 헤더를 제거하고 패킷 길이를 조정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2939">*The network driver should remove the physical media header and adjust the length of the packet before calling this service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2940">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2940">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2941">**packet_ptr** 패킷 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2941">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2942">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2942">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2943">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 전송 패킷 해제에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 패킷 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW**(0x02) 앞에 추가 포인터가 페이로드 시작보다 먼저입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 뒤에 추가 포인터가 페이로드 종료보다 나중입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2947">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2947">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2948">초기화, 스레드, 타이머, 애플리케이션 네트워크 드라이버(ISR 포함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2948">Initialization, threads, timers, Application network drivers (including ISRs)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2949">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2949">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2950">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2950">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2951">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2951">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet that was just transmitted
   from the application network driver. */
status = nx_packet_transmit_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the transmitted packet has been
   returned to the packet pool it was allocated from. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2963">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2963">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2966">RARP(역주소 확인 프로토콜)를 사용하지 않도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2966">Disable Reverse Address Resolution Protocol (RARP)</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2968">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2968">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2969">이 서비스는 특정 IP 인스턴스에 대해 NetX Duo의 RARP 구성 요소를 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2969">This service disables the RARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2970">멀티홈 시스템의 경우 이 서비스는 모든 인터페이스에서 RARP를 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2970">For a multihome  system, this service disables RARP on all interfaces.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2971">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2971">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2972">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2972">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2973">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2973">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2974">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) RARP를 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2974">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2975">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) RARP가 사용하지 않도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2975">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) RARP was not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2976">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2976">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2977">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2977">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2978">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2978">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2979">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2979">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2980">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2980">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2981">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2981">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2982">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2982">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable RARP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_rarp_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP is disabled. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2983">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2983">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="nx_rarp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2987">RARP(역주소 확인 프로토콜)를 사용하도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2987">Enable Reverse Address Resolution Protocol (RARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2988">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2988">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2989">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2989">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-2990">이 서비스는 특정 IP 인스턴스에 대해 NetX Duo의 RARP 구성 요소를 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2990">This service enables the RARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2991">RARP 구성 요소는 모든 연결된 네트워크 인터페이스에서 0으로 된 IP 주소를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2991">The RARP components searches through all attached network interfaces for zero IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2992">0으로 된 IP 주소는 인터페이스에 IP 주소 할당이 아직 없는 것을 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2992">A zero IP address indicates the interface does not have IP address assignment yet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2993">RARP는 해당 인터페이스에서 RARP 프로세스를 사용하도록 설정하여 IP 주소를 확인하려고 시도합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2993">RARP attempts to resolve the IP address by enabling RARP process on that interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2994">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2994">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2995">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2995">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-2996">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2997">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) RARP를 사용하도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IP 주소가 이미 유효합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP address is already valid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**(0x15) RARP가 이미 사용하도록 설정되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) RARP was already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3001">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3001">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3002">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3002">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3003">초기화, 스레드, 타이머</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3003">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3004">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3004">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3005">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3005">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3006">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3006">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable RARP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_rarp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP is enabled and is attempting to
   resolve this IP instance’s address by querying the network. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3007">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3007">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="nx_rarp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3011">RARP 활동에 대한 정보 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3011">Retrieve information about RARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3012">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3012">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *rarp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *rarp_responses_received,
    ULONG *rarp_invalid_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3013">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3013">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3014">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스의 RARP 활동에 대한 정보를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3014">This service retrieves information about RARP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3015">대상 포인터가 NX_NULL이면 해당 특정 정보가 호출자에게 반환되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3015">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3016">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3016">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3017">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3017">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3018">**rarp_requests_sent** 송신된 총 RARP 요청 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3018">**rarp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP requests sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3019">**rarp_responses_received** 수신된 총 RARP 응답 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3019">**rarp_responses_received** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages** 잘못된 총 메시지 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3021">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3022">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) RARP 정보 검색에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3022">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3025">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3025">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3026">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3026">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3027">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3027">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3028">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3028">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3029">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3029">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3030">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3030">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve RARP information from previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_rarp_info_get(&ip_0,
                          &rarp_requests_sent,
                          &rarp_responses_received,
                          &rarp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_system_initialize"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3034">nx_system_initialize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3034">nx_system_initialize</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3035">NetX Duo 시스템 초기화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3035">Initialize NetX Duo System</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3036">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3036">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
VOID nx_system_initialize(VOID);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3037">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3037">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3038">이 서비스는 사용을 위한 준비로 기본 NetX Duo 시스템 리소스를 초기화합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3038">This service initializes the basic NetX Duo system resources in preparation for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3039">초기화 중 다른 NetX Duo 호출이 수행되기 전에 애플리케이션에서 이 서비스가 호출되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3039">It should be called by the application during initialization and before any other NetX Duo call are made.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3040">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3040">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3041">None</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3041">None</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3042">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3042">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3043">None</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3043">None</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3044">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3044">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3045">초기화, 스레드, 타이머, ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3045">Initialization, threads, timers, ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3046">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3046">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3047">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3047">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3048">시스템 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3048">System Management</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3049">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3049">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Initialize NetX Duo for operation. */
nx_system_initialize();

/* At this point, NetX Duo is ready for IP creation and all
   subsequent network operations. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3075">클라이언트 TCP 소켓을 TCP 포트에 바인딩</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3075">Bind client TCP socket to TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3076">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3076">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3077">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3077">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3078">이 서비스는 이전에 만든 TCP 클라이언트 소켓을 지정된 TCP 포트에 바인딩합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3078">This service binds the previously created TCP client socket to the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3079">유효한 TCP 소켓 범위는 0에서 0xFFFF까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3079">Valid TCP sockets range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3080">지정된 TCP 포트를 사용할 수 없는 경우 제공된 대기 옵션에 따라 서비스가 일시 중단됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3080">If the specified TCP port is unavailable, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3081">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3081">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3082">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 TCP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3082">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3083">**port** 바인딩할 포트 번호(1-0xFFFF)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3083">**port Port** number to bind (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3084">포트 번호가 NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000)인 경우 IP 인스턴스는 가능한 다음 포트를 검색하여 바인딩에 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3084">If port number is NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000), the IP instance will search for the next free port and use that for the binding.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3085">**wait_option** 포트가 이미 다른 소켓에 바인딩되어 있는 경우 서비스가 작동하는 방식을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3085">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the port is already bound to another socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3086">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3086">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**(0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3089">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3089">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3090">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3090">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3091">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓 바인딩에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3091">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND**(0x22) 이 소켓은 다른 TCP 포트에 이미 바인딩되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) This socket is already bound to another TCP port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3093">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE**(0x23) 포트가 이미 다른 소켓에 바인딩되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3093">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) Port is already bound to a different socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS**(0x45) 사용 가능한 포트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3095">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort 호출에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3095">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3096">**NX_INVALID_PORT**(0x46) 잘못된 포트입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3096">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3098">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3098">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3100">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3100">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3101">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3101">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3102">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3102">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3103">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3103">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3104">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3104">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Bind a previously created client socket to port 12 and wait for 7
   timer ticks for the bind to complete. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(&client_socket, 12, 7);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created client_socket is
   bound to port 12 on the associated IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3129">클라이언트 TCP 소켓 연결</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3129">Connect client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3130">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3130">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3131">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3131">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3132">이 서비스는 이전에 만든 바인딩된 TCP 클라이언트 소켓을 지정된 서버 포트에 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3132">This service connects the previously created and bound TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3133">유효한 TCP 서버 포트의 범위는 0에서 0xFFFF까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3133">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3134">연결이 즉시 완료되지 않으면 제공된 대기 옵션에 따라 서비스가 일시 중단됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3134">If the connection does not complete immediately, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3135">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3136">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 TCP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3136">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3137">**server_ip** 서버의 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3137">**server_ip** Server’s IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3138">**server_port** 연결할 서버 포트 번호\*\*(1-0xFFFF)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3138">**server_port** Server port number to connect to\*\* (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3139">**wait_option** 연결이 설정되는 동안 서비스가 작동하는 방식을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3139">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3140">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3140">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**(0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3143">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3143">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3144">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3144">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3145">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓 연결에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3146">**NX_NOT_BOUND**(0x24) 소켓이 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3147">**NX_NOT_CLOSED**(0x35) 소켓이 닫힘 상태가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3147">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS**(0x37) 대기하도록 지정되지 않았으며, 연결하려고 시도하는 중입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, the connection attempt is in progress.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3149">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 잘못된 인터페이스가 제공되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3149">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface supplied.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3150">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort 호출에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3150">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 잘못된 서버 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3152">**NX_INVALID_PORT**(0x46) 잘못된 포트입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3152">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3153">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3153">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3154">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3154">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3155">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3155">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3156">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3156">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3157">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3157">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3158">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3158">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3159">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3159">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3160">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3160">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Initiate a TCP connection from a previously created and bound
   client socket. The connection requested in this example is to
   port 12 on the server with the IP address of 1.2.3.5. This
   service will wait 300 timer ticks for the connection to take
   place before giving up. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(&client_socket,
                                      IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5),
                                      12, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created and bound
   client_socket is connected to port 12 on IP 1.2.3.5. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3185">클라이언트 TCP 소켓에 바인딩된 포트 번호 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3185">Get port number bound to client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3186">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3186">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT *port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3187">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3187">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3188">이 서비스는 소켓에 연결된 포트 번호를 검색합니다. 소켓이 바인딩될 때 NX_ANY_PORT가 지정된 경우 NetX Duo에서 할당한 포트를 찾는 데 유용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3188">This service retrieves the port number associated with the socket, which is useful to find the port allocated by NetX Duo in situations where the NX_ANY_PORT was specified at the time the socket was bound.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3189">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3190">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 TCP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3190">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3191">**port_ptr** 반환 포트 번호 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3191">**port_ptr** Pointer to destination for the return port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3192">유효한 포트 번호는 (1-0xFFFF)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3192">Valid port numbers are (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3193">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3193">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3194">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓 바인딩에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3194">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3195">**NX_NOT_BOUND**(0x24) 이 소켓은 포트에 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3195">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) This socket is not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3196">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터 또는 포트 반환 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3196">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer or port return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3197">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3197">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3198">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3198">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3199">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3199">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3200">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3200">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3201">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3201">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3202">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3202">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3203">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3203">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the port number of previously created and bound client
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get(&client_socket, &port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the port variable contains the port this
   socket is bound to. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3227">nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3227">nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3228">TCP 포트에서 TCP 클라이언트 소켓 바인딩 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3228">Unbind TCP client socket from TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3229">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3229">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3230">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3230">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3231">이 서비스는 TCP 클라이언트 소켓과 TCP 포트 간에 바인딩을 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3231">This service releases the binding between the TCP client socket and a TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3232">다른 소켓을 동일한 포트 번호에 바인딩하려고 대기 중인 다른 스레드가 있는 경우 첫 번째 일시 중단된 스레드가 이 포트에 바인딩됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3232">If there are other threads waiting to bind another socket to the same port number, the first suspended thread is then bound to this port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3233">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3233">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3234">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 TCP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3234">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3235">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3235">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3236">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓을 바인딩 해제하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3236">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket unbind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3237">**NX_NOT_BOUND**(0x24) 소켓이 어떤 포트에도 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3237">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3238">**NX_NOT_CLOSED**(0x35) 소켓이 연결 해제되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3238">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket has not been disconnected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3239">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3239">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3240">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3240">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3241">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3241">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3242">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3243">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3243">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3244">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3244">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3245">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3245">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3246">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3246">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Unbind a previously created and bound client TCP socket. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind(&client_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is no longer
   bound. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3271">NetX Duo의 TCP 구성 요소를 사용하도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3271">Enable TCP component of NetX Duo</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3272">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3272">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3273">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3273">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3274">이 서비스는 NetX Duo의 TCP(Transmission Control Protocol) 구성 요소를 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3274">This service enables the Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) component of NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3275">사용하도록 설정하면 애플리케이션에서 TCP 연결을 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3275">After enabled, TCP connections may be established by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3276">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3276">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3277">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3277">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3278">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3278">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3279">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) TCP를 사용하도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3279">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**(0x15) TCP는 이미 사용하도록 설정되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) TCP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3283">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3283">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3284">초기화, 스레드, 타이머</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3284">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3285">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3285">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3286">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3286">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3287">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3287">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable TCP on a previously created IP instance ip_0. */
status = nx_tcp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP is enabled on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_free_port_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3312">사용할 수 있는 다음 TCP 포트 찾기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3312">Find next available TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3313">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3313">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_free_port_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT port,
    UINT *free_port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3314">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3314">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3315">이 서비스는 애플리케이션 제공 포트에서 시작하여 사용 가능한 TCP 포트(바인딩되지 않은 포트)를 찾으려고 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3315">This service attempts to locate a free TCP port (unbound) starting from the application supplied port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3316">검색에서 최대 포트 값인 0xFFFF에 도달하면 검색 논리가 래핑됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3316">The search logic will wrap around if the search happens to reach the maximum port value of 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3317">검색에 성공하면 *free_port_ptr* 이 가리키는 변수에 사용 가능한 포트가 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3317">If  the search is successful, the free port is returned in the variable pointed to by *free_port_ptr*.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3318">이 서비스는 다른 스레드에서 호출될 수 있으며 동일한 포트를 반환할 수 있습니다. 이러한 경합 상태를 방지하기 위해 애플리케이션은 이 서비스 및 실제 클라이언트 소켓 바인딩에 뮤텍스 보호가 적용되도록 할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3318">*This service can be called from another thread and have the same port returned. To prevent this race condition, the application may wish to place this service and the actual client socket bind under the protection of a mutex*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3319">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3319">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3320">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3320">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3321">**port** 검색을 시작할 포트 번호(1-0xFFFF)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3321">**port** Port number to start search at (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3322">**free_port_ptr** 사용 가능한 포트 반환 값 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3322">**free_port_ptr** Pointer to the destination free port return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3323">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3323">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3324">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 사용 가능한 포트를 찾는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3324">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful free port find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3325">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS**(0x45) 사용 가능한 포트를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3325">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free ports found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3326">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3326">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3327">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3327">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3328">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3328">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3329">**NX_INVALID_PORT**(0x46) 지정된 포트 번호가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3329">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) The specified port number is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3330">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3330">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3331">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3331">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3332">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3332">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3333">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3333">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3334">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3334">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Locate a free TCP port, starting at port 12, on a previously
   created IP instance. */
status = nx_tcp_free_port_find(&ip_0, 12, &free_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, "free_port" contains the next free port
   on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3359">TCP 활동에 대한 정보 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3359">Retrieve information about TCP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3360">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3360">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_received,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *tcp_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *tcp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *tcp_connections,
    ULONG *tcp_disconnections,
    ULONG *tcp_connections_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_retransmit_packets);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3361">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3361">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3362">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스의 TCP 활동에 대한 정보를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3362">This service retrieves information about TCP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3363">대상 포인터가 NX_NULL이면 해당 특정 정보가 호출자에게 반환되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3363">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3364">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3364">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3365">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3365">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3366">**tcp_packets_sent** 송신된 총 TCP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3366">**tcp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3367">**tcp_bytes_sent** 송신된 총 TCP 바이트 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3367">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3368">**tcp_packets_received** 수신된 총 TCP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3368">**tcp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3369">**tcp_bytes_received** 수신된 총 TCP 바이트 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3369">**tcp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3370">**tcp_invalid_packets** 잘못된 총 TCP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3370">**tcp_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid TCP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3371">**tcp_receive_packets_dropped** 삭제된 총 TCP 수신 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3371">**tcp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3372">**tcp_checksum_errors** 체크섬 오류가 있는 총 TCP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3372">**tcp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets with checksum errors.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3373">**tcp_connections** 총 TCP 연결 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3373">**tcp_connections** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP connections.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3374">**tcp_disconnections** 총 TCP 연결 해제 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3374">**tcp_disconnections** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP disconnections.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3375">**tcp_connections_dropped** 삭제된 총 TCP 연결 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3375">**tcp_connections_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP connections dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3376">**tcp_retransmit_packets** 재전송된 총 TCP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3376">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets retransmitted.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3377">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3377">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3378">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) TCP 정보 검색에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3378">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3379">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3379">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3380">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3380">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3381">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3381">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3382">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3382">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3383">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3383">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3384">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3384">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3385">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3385">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3386">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3386">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve TCP information from previously created IP Instance
   ip_0. */
status = nx_tcp_info_get(&ip_0,
                         &tcp_packets_sent,
                         &tcp_bytes_sent,
                         &tcp_packets_received,
                         &tcp_bytes_received,
                         &tcp_invalid_packets,
                         &tcp_receive_packets_dropped,
                         &tcp_checksum_errors,
                         &tcp_connections,
                         &tcp_disconnections
                         &tcp_connections_dropped,
                         &tcp_retransmit_packets);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_accept"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3411">TCP 연결 수락</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3411">Accept TCP connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3412">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3412">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3413">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3413">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3414">이 서비스는 이전에 수신 대기에 사용하도록 설정한 포트에 대한 TCP 클라이언트 소켓 연결 요청을 수락하거나 수락하기 위해 준비합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3414">This service accepts (or prepares to accept) a TCP client socket connection request for a port that was previously set up for listening.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3415">애플리케이션이 수신 대기 또는 다시 수신 대기 서비스를 호출한 직후 이 서비스가 호출될 수도 있고, 클라이언트 연결이 실제로 있을 때 수신 콜백 루틴을 호출한 직후 이 서비스가 호출될 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3415">This service may be called immediately after the application calls the listen or re-listen service or after the listen callback routine is called when the client connection is actually present.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3416">즉시 연결을 설정할 수 없는 경우 제공된 대기 옵션에 따라 서비스가 일시 중단됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3416">If a connection cannot not be established right away, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3417">연결이 더 이상 필요하지 않으면 서버 포트에 대한 서버 소켓 바인딩을 제거하도록 애플리케이션이 **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** 를 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3417">*The application must call **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** after the connection is no longer needed to remove the server socket's binding to the server port*.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3418">애플리케이션 콜백 루틴은 IP 도우미 스레드 내에서 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3418">*Application callback routines are called from within the IP's helper thread*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3419">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3420">**socket_ptr** TCP 서버 소켓 제어 블록을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3420">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP server socket control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3421">**wait_option** 연결이 설정되는 동안 서비스가 작동하는 방식을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3421">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3422">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3422">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3423">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3423">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3424">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**(0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3424">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3425">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3425">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3426">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3426">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3427">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) TCP 서버 소켓을 수락(수동 연결)하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3427">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP server socket accept (passive connect).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3428">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE**(0x36) 제공된 서버 소켓이 수신 대기 상태가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3428">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) The server socket supplied is not in a listen state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3429">**NX_IN_PROGRESS**(0x37) 대기하도록 지정되지 않았으며, 연결하려고 시도하는 중입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3429">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, the connection attempt is in progress.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3430">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort 호출에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3430">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3431">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 소켓 포인터 오류입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3431">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Socket pointer error.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3432">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3432">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3433">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3433">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3438">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3438">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{
    /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
    tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
    /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
       example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{
NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;
    /* Assuming that:
       "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an
        initial count of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the
        link is enabled "my_pool" packet pool has already been
        created
    */

    /* Create the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket,
                         "Port 12 Server Socket",
                          NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                          NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                          NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

    /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                port_12_connect_request);

    /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
       "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client and then disconnecting.*/
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
    {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
        request is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
           complete.*/
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

        /* Check for a successful connection. */
        if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
        {

            /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
               message */
            nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                         NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
            nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                  sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                  &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

            /* Check for an error. */
            if (status)
            {
               /* Error, release the packet. */
               nx_packet_release(my_packet);
            }

            /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called
            even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_listen"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3462">nx_tcp_server_socket_listen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3462">nx_tcp_server_socket_listen</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3463">TCP 포트에서 클라이언트 연결 수신 대기를 사용하도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3463">Enable listening for client connection on TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3464">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3464">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT port,
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT listen_queue_size,
    VOID (*listen_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3465">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3465">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3466">이 서비스는 지정된 TCP 포트에서 클라이언트 연결 요청 수신 대기를 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3466">This service enables listening for a client connection request on the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3467">클라이언트 연결 요청이 수신되면 제공된 서버 소켓이 지정된 포트에 바인딩되고 제공된 수신 대기 콜백 함수가 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3467">When a client connection request is received, the supplied server socket is bound to the specified port and the supplied listen callback function is called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3468">수신 대기 콜백 루틴 처리는 애플리케이션에 따라 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3468">The listen callback routine's processing is completely up to the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3469">수락 작업에 이어 수행되는 애플리케이션 스레드 절전 모드 해제 논리가 포함되어 있을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3469">It may contain logic to wake up an application thread that subsequently performs an accept operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3470">이 소켓에 대해 수락 처리가 일시 중단된 스레드가 이미 애플리케이션에 있는 경우 수신 대기 콜백 루틴이 필요하지 않을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3470">If the application already has a thread suspended on accept processing for this socket, the listen callback routine may not be needed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3471">애플리케이션이 동일한 포트에서 추가 클라이언트 연결을 처리하려는 경우 다음 연결에 사용할 수 있는 소켓(CLOSED 상태의 소켓)이 포함된 ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** 을 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3471">If the application wishes to handle additional client connections on the same port, the ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** must be called with an available socket (a socket in the CLOSED state) for the next connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3472">다시 수신 대기 서비스가 호출될 때까지 추가 클라이언트 연결은 큐에 대기됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3472">Until the re-listen service is called, additional client connections are queued.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3473">최대 큐 크기를 초과하는 경우 새 연결 요청이 큐에 대기될 수 있도록 가장 오래된 연결 요청이 삭제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3473">When the maximum queue depth is exceeded, the oldest connection request is dropped in favor of queuing the new connection request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3474">최대 큐 크기는 이 서비스에서 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3474">The maximum queue depth is specified by this service.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3475">애플리케이션 콜백 루틴은 내부 IP 도우미 스레드에서 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3475">*Application callback routines are called from the internal IP helper thread*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3476">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3477">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3477">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3478">**port** 수신 대기할 포트 번호(1-0xFFFF)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3478">**port** Port number to listen on (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3479">**socket_ptr** 연결에 사용할 소켓을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3479">**socket_ptr** Pointer to socket to use for the connection.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3480">**listen_queue_size** 큐에 대기될 수 있는 클라이언트 연결 요청 수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3480">**listen_queue_size** Number of client connection requests that can be queued.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3481">**listen_callback** 연결이 수신되면 호출할 애플리케이션 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3481">**listen_callback** Application function to call when the connection is received.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3482">NULL을 지정하면 수신 대기 콜백 기능을 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3482">If a NULL is specified, the listen callback feature is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3483">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3483">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3484">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) TCP 포트 수신 대기를 사용하도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3484">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP port listen enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3485">**NX_MAX_LISTEN**(0x33) 수신 대기 요청 구조를 더 이상 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3485">**NX_MAX_LISTEN** (0x33) No more listen request structures are available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3486">**_nx_api.h_** 의 상수 NX_MAX_LISTEN_REQUESTS는 가능한 활성 수신 대기 요청 수를 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3486">The constant NX_MAX_LISTEN_REQUESTS in **_nx_api.h_** defines how many active listen requests are possible.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3487">**NX_NOT_CLOSED**(0x35) 제공된 서버 소켓이 닫힘 상태가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3487">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) The supplied server socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3488">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND**(0x22) 제공된 서버 소켓이 이미 포트에 바인딩되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3488">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) The supplied server socket is already bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3489">**NX_DUPLICATE_LISTEN**(0x34) 이 포트의 활성 수신 대기 요청이 이미 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3489">**NX_DUPLICATE_LISTEN** (0x34) There is already an active listen request for this port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3490">**NX_INVALID_PORT**(0x46) 잘못된 포트가 지정되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3490">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3491">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP 또는 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3491">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3492">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3492">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3493">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3493">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
