### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3498">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3498">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{
   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread.*/
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket.
   This example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{
NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;
   /* Assuming that:
      "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an
      initial count of 0 "my_ip" has already been created
      and the link is enabled "my_pool" packet pool has already
      been created.
   */

   /* Create the server socket. */
   nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server
                        Socket",
                        NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                        NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                        NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

   /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
   nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                               port_12_connect_request);

   /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
      "Hello_and_Goodbye" to
      each client and then disconnecting. */
   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
   {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
           request is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection
           to complete. */
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

        /* Check for a successful connection. */
           if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
        {

              /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
                 message. */
              nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                 NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

              /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
              nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                    sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                    &my_pool,
                                    NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {
                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

            /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }
         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called
            even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
         again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }
     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);
     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3525">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3525">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3526">이전에 수신 대기에 사용하도록 설정한 포트에서 연결을 수신하면 이 서비스가 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3526">This service is called after a connection has been received on a port that was setup previously for listening.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3527">이 서비스는 다음 클라이언트 연결에 사용하도록 새 서버 소켓을 제공하기 위한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3527">The main purpose of this service is to provide a new server socket for the next client connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3528">연결 요청이 큐에 있는 경우 이 서비스 호출 중에 바로 연결이 처리됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3528">If a connection request is queued, the connection will be processed immediately during this service call.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3529">새 서버 소켓에 대한 연결이 있는 경우 원래 수신 대기 요청에서 지정한 것과 동일한 콜백 루틴도 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3529">*The same callback routine specified by the original listen request is also called when a connection is present for this new server socket*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3530">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3530">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3531">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3531">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3532">**port** 다시 수신 대기할 포트 번호(1-0xFFFF)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3532">**port** Port number to re-listen on (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3533">**socket_ptr** 다음 클라이언트 연결에 사용할 소켓입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3533">**socket_ptr** Socket to use for the next client connection.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3534">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3534">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3535">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) TCP 포트 다시 수신 대기에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3535">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP port re-listen.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3536">**NX_NOT_CLOSED**(0x35) 제공된 서버 소켓이 닫힘 상태가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3536">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) The supplied server socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3537">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND**(0x22) 제공된 서버 소켓이 이미 포트에 바인딩되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3537">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) The supplied server socket is already bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3538">**NX_INVALID_RELISTEN**(0x47) 이 포트에 유효한 소켓 포인터가 이미 있거나 지정된 포트에 활성 수신 대기 요청이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3538">**NX_INVALID_RELISTEN** (0x47) There is already a valid socket pointer for this port or the port specified does not have a listen request active.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3539">**NX_CONNECTION_PENDING**(0x48) 큐에 대기된 연결 요청이 있었고 이 호출 중에 처리되었던 것을 제외하면 NX_SUCCESS와 동일합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3539">**NX_CONNECTION_PENDING** (0x48) Same as NX_SUCCESS, except there was a queued connection request and it was processed during this call.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3540">**NX_INVALID_PORT**(0x46) 잘못된 포트가 지정되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3540">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3541">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP 또는 수신 대기 콜백 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3541">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or listen callback pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3542">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3542">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3543">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3543">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3548">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3548">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread.*/
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
      example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;

   /* Assuming that:
     "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial
     count of 0.
    "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled.
    "my_pool" packet pool has already been created. */

   /* Create the server socket. */
   nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server Socket",
                                 NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                                 NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                                 NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

   /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
   nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                               port_12_connect_request);

   /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
      "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client then disconnecting. */
   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
   {

       /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
          request is present. */
       tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

       /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
          complete. */
       status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

       /* Check for a successful connection. */
          if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
       {

             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
                message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                   sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                   &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is
            called even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3575">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3575">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3576">이 서비스는 이 서버 소켓과 지정된 서버 포트 간 연결을 제거합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3576">This service removes the association between this server socket and the specified server port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3577">애플리케이션은 연결 해제 후 또는 호출 수락 실패 후 이 서비스를 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3577">The application must call this service after a disconnection or after an unsuccessful accept call.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3578">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3578">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3580">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3580">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3581">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 서버 소켓을 수락하지 않는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3581">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful server socket unaccept.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3582">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE**(0x36) 서버 소켓이 부적절한 상태이며 연결 해제되었을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3582">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) Server socket is in an improper state, and is probably not disconnected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3583">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3583">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3585">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3585">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3590">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3590">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL        my_pool;
NX_IP                 my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET         server_socket;
void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This example
   doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET  *my_packet;
UINT       status, i;

   /* Assuming that:
     "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial count
      of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled
     "my_pool" packet pool has already been created
   */

    /* Create the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server
                         Socket",NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                         NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,NX_NULL,
                         port_12_disconnect_request);

    /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                port_12_connect_request);

    /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending "Hello_and_Goodbye"
       to
       each client and then disconnecting. */
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
    {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection request
           is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
           complete.*/
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

       /* Check for a successful connection. */
          if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
       {
             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye" message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet,
                      "Hello_and_Goodbye",sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                      &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
       }

       /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called even
          if disconnect or accept fails. */
       nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

      /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket again. */
      nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
    }

    /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

    /* Delete the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3617">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3617">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3618">이 서비스는 지정된 TCP 포트에서 클라이언트 연결 요청 수신 대기를 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3618">This service disables listening for a client connection request on the specified TCP port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3619">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3619">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3620">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3620">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3621">**port** 수신 대기를 사용하지 않도록 설정할 포트 번호(0-0xFFFF)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3621">**port** Number of port to disable listening (0 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3622">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3622">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3623">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) TCP 수신 대기를 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3623">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP listen disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3624">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**(0x16) 지정된 포트의 수신 대기가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3624">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Listening was not enabled for the specified port.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3626">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3626">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3627">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3627">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3628">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3628">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3657">nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3657">nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3658">검색에 사용할 수 있는 바이트 수를 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3658">Retrieves number of bytes available for retrieval</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3659">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3659">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *bytes_available);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3660">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3661">이 서비스는 지정된 TCP 소켓에서 검색에 사용할 수 있는 바이트 수를 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3661">This service obtains the number of bytes available for retrieval in the specified TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3662">TCP 소켓은 이미 연결되어 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3662">Note that the TCP socket must already be connected.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3663">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3663">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3664">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만들고 연결한 TCP 소켓을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3664">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created and connected TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3665">**bytes_available** 사용할 수 있는 바이트 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3665">**bytes_available** Pointer to destination for bytes available.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3666">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3666">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3667">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 서비스가 성공적으로 실행되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3667">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Service executes successfully.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3668">읽을 수 있는 바이트 수가 호출자에게 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3668">Number of bytes available for read is returned to the caller.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3669">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED**(0x38) 소켓이 연결된 상태가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3669">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is not in a connected state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3670">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3670">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3671">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) TCP가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3671">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3672">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3672">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3673">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3673">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3674">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3674">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3675">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3675">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3676">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3676">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3677">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3677">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the bytes available for retrieval on the specified socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available(&my_socket,&bytes_available);

/* Is status = NX_SUCCESS, the available bytes is returned in
   bytes_available. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3690">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3690">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3701">nx_tcp_socket_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3701">nx_tcp_socket_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3702">TCP 클라이언트 또는 서버 소켓 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3702">Create TCP client or server socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3703">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3703">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    CHAR *name, 
    ULONG type_of_service, 
    ULONG fragment,
    UINT time_to_live, 
    ULONG window_size,
    VOID (*urgent_data_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr),
    VOID (*disconnect_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3704">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3705">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스의 TCP 클라이언트 또는 서버 소켓을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3705">This service creates a TCP client or server socket for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3706">애플리케이션 콜백 루틴은 이 IP 인스턴스와 연결된 스레드에서 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3706">*Application callback routines are called from the thread associated with this IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3707">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3708">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3708">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3709">**socket_ptr** 새 TCP 소켓 제어 블록을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3709">**socket_ptr** Pointer to new TCP socket control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3710">**name** 이 TCP 소켓의 애플리케이션 이름입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3710">**name** Application name for this TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3711">**type_of_service** 전송할 서비스 유형을 정의합니다. 올바른 값은 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3711">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3712">**NX_IP_NORMAL**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3712">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3713">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY**(0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3713">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3714">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA**(0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3714">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3715">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE**(0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3715">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3716">**NX_IP_MIN_COST**(0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3716">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3717">**fragment** IP 조각화 허용 여부를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3717">**fragment** Specifies whether or not IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3718">NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY\*\*(0x0)가 지정되면 IP 조각화가 허용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3718">If NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY\*\* (0x0) is specified, IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3719">NX_DONT_FRAGMENT(0x4000)가 지정되면 IP 조각화가 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3719">If NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) is specified, IP fragmenting is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3720">**time_to_live** 이 패킷이 제거되기 전까지 통과할 수 있는 라우터 수를 정의하는 8비트 값을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3720">**time_to_live** Specifies the 8-bit value that defines how many routers this packet can pass before being thrown away.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3721">기본값은 NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE로 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3721">The default value is specified by NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3722">**window_size** 이 소켓의 수신 큐에 허용되는 최대 바이트 수를 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3722">**window_size** Defines the maximum number of bytes allowed in the receive queue for this socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3723">**urgent_data_callback** 수신 스트림에서 긴급 데이터가 검색될 때마다 호출되는 애플리케이션 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3723">**urgent_data_callback** Application function that is called whenever urgent data is detected in the receive stream.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3724">이 값이 NX_NULL이면 긴급 데이터는 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3724">If this value is NX_NULL, urgent data is ignored.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3725">**disconnect_callback** 연결의 다른 쪽 끝에 있는 소켓이 연결을 해제할 때마다 호출되는 애플리케이션 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3725">**disconnect_callback** Application function that is called whenever a disconnect is issued by the socket at the other end of the connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3726">이 값이 NX_NULL이면 연결 해제 콜백 함수는 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3726">If this value is NX_NULL, the disconnect callback function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3727">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3727">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3728">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) TCP 클라이언트 소켓 만들기에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3728">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP client socket create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3729">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**(0x0A) type-of-service, fragment, window size 또는 time-tolive 옵션이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3729">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type-of-service, fragment, invalid window size, or time-tolive option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3730">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP 또는 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3732">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3732">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3733">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3733">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3734">초기화 및 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3734">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3735">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3735">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3736">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3736">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3737">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3737">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a TCP client socket on the previously created IP instance,
   with normal delivery, IP fragmentation enabled, 0x80 time to
   live, a 200-byte receive window, no urgent callback routine, and
   the "client_disconnect" routine to handle disconnection initiated
   from the other end of the connection. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_create(&ip_0, &client_socket,
                             "Client Socket",
                             NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                             0x80, 200, NX_NULL
                             client_disconnect);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is created and ready
   to be bound. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3761">nx_tcp_socket_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3761">nx_tcp_socket_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3762">TCP 소켓 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3762">Delete TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3763">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3763">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_delete(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3764">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3764">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3765">이 서비스는 이전에 만든 TCP 소켓을 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3765">This service deletes a previously created TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3766">소켓이 여전히 바인딩되어 있거나 연결되어 있으면 서비스는 오류 코드를 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3766">If the socket is still bound or connected, the service returns an error code.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3767">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3767">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3768">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 TCP 소켓입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3768">**socket_ptr** Previously created TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3769">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3769">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3770">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓을 삭제하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3770">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3771">**NX_NOT_CREATED**(0x27) 소켓이 만들어지지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3771">**NX_NOT_CREATED** (0x27) Socket was not created.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3772">**NX_STILL_BOUND**(0x42) 소켓이 여전히 바인딩되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3772">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) Socket is still bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3773">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3776">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3777">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3777">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3778">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3778">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3779">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3779">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3780">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3780">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created TCP client socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_delete(&client_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is deleted. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3792">nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3792">nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3793">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3793">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3794">nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3794">nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3797">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3797">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_disconnect"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3804">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3804">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3805">클라이언트 및 서버 소켓 연결 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3805">Disconnect client and server socket connections</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3806">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3806">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3807">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3807">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3808">이 서비스는 설정된 클라이언트 또는 서버 소켓 연결을 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3808">This service disconnects an established client or server socket connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3809">먼저 요청을 거부한 후 서버 소켓 연결을 해제해야 하며 연결이 해제된 클라이언트 소켓은 다른 연결 요청에 사용할 준비가 된 상태로 남아 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3809">A disconnect of a server socket should be followed by an unaccept request, while a client socket that is disconnected is left in a state ready for another connection request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3810">연결 해제 프로세스를 즉시 완료할 수 없는 경우 제공된 대기 옵션에 따라 서비스가 일시 중단됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3810">If the disconnect process cannot finish immediately, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3811">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3811">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3812">**socket_ptr** 이전에 연결된 클라이언트 또는 서버 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3812">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3813">**wait_option** 연결 해제가 진행 중인 동안 서비스가 작동하는 방식을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3813">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the disconnection is in progress.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3814">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3814">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3815">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3815">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3816">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**(0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3816">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3817">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3817">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3818">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3818">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3819">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓 연결 해제에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3819">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket disconnect.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3820">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED**(0x38) 지정된 소켓이 연결되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3820">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Specified socket is not connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3821">**NX_IN_PROGRESS**(0X37) 대기 안 함으로 지정되었으므로 연결 해제가 진행 중입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3821">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) Disconnect is in progress, no wait was specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3822">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort 호출에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3822">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3823">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3823">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3824">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3824">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3825">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3825">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3826">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3826">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3827">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3827">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3828">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3828">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3829">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3829">Yes</span></span> 

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3830">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3830">Example</span></span> 

```c
/* Disconnect from a previously established connection and wait a
   maximum of 400 timer ticks. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&client_socket, 400);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously connected socket (either
   as a result of the client socket connect or the server accept) is
   disconnected. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3854">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3854">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3855">TCP 연결 해제 완료 알림 콜백 함수 설치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3855">Install TCP disconnect complete notify callback function</span></span>
 
### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3856">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3856">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_disconnect_complete_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3857">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3857">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3858">이 서비스는 소켓 연결 해제 작업이 완료된 후 호출되는 콜백 함수를 등록합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3858">This service registers a callback function which is invoked after a socket disconnect operation is completed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3859">TCP 소켓 연결 해제 완료 콜백 함수는 옵션 ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** 가 정의된 상태로 NetX Duo가 빌드되어 있는 경우 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3859">The TCP socket disconnect complete callback function is available if NetX Duo is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3860">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3861">**socket_ptr** 이전에 연결된 클라이언트 또는 서버 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3861">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3862">**tcp_disconnect_complete_notify** 설치할 콜백 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3862">**tcp_disconnect_complete_notify** The callback function to be installed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3863">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3863">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3864">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 콜백 함수를 성공적으로 등록했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3864">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully registered the callback function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3865">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) 확장된 알림 기능이 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되지 않습니다. NX_PTR_ERROR\*\*(0X07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3865">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The extended notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library NX_PTR_ERROR\*\* (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3866">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3866">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3867">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) TCP 기능이 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3867">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3868">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3868">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3869">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3869">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3870">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3870">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3871">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3871">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3872">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3872">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Install the disconnect complete notify callback function. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify(&client_socket,
                                                  callback);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3882">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3882">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3883">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3883">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3885">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3885">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3886">TCP 설정 알림 콜백 함수 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3886">Set TCP establish notify callback function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3887">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3887">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_establish_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3888">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3888">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3889">이 서비스는 콜백 함수를 등록합니다. 이 함수는 TCP 소켓이 연결된 후 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3889">This service registers a callback function, which is called after a TCP socket makes a connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3890">TCP 소켓 설정 콜백 함수는 옵션 ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** 가 정의된 상태로 NetX Duo가 빌드되어 있는 경우 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3890">The TCP socket establish callback function is available if NetX Duo is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3891">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3892">**socket_ptr** 이전에 연결된 클라이언트 또는 서버 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3892">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3893">**tcp_establish_notify** TCP 연결이 설정된 후 호출되는 콜백 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3893">**tcp_establish_notify** Callback function invoked after a TCP connection is established.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3894">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3894">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3895">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 알림 함수를 성공적으로 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3895">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully sets the notify function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3896">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) 확장된 알림 기능은 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3896">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The extended notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3897">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3897">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3898">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3898">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3899">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 애플리케이션에서 TCP를 사용하도록 설정하지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3899">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP has not been enabled by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3900">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3900">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3901">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3901">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3902">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3902">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3903">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3903">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3904">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3904">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the function pointer "callback" as the notify function NetX
   Duo will call when the connection is in the established state. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify(&client_socket, callback);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3917">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3917">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3918">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3918">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3919">TCP 소켓 활동에 대한 정보 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3919">Retrieve information about TCP socket activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3920">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3920">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_info_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_received,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *tcp_retransmit_packets,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_queued,
    ULONG *tcp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *tcp_socket_state,
    ULONG *tcp_transmit_queue_depth,
    ULONG *tcp_transmit_window,
    ULONG *tcp_receive_window);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3921">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3921">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3922">이 서비스는 지정된 TCP 소켓 인스턴스의 TCP 소켓 활동에 대한 정보를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3922">This service retrieves information about TCP socket activities for the specified TCP socket instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3923">대상 포인터가 NX_NULL이면 해당 특정 정보가 호출자에게 반환되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3923">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3924">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3924">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3925">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 TCP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3925">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3926">**tcp_packets_sent** 소켓의 송신된 총 TCP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3926">**tcp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP packets sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3927">**tcp_bytes_sent** 소켓의 송신된 총 TCP 바이트 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3927">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP bytes sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3928">**tcp_packets_received** 소켓의 수신된 총 TCP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3928">**tcp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3929">**tcp_bytes_received** 소켓의 수신된 총 TCP 바이트 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3929">**tcp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP bytes received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3930">**tcp_retransmit_packets** 총 TCP 패킷 재전송 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3930">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packet retransmissions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3931">**tcp_packets_queued** 소켓의 큐에 대기된 총 TCP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3931">**tcp_packets_queued** Pointer to destination of the total number of queued TCP packets on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3932">**tcp_checksum_errors** 소켓의 체크섬 오류가 있는 총 TCP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3932">**tcp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets with checksum errors on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3933">**tcp_socket_state** 소켓의 현재 상태 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3933">**tcp_socket_state** Pointer to destination of the socket’s current state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3934">**tcp_transmit_queue_depth** 여전히 큐에서 ACK를 대기 중인 총 전송 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3934">**tcp_transmit_queue_depth** Pointer to destination of the total number of transmit packets still queued waiting for ACK.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3935">**tcp_transmit_window** 현재 전송 창 크기 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3935">**tcp_transmit_window** Pointer to destination of the current transmit window size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3936">**tcp_receive_window** 현재 수신 창 크기 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3936">**tcp_receive_window** Pointer to destination of the current receive window size.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3937">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3937">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3938">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) TCP 소켓 정보 검색에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3938">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP socket information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3939">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3939">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3940">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3940">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3941">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3941">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3942">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3942">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3943">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3943">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3944">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3944">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3945">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3945">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3946">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3946">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve TCP socket information from previously created
   socket_0.*/
status = nx_tcp_socket_info_get(&socket_0,
                                &tcp_packets_sent,
                                &tcp_bytes_sent,
                                &tcp_packets_received,
                                &tcp_bytes_received,
                                &tcp_retransmit_packets,
                                &tcp_packets_queued,
                                &tcp_checksum_errors,
                                &tcp_socket_state,
                                &tcp_transmit_queue_depth,
                                &tcp_transmit_window,
                                &tcp_receive_window);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP socket information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3970">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3970">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3971">소켓의 MSS 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3971">Get MSS of socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3972">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3972">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    ULONG *mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3973">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3973">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3974">이 서비스는 지정된 소켓의 로컬 MSS(최대 세그먼트 크기)를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3974">This service retrieves the specified socket's local Maximum Segment Size (MSS).</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3975">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3975">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3976">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 소켓을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3976">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3977">**mss** MSS 반환 대상입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3977">**mss** Destination for returning MSS.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3978">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3978">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3979">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) MSS를 가져오는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3979">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful MSS get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3980">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 또는 MSS 대상 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3980">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or MSS destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3981">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) TCP가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3981">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-3982">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 호출자가 스레드나 초기화가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3982">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3983">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3983">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3984">초기화 및 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3984">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3985">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3985">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-3986">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3986">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-3987">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-3987">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the MSS for the socket "my_socket". */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_get(&my_socket, &mss_value);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "mss_value" variable contains the
   socket's current MSS value. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4000">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4000">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4001">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4001">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4002">피어 TCP 소켓의 MSS 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4002">Get MSS of the peer TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4003">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4003">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4004">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4004">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4005">이 서비스는 피어 소켓에서 보급한 MSS(최대 세그먼트 크기)를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4005">This service retrieves the Maximum Segment Size (MSS) advertised by the peer socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4006">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4006">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4007">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만들고 연결한 소켓을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4007">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created and connected socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4008">**mss** MSS를 반환하는 대상입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4008">**mss** Destination for returning the MSS.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4009">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4009">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4010">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 피어 MSS를 가져오는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4010">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful peer MSS get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4011">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 또는 MSS 대상 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4011">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or MSS destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4012">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) TCP가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4012">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4013">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 호출자가 스레드나 초기화가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4013">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4014">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4014">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4015">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4015">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4016">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4016">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4017">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4017">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4018">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4018">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the MSS of the connected peer to the socket "my_socket". */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get(&my_socket, &mss_value);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "mss_value" variable contains the
   socket peer’s advertised MSS value. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4032">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4032">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4033">소켓의 MSS 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4033">Set MSS of socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4034">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4034">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_set(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    ULONG mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4035">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4035">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4036">이 서비스는 지정된 소켓의 MSS(최대 세그먼트 크기)를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4036">This service sets the specified socket's Maximum Segment Size (MSS).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4037">MSS 값은 네트워크 인터페이스 IP MTU 내에 있어야 하며 IP 및 TCP 헤더 공간이 허용되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4037">Note the MSS value must be within the network interface IP MTU, allowing room for IP and TCP headers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4038">TCP 소켓이 연결 프로세스를 시작하기 전에 이 서비스를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4038">This service should be used before a TCP socket starts the connection process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4039">TCP 연결이 설정된 후 이 서비스를 사용하면 새 값이 연결에 영향을 주지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4039">If the service is used after a TCP connection is established, the new value has no effect on the connection.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4040">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4040">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4041">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 소켓을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4041">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4042">**mss** 설정할 MSS 값입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4042">**mss** Value of MSS to set.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4043">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4043">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4044">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) MSS 설정에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4044">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful MSS set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4045">**NX_SIZE_ERROR**(0x09) 지정된 MSS 값이 너무 큽니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4045">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Specified MSS value is too large.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4046">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED**(0x38) TCP 연결이 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4046">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) TCP connection has not been established</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4047">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4047">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4048">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) TCP가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4048">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4049">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 호출자가 스레드나 초기화가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4049">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4050">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4050">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4051">초기화 및 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4051">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4052">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4052">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4053">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4053">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4054">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4054">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the MSS of the socket "my_socket" to 1000 bytes. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_set(&my_socket, 1000);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the MSS of "my_socket" is 1000 bytes. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4061">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4061">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4062">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4062">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4063">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4063">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4064">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4064">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4065">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4065">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4067">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4067">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4068">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4068">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4069">피어 TCP 소켓에 대한 정보 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4069">Retrieve information about peer TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4070">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4070">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *peer_ip_address,
    ULONG *peer_port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4071">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4072">이 서비스는 IPv4 네트워크를 통해 연결된 TCP 소켓의 피어 IP 주소 및 포트 정보를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4072">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over IPv4 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4073">IPv6 네트워크도 지원하는 동등한 서비스는 ***nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get*** 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4073">The equivalent service that also supports IPv6 network is ***nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4074">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4074">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4075">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 TCP 소켓을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4075">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4076">**peer_ip_address** 피어 IP 주소 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4076">**peer_ip_address** Pointer to destination for peer IP address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4077">**peer_port** 피어 포트 번호 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4077">**peer_port** Pointer to destination for peer port number, in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4078">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4078">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4079">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 서비스가 성공적으로 실행되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4079">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Service executes successfully.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4080">피어 IP 주소와 포트 번호는 호출자에게 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4080">Peer IP address and port number are returned to the caller.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4081">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED**(0x38) 소켓이 연결된 상태가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4081">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is not in a connected state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4082">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4083">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) TCP가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4083">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4084">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4084">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4085">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4085">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4086">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4086">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4087">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4087">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4088">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4088">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4089">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4089">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Obtain peer IP address and port on the specified TCP socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(&my_socket, &peer_ip_address,
                                     &peer_port);

/* If status = NX_SUCCESS, the data was successfully obtained. */
```
