## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4103">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4103">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4104">TCP 전송 큐 알림 함수 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4104">Set the TCP transmit queue notify function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4105">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4105">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set(
              NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
              VOID(*tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4106">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4107">이 서비스는 애플리케이션에서 지정한 전송 큐 크기 업데이트 알림 함수를 설정합니다. 이 함수는 지정된 소켓이 큐 크기가 더 이상 제한을 초과하지 않도록 전송 큐에서 패킷을 해제했음을 확인할 때마다 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4107">This service sets the transmit queue depth update notify function specified by the application, which is called whenever the specified socket determines that it has released packets from the transmit queue such that the queue depth is no longer exceeding its limit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4108">큐 크기로 인해 전송 시 애플리케이션이 차단되는 경우 콜백 함수는 전송을 다시 시작할 수 있는 애플리케이션에 대한 알림으로 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4108">If an application would be blocked on transmit due to queue depth, the callback function serves as a notification to the application that it may start transmitting again.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4109">이 서비스는 ***NX_ENABLE_TCP_QUEUE_DEPTH_UPDATE_NOTIFY*** 옵션이 정의된 상태로 Netx Duo 라이브러리가 빌드된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4109">This service is available only if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_TCP_QUEUE_DEPTH_UPDATE_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4110">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4110">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4111">**socket_ptr** 소켓 구조를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4111">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the socket structure</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4112">**tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify** 설치할 알림 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4112">**tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify** The notify function to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4113">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4113">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4114">**FX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 알림 함수를 설치했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4114">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed the notify function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4115">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) TCP 소켓 큐 크기 알림 기능이 Netx Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4115">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The TCP socket queue depth notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4116">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 소켓 제어 블록 또는 알림 함수에 대한 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4116">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to the socket control block or the notify function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4117">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4117">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4118">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) TCP 기능이 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4118">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4119">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4119">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4120">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4120">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4121">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4121">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4122">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4122">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4123">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4123">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* Notify the application to resume sending. */

}
/* Install the TCP transmit queue notify function .*/
status = nxd_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set(&tcp_socket,
                                  tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the callback function is successfully
   installed. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4137">nx_tcp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4137">nx_tcp_socket_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4138">TCP 소켓에서 데이터 수신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4138">Receive data from TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4139">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4139">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_receive(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4140">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4140">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4141">이 서비스는 지정된 소켓에서 TCP 데이터를 수신합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4141">This service receives TCP data from the specified socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4142">지정된 소켓에 큐에 대기된 데이터가 없으면 제공된 대기 옵션에 따라 호출자가 일시 중단됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4142">If no data is queued on the specified socket, the caller suspends based on the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4143">NX_SUCCESS가 반환되는 경우 애플리케이션은 수신된 패킷이 더 이상 필요하지 않으면 해당 패킷을 해제해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4143">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4144">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4144">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4145">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 TCP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4145">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4146">**packet_ptr** TCP 패킷 포인터를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4146">**packet_ptr** Pointer to TCP packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4147">**wait_option** 현재 이 소켓에 큐에 대기된 데이터가 없는 경우 서비스가 작동하는 방식을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4147">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if do data are currently queued on this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4148">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4148">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4149">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4149">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4150">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**(0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4150">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4151">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4151">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4152">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4152">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4153">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓 데이터 수신에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4153">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket data receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4154">**NX_NOT_BOUND**(0x24) 소켓이 아직 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4154">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound yet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4155">**NX_NO_PACKET**(0x01) 수신된 데이터가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4155">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No data received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4156">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort 호출에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4156">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4157">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED**(0x38) 소켓이 더 이상 연결되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4157">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) The socket is no longer connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4158">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 또는 반환 패킷 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4158">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or return packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4159">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4159">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4160">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4160">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4161">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4161">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4162">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4162">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4163">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4163">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4164">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4164">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4165">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4165">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a packet from the previously created and connected TCP
   client socket. If no packet is available, wait for 200 timer
   ticks before giving up. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_receive(&client_socket, &packet_ptr, 200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the received packet is pointed to by
   "packet_ptr". */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4189">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4189">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4190">수신된 패킷을 애플리케이션에 알림</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4190">Notify application of received packets</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4191">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4191">Prototype</span></span>   

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    VOID (*tcp_receive_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4192">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4192">Description</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4193">이 서비스는 애플리케이션에서 지정한 콜백 함수를 사용하여 수신 알림 함수 포인터를 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4193">This service configures the receive notify function pointer with the callback function specified by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4194">그러면 소켓에 하나 이상의 패킷이 수신될 때마다 이 콜백 함수가 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4194">This callback function is then called whenever one or more packets are received on the socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4195">NX_NULL 포인터를 제공하면 알림 함수를 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4195">If a NX_NULL pointer is supplied, the notify function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4196">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4196">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4197">**socket_ptr** TCP 소켓을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4197">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4198">**tcp_receive_notify** 소켓에 하나 이상의 패킷이 수신되면 호출되는 애플리케이션 콜백 함수 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4198">**tcp_receive_notify** Application callback function pointer that is called when one or more packets are received on the socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4199">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4199">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4200">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓 수신 알림에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4200">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket receive notify.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4201">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4201">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4202">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4202">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4203">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) TCP 기능이 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4203">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4204">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4204">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4205">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4205">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4206">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4206">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4207">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4207">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4208">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4208">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a receive packet callback function for the "client_socket"
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify(&client_socket,
                                      my_receive_notify);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, NetX Duo will call the function named
   "my_receive_notify" whenever one or more packets are received for
   "client_socket". */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4222">nx_tcp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4222">nx_tcp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4223">TCP 소켓을 통해 데이터 송신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4223">Send data through a TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4224">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4224">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_send(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4225">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4225">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4226">이 서비스는 이전에 연결된 TCP 소켓을 통해 TCP 데이터를 송신합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4226">This service sends TCP data through a previously connected TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4227">마지막으로 보급된 수신기 창 크기가 이 요청 미만이면 지정된 대기 옵션에 따라 선택적으로 서비스가 일시 중단됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4227">If the receiver's last advertised window size is less than this request, the service optionally suspends based on the wait option specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4228">이 서비스는 MSS를 초과하는 패킷 데이터가 IP 계층으로 송신되지 않도록 보장합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4228">This service guarantees that no packet data larger than MSS is sent to the IP layer.</span></span> 

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4229">오류가 반환되지 않는 경우 애플리케이션은 이 호출 후에 패킷을 해제하면 안 됩니다. 해제하면 네트워크 드라이버가 전송 후에도 패킷을 해제하려고 하므로 예측할 수 없는 결과가 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4229">*Unless an error is returned, the application should not release the packet after this call. Doing so will cause unpredictable results because the network driver will also try to release the packet after transmission*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4230">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4231">**socket_ptr** 이전에 연결된 TCP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4231">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4232">**packet_ptr** TCP 데이터 패킷 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4232">**packet_ptr** TCP data packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4233">**wait_option** 요청이 수신기 창 크기를 초과하는 경우 서비스가 작동하는 방식을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4233">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the request is greater than the window size of the receiver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4234">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4234">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4235">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4235">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4236">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**(0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4236">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4237">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4237">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4238">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4238">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4239">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓 송신에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4240">**NX_NOT_BOUND**(0x24) 소켓이 어떤 포트에도 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4240">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4241">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**(0x50) 적절한 송신 인터페이스를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4241">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4242">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED**(0x38) 소켓이 더 이상 연결되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4242">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is no longer connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4243">**NX_WINDOW_OVERFLOW**(0x39) 요청이 보급된 수신기 창 크기(바이트)를 초과합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4243">**NX_WINDOW_OVERFLOW** (0x39) Request is greater than receiver’s advertised window size in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4244">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort 호출에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4244">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4245">**NX_INVALID_PACKET**(0x12) 패킷이 할당되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4245">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is not allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4246">**NX_TX_QUEUE_DEPTH**(0x49) 최대 전송 큐 크기에 도달했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4246">**NX_TX_QUEUE_DEPTH** (0x49) Maximum transmit queue depth has been reached.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4247">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 패킷 뒤에 추가 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4247">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4248">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4248">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4249">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4249">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4250">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4250">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4251">**NX_UNDERFLOW**(0x02) 패킷 앞에 추가 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4251">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Packet prepend pointer is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4252">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4252">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4253">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4253">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4254">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4254">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4255">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4255">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4256">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4256">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Send a packet out on the previously created and connected TCP
   socket. If the receive window on the other side of the connection
   is less than the packet size, wait 200 timer ticks before giving
   up. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr, 200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet has been sent! */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_state_wait"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4280">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4280">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4281">TCP 소켓이 특정 상태가 될 때까지 대기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4281">Wait for TCP socket to enter specific state</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4282">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4282">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_state_wait(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT desired_state,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4283">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4283">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4284">이 서비스는 소켓이 원하는 상태가 될 때까지 대기합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4284">This service waits for the socket to enter the desired state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4285">소켓이 원하는 상태가 아닌 경우 제공된 대기 옵션에 따라 서비스가 일시 중단됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4285">If the socket is not in the desired state, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4286">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4286">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4287">**socket_ptr** 이전에 연결된 TCP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4287">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4288">**desired_state** 원하는 TCP 상태입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4288">**desired_state** Desired TCP state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4289">유효한 TCP 소켓 상태는 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4289">Valid TCP socket states are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4290">**NX_TCP_CLOSED**(0x01)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4290">**NX_TCP_CLOSED** (0x01)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4291">**NX_TCP_LISTEN_STATE**(0x02)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4291">**NX_TCP_LISTEN_STATE** (0x02)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4292">**NX_TCP_SYN_SENT**(0x03)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4292">**NX_TCP_SYN_SENT** (0x03)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4293">**NX_TCP_SYN_RECEIVED**(0x04)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4293">**NX_TCP_SYN_RECEIVED** (0x04)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4294">**NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED**(0x05)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4294">**NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED** (0x05)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4295">**NX_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT**(0x06)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4295">**NX_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT** (0x06)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4296">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_1**(0x07)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4296">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_1** (0x07)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4297">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_2**(0x08)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4297">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_2** (0x08)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4298">**NX_TCP_CLOSING**(0x09)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4298">**NX_TCP_CLOSING** (0x09)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4299">**NX_TCP_TIMED_WAIT**(0x0A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4299">**NX_TCP_TIMED_WAIT** (0x0A)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4300">**NX_TCP_LAST_ACK**(0x0B)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4300">**NX_TCP_LAST_ACK** (0x0B)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4301">**wait_option** 요청된 상태가 아닌 경우 서비스가 작동하는 방식을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4301">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the requested state is not present.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4302">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4302">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4303">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4303">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4304">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4304">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4305">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4305">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4306">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 상태 대기에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4306">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful state wait.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4307">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4307">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4308">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL**(0x43) 지정된 대기 시간 내에 해당 상태가 되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4308">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) State not present within the specified wait time.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4309">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort 호출에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4309">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4310">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4310">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4311">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4311">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4312">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**(0x0A) 원하는 소켓 상태가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4312">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) The desired socket state is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4313">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4314">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4314">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4315">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4315">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4316">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4316">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4317">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4317">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 300 timer ticks for the previously created socket to enter
   the established state in the TCP state machine. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_state_wait(&client_socket,
                                  NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the socket is now in the established
   state! */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4341">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4341">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4342">시간이 지정된 대기 상태 콜백 설치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4342">Install callback for timed wait state</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4343">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4343">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_timed_wait_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4344">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4344">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4345">이 서비스는 TCP 소켓이 시간이 지정된 대기 상태인 경우 호출되는 콜백 함수를 등록합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4345">This service registers a callback function which is invoked when the TCP socket is in timed wait state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4346">이 서비스를 사용하려면 옵션 ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY*** 가 정의된 NetX Duo 라이브러리가 빌드되어 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4346">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4347">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4347">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4348">**socket_ptr** 이전에 연결된 클라이언트 또는 서버 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4348">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4349">**tcp_timed_wait_callback** 시간이 지정된 대기 콜백 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4349">**tcp_timed_wait_callback** The timed wait callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4350">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4350">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4351">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 콜백 함수 소켓을 성공적으로 등록했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4351">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully registers the callback function socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4352">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) 확장 알림 기능을 사용하도록 설정하지 않은 상태로 NetX Duo 라이브러리가 빌드되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4352">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) NetX Duo library is built without the extended notify feature enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4353">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) TCP 기능이 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4356">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4357">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4357">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4358">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4358">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4359">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4359">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4360">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4360">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Install the timed wait callback function */
nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback(&client_socket, callback);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4373">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4373">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4374">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4374">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4375">소켓의 전송 매개 변수 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4375">Configure socket's transmit parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4376">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4376">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG max_queue_depth,
    ULONG timeout,
    ULONG max_retries,
    ULONG timeout_shift);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4377">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4378">이 서비스는 지정된 TCP 소켓의 다양한 전송 매개 변수를 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4378">This service configures various transmit parameters of the specified TCP socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4379">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4379">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4380">**socket_ptr** TCP 소켓을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4380">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4381">**max_queue_depth** 전송을 위해 큐에 대기될 수 있는 최대 패킷 수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4381">**max_queue_depth** Maximum number of packets allowed to be queued for transmission.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4382">**timeout** 패킷을 다시 송신하기 전에 ACK를 기다리는 ThreadX 타이머 틱 수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4382">**timeout** Number of ThreadX timer ticks an ACK is waited for before the packet is sent again.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4383">**max_retries** 허용되는 최대 재시도 수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4383">**max_retries** Maximum number of retries allowed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4384">**timeout_shift** 각 후속 재시도에 대한 시간 제한을 변경하는 값입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4384">**timeout_shift** Value to shift the timeout for each subsequent retry.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4385">값이 0이면 이어지는 재시도 간 시간 제한이 동일합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4385">A value of 0, results in the same timeout between successive retries.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4386">값이 1이면 재시도 간 시간 제한이 두 배가 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4386">A value of 1, doubles the timeout between retries.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4387">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4387">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4388">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 전송 소켓 구성에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit socket configure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4389">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4389">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4390">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**(0x0a) 잘못된 큐 깊이 옵션입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4390">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid queue depth option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) TCP 기능이 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4393">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4393">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4394">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4394">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4395">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4395">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4396">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4396">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4397">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4397">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Configure the "client_socket" for a maximum transmit queue depth of
   12, 100 tick timeouts, a maximum of 20 retries, and a timeout double
   on each successive retry. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure(&client_socket,12,100,20,1);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the socket’s transmit retry has been
   configured. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4404">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4404">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4405">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4405">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4406">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4406">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4407">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4407">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4408">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4408">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4409">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4409">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4410">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4410">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4411">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4411">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4412">애플리케이션에 창 크기 업데이트 알림</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4412">Notify application of window size updates</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4413">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4413">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_window_update_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4414">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4414">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4415">이 서비스는 소켓 창 업데이트 콜백 루틴을 설치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4415">This service installs a socket window update callback routine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4416">지정된 소켓이 원격 호스트 창 크기 증가를 나타내는 패킷을 수신할 때마다 자동으로 이 루틴이 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4416">This routine is called automatically whenever the specified socket receives a packet indicating an increase in the window size of the remote host.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4417">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4417">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4418">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 TCP 소켓을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4418">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4419">**tcp_window_update_notify** 창 크기가 변경되면 호출되는 콜백 루틴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4419">**tcp_window_update_notify** Callback routine to be called when the window size changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4420">값이 NULL이면 창 변경 업데이트를 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4420">A value of NULL disables the window change update.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4421">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4421">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4422">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 콜백 루틴이 소켓에 설치되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4422">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Callback routine is installed on the socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4423">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4423">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4424">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4425">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) TCP 기능이 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4425">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4426">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4426">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4427">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4427">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4428">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4428">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4429">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4429">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4430">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4430">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the function pointer to the windows update callback after creating the
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set(&data_socket,
                                                my_windows_update_callback);

/* Define the window callback function in the host application. */
void my_windows_update_callback(&data_socket)
{

/* Process update on increase TCP transmit socket window size. */
   return;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4437">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4437">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4440">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4440">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4441">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4441">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4442">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4442">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4443">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4443">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span></span>

## <a name="nx_udp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4444">nx_udp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4444">nx_udp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4445">NetX의 UDP 구성 요소를 사용하도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4445">Enable UDP component of NetX Duo</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4446">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4446">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4447">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4447">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4448">이 서비스는 NetX Duo의 UDP(User Datagram Protocol) 구성 요소를 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4448">This service enables the User Datagram Protocol (UDP) component of NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4449">사용하도록 설정하면 애플리케이션에서 UDP 데이터그램을 송신하고 수신할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4449">After enabled, UDP datagrams may be sent and received by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4450">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4450">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4451">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4451">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4452">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4452">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4453">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) UDP를 사용하도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4453">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4454">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4454">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4455">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4455">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4456">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**(0x15) 이 구성 요소는 이미 사용하도록 설정되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4456">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4457">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4457">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4458">초기화, 스레드, 타이머</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4458">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4459">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4459">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4460">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4460">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4461">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4461">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable UDP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_udp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP is now enabled on the specified IP
   instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_free_port_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4484">nx_udp_free_port_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4484">nx_udp_free_port_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4485">사용할 수 있는 다음 UDP 포트 찾기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4485">Find next available UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4486">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4486">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_free_port_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    UINT *free_port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4487">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4487">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4488">이 서비스는 애플리케이션 제공 포트 번호에서 시작하여 사용 가능한 UDP 포트(바인딩되지 않은 포트)를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4488">This service looks for a free UDP port (unbound) starting from the application supplied port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4489">검색에서 최대 포트 값인 0xFFFF에 도달하면 검색 논리가 래핑됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4489">The search logic will wrap around if the search reaches the maximum port value of 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4490">검색에 성공하면 free_port_ptr이 가리키는 변수에 사용 가능한 포트가 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4490">If the search is successful, the free port is returned in the variable pointed to by free_port_ptr.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4491">이 서비스는 다른 스레드에서 호출될 수 있으며 동일한 포트를 반환할 수 있습니다. 이러한 경합 상태를 방지하기 위해 애플리케이션은 이 서비스 및 실제 소켓 바인딩에 뮤텍스 보호가 적용되도록 할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4491">*This service can be called from another thread and can have the same port returned. To prevent this race condition, the application may wish to place this service and the actual socket bind under the protection of a mutex*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4492">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4492">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4493">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4493">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4494">**port** 검색을 시작할 포트 번호(1-0xFFFF)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4494">**port** Port number to start search (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4495">**free_port_ptr** 사용 가능한 포트 반환 변수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4495">**free_port_ptr** Pointer to the destination free port return variable.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4496">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4496">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4497">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 사용 가능한 포트를 찾는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4497">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful free port find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4498">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS**(0x45) 사용 가능한 포트를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4498">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free ports found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4499">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4500">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4500">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4501">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4501">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4502">**NX_INVALID_PORT**(0x46) 지정된 포트 번호가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4502">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Specified port number is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4503">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4503">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4504">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4504">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4505">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4505">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4506">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4506">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4507">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4507">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Locate a free UDP port, starting at port 12, on a previously
   created IP instance. */
status = nx_udp_free_port_find(&ip_0, 12, &free_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS pointer, "free_port" identifies the next
   free UDP port on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4530">nx_udp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4530">nx_udp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4531">UDP 활동에 대한 정보 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4531">Retrieve information about UDP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4532">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4532">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *udp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *udp_packets_received,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *udp_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *udp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *udp_checksum_errors);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4533">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4533">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4534">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스의 UDP 활동에 대한 정보를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4534">This service retrieves information about UDP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4535">대상 포인터가 NX_NULL이면 해당 특정 정보가 호출자에게 반환되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4535">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4536">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4536">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4537">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4537">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4538">**udp_packets_sent** 송신된 총 UDP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4538">**udp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4539">**udp_bytes_sent** 송신된 총 UDP 바이트 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4539">**udp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4540">**udp_packets_received** 수신된 총 UDP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4540">**udp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4541">**udp_bytes_received** 수신된 총 UDP 바이트 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4541">**udp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4542">**udp_invalid_packets** 잘못된 총 UDP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4542">**udp_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid UDP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4543">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** 삭제된 총 UDP 수신 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4543">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4544">**udp_checksum_errors** 체크섬 오류가 있는 총 UDP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4544">**udp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets with checksum errors.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4545">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4545">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4546">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) UDP 정보 검색에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4546">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4547">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4547">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4548">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4548">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4549">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4549">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4550">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4551">초기화, 스레드 및 타이머</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4551">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4552">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4552">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4553">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4553">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4554">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4554">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve UDP information from previously created IP Instance
   ip_0. */
status = nx_udp_info_get(&ip_0, &udp_packets_sent,
                         &udp_bytes_sent,
                         &udp_packets_received,
                         &udp_bytes_received,
                         &udp_invalid_packets,
                         &udp_receive_packets_dropped,
                         &udp_checksum_errors);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_packet_info_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4577">nx_udp_packet_info_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4577">nx_udp_packet_info_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4578">UDP 패킷에서 네트워크 매개 변수 추출</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4578">Extract network parameters from UDP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4579">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4579">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_packet_info_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    UINT *protocol,
    UINT *port,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4580">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4580">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4581">이 서비스는 수신 인터페이스의 수신된 패킷에서 IPv4 주소, 피어 포트 번호, 프로토콜 유형(이 서비스는 항상 UDP 유형을 반환함) 같은 네트워크 매개 변수를 추출합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4581">This service extracts network parameters, such as IPv4 address, peer port number, protocol type (this service always returns UDP type) from a packet received on an incoming interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4582">IPv4 또는 IPv6 네트워크에서 들어오는 패킷에 대한 정보를 얻기 위해 애플리케이션은 ***nxd_udp_packet_info_extract.*** 서비스를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4582">To obtain information on a packet coming from IPv4 or IPv6 network, application shall use the service ***nxd_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4583">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4583">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4584">**packet_ptr** 패킷을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4584">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4585">**ip_address** 송신기 IP 주소를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4585">**ip_address** Pointer to sender IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4586">**protocol** 프로토콜(UDP)을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4586">**protocol** Pointer to protocol (UDP).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4587">**port** 송신기 포트 번호를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4587">**port** Pointer to sender’s port number.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4588">**interface_index** 수신 인터페이스 인덱스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4588">**interface_index** Pointer to receiving interface index.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4589">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4589">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4590">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 패킷 인터페이스 데이터를 성공적으로 추출했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4590">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet interface data successfully extracted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4591">**NX_INVALID_PACKET**(0x12) 패킷에 IPv4 프레임이 포함되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4591">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet does not contain IPv4 frame.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4592">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 포인터 입력입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4592">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4593">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4593">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4594">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4594">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4595">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4595">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4596">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4596">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4597">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4597">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4598">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4598">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract network data from UDP packet interface.*/
status = nx_udp_packet_info_extract(packet_ptr, &ip_address,
                                     &protocol, &port,
                                     &interface_index);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet data was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4611">nx_udp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4611">nx_udp_socket_receive</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4612">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4612">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4613">nx_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4613">nx_udp_socket_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4621">nx_udp_socket_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4621">nx_udp_socket_bind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4622">UDP 소켓을 UDP 포트에 바인딩</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4622">Bind UDP socket to UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4623">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4623">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_bind(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4624">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4624">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4625">이 서비스는 이전에 만든 UDP 소켓을 지정된 UDP 포트에 바인딩합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4625">This service binds the previously created UDP socket to the specified UDP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4626">유효한 UDP 소켓 범위는 0에서 0xFFFF까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4626">Valid UDP sockets range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4627">요청된 포트 번호가 다른 소켓에 바인딩되어 있으면 이 서비스는 지정된 시간 동안 해당 소켓이 해당 포트 번호에서 바인딩을 해제할 때까지 기다립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4627">If the requested port number is bound to another socket, this service waits for specified period of time for the socket to unbind from the port number.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4628">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4628">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4629">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 UDP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4629">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4630">**port** 바인딩할 포트 번호\*\*(1-0xFFFF)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4630">**port** Port number to bind to\*\* (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4631">포트 번호가 NX_ANY_PORT\*\*(0x0000)인 경우 IP 인스턴스는 가능한 다음 포트를 검색하여 바인딩에 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4631">If port number is NX_ANY_PORT\*\* (0x0000), the IP instance will search for the next free port and use that for the binding.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4632">**wait_option** 포트가 이미 다른 소켓에 바인딩되어 있는 경우 서비스가 작동하는 방식을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4632">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the port is already bound to another socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4633">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4633">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4634">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4634">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4635">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**(0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4635">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4636">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4636">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4637">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4637">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4638">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓 바인딩에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4638">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4639">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND**(0x22) 이 소켓은 다른 포트에 이미 바인딩되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4639">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) This socket is already bound to another port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4640">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE**(0x23) 포트가 이미 다른 소켓에 바인딩되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4640">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) Port is already bound to a different socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4641">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS**(0x45) 사용 가능한 포트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4641">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort 호출에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4643">**NX_INVALID_PORT**(0x46) 잘못된 포트가 지정되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4643">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4644">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4644">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4645">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4645">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4646">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4646">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4647">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4647">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4648">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4648">Threads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4650">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4650">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4651">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4651">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Bind the previously created UDP socket to port 12 on the
   previously created IP instance. If the port is already bound,
   wait for 300 timer ticks before giving up. */
status = nx_udp_socket_bind(&udp_socket, 12, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the UDP socket is now bound to
   port 12.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_bytes_available"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4674">nx_udp_socket_bytes_available</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4674">nx_udp_socket_bytes_available</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4675">검색에 사용할 수 있는 바이트 수를 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4675">Retrieves number of bytes available for retrieval</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4676">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4676">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_bytes_available(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *bytes_available);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4677">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4677">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4678">이 서비스는 지정된 UDP 소켓에서 수신용으로 사용할 수 있는 바이트 수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4678">This service retrieves number of bytes available for reception in the specified UDP socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4679">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4679">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4680">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 UDP 소켓을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4680">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4681">**bytes_available** 사용할 수 있는 바이트 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4681">**bytes_available** Pointer to destination for bytes available.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4682">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4682">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4683">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 사용할 수 있는 바이트 검색에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4683">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful bytes available retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4684">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL**(0x43) 소켓이 포트에 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4684">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Socket not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4685">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4685">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4686">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) UDP 기능이 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4686">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP feature is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4687">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4687">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4688">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4688">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4689">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4689">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4690">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4690">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4691">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4691">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4692">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4692">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the bytes available for retrieval from the UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_bytes_available(&my_socket,
                                       &bytes_available);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the number of bytes was successfully
   retrieved.*/
```
