## <a name="nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4715">nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4715">nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4716">UDP 소켓 체크섬을 사용하지 않도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4716">Disable checksum for UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4717">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4717">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4718">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4718">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4719">이 서비스는 지정된 UDP 소켓에서 패킷을 송신하고 수신하는 데 체크섬 논리를 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4719">This service disables the checksum logic for sending and receiving packets on the specified UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4720">체크섬 논리를 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 이 소켓을 통해 송신되는 모든 패킷의 UDP 헤더 체크섬 필드에 0값이 로드됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4720">When the checksum logic is disabled, a value of zero is loaded into the UDP header's checksum field for all packets sent through this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4721">UDP 헤더의 체크섬 값이 0이면 해당 패킷에 대해 체크섬이 계산되지 않음을 수신기에서 알 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4721">A zero-value checksum value in the UDP header signals the  receiver that checksum is not computed for this packet.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4722">또한, **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** 및 **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** 이 각각 정의된 경우에도 UDP 패킷을 수신하고 송신할 때 아무런 영향을 주지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4722">Also note that this has no effect if **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** and **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** are defined when receiving and sending UDP packets respectively,</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4723">IPv6의 경우 UDP 체크섬이 필수이므로 이 서비스는 IPv6 네트워크의 패킷에 영향을 주지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4723">Note that this service has no effect on packets on the IPv6 network since UDP checksum is mandatory for IPv6.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4724">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4724">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4725">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 UDP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4725">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4726">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4726">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4727">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓 체크섬을 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket checksum disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4728">**NX_NOT_BOUND**(0x24) 소켓이 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4728">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4729">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4729">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4730">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4730">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4731">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4731">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4732">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4733">초기화, 스레드, 타이머</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4733">Initialization, threads, timer</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4734">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4734">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4735">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4735">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4736">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4736">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable the UDP checksum logic for packets sent on this socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, outgoing packets will not have a checksum
   calculated. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4759">nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4759">nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4760">UDP 소켓 체크섬을 사용하도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4760">Enable checksum for UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4761">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4761">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4762">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4762">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4763">이 서비스는 지정된 UDP 소켓에서 패킷을 송신하고 수신하는 데 체크섬 논리를 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4763">This service enables the checksum logic for sending and receiving packets on the specified UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4764">체크섬은 전체 UDP 데이터 영역 및 의사 IP 헤더에 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4764">The checksum covers the entire UDP data area as well as a pseudo IP header.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4765">또한, **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** 및 **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** 이 각각 정의된 경우에도 UDP 패킷을 수신하고 송신할 때 아무런 영향을 주지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4765">Also note that this has no effect if **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** and **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** are defined when receiving and sending UDP packets respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4766">이 서비스는 IPv6 네트워크의 패킷에 영향을 주지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4766">Note that this service has no effect on packets on the IPv6 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4767">UDP 체크섬은 IPv6에서 필수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4767">UDP checksum is mandatory in IPv6.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4768">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4768">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4769">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 UDP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4769">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4770">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4770">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4771">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓 체크섬을 사용하도록 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4771">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket checksum enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4772">**NX_NOT_BOUND**(0x24) 소켓이 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4772">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4773">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4776">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4777">초기화, 스레드, 타이머</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4777">Initialization, threads, timer</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4778">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4778">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4779">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4779">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4780">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4780">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable the UDP checksum logic for packets sent on this socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, outgoing packets will have a checksum
   calculated. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4794">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4794">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4803">nx_udp_socket_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4803">nx_udp_socket_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4804">UDP 소켓 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4804">Create UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4805">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4805">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG type_of_service, 
    ULONG fragment,
    UINT time_to_live, 
    ULONG queue_maximum);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4806">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4806">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4807">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스의 UDP 소켓을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4807">This service creates a UDP socket for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4808">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4808">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4809">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4809">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4810">**socket_ptr** 새 UDP 소켓 제어 블록을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4810">**socket_ptr** Pointer to new UDP socket control bloc.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4811">**name** 이 UDP 소켓의 애플리케이션 이름입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4811">**name** Application name for this UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4812">**type_of_service** 전송할 서비스 유형을 정의합니다. 올바른 값은 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4812">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4813">**NX_IP_NORMAL**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4813">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4814">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY**(0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4814">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4815">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA**(0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4815">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4816">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE**(0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4816">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4817">**NX_IP_MIN_COST**(0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4817">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4818">**fragment** IP 조각화 허용 여부를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4818">**fragment Specifies** whether or not IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4819">NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY(0x0)가 지정되면 IP 조각화가 허용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4819">If NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY (0x0) is specified, IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4820">NX_DONT_FRAGMENT(0x4000)가 지정되면 IP 조각화가 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4820">If NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) is specified, IP fragmenting is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4821">**time_to_live** 이 패킷이 제거되기 전까지 통과할 수 있는 라우터 수를 정의하는 8비트 값을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4821">**time_to_live** Specifies the 8-bit value that defines how many routers this packet can pass before being thrown away.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4822">기본값은 NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE로 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4822">The default value is specified by NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4823">**queue_maximum** 이 소켓에 대해 큐에 대기될 수 있는 최대 UDP 데이터그램 수를 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4823">**queue_maximum** Defines the maximum number of UDP datagrams that can be queued for this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4824">큐 제한에 도달하면 수신된 모든 새 패킷의 가장 오래된 UDP 패킷이 해제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4824">After the queue limit is reached, for every new packet received the oldest UDP packet is released.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4825">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4825">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4826">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) UDP 소켓 만들기에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4826">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4827">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**(0x0A) type-of-service, fragment 또는 time-to-live 옵션이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4827">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type-of-service, fragment, or time-to-live option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4828">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP 또는 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4828">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4829">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4829">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4830">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4830">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4831">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4831">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4832">초기화 및 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4832">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4833">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4833">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4834">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4834">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4835">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4835">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a UDP socket with a maximum receive queue of 30 packets.*/
status = nx_udp_socket_create(&ip_0, &udp_socket, "Sample UDP Socket",
                              NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY, 0x80,
                              30);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the new UDP socket has been created and
   is ready for binding. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4858">nx_udp_socket_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4858">nx_udp_socket_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4859">UDP 소켓 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4859">Delete UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4860">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4860">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_delete(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4861">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4861">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4862">이 서비스는 이전에 만든 UDP 소켓을 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4862">This service deletes a previously created UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4863">소켓이 포트에 바인딩된 경우 먼저 소켓 바인딩을 해제해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4863">If the socket was bound to a port, the socket must be unbound first.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4864">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4864">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4865">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 UDP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4865">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4866">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4866">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4867">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓을 삭제하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4867">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4868">**NX_STILL_BOUND**(0x42) 소켓이 여전히 바인딩되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4868">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) Socket is still bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4869">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4869">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4870">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4870">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4871">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4871">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4872">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4872">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4873">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4873">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4874">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4874">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4875">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4875">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4876">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4876">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_delete(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created UDP socket has
   been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4899">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4899">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4900">UDP 소켓 활동에 대한 정보 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4900">Retrieve information about UDP socket activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4901">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_info_get(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *udp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *udp_packets_received,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *udp_packets_queued,
    ULONG *udp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *udp_checksum_errors);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4902">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4903">이 서비스는 지정된 UDP 소켓 인스턴스의 UDP 소켓 활동에 대한 정보를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4903">This service retrieves information about UDP socket activities for the specified UDP socket instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4904">대상 포인터가 NX_NULL이면 해당 특정 정보가 호출자에게 반환되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4904">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4905">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4905">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4906">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 UDP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4906">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4907">**udp_packets_sent** 소켓의 송신된 총 UDP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4907">**udp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP packets sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4908">**udp_bytes_sent** 소켓의 송신된 총 UDP 바이트 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4908">**udp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP bytes sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4909">**udp_packets_received** 소켓의 수신된 총 UDP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4909">**udp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4910">**udp_bytes_received** 소켓의 수신된 총 UDP 바이트 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4910">**udp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP bytes received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4911">**udp_packets_queued** 소켓의 큐에 대기된 총 UDP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4911">**udp_packets_queued** Pointer to destination of the total number of queued UDP packets on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4912">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** 큐 크기 초과로 인해 삭제된, 소켓의 총 UDP 수신 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4912">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP receive packets dropped for socket due to queue size being exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4913">**udp_checksum_errors** 소켓의 체크섬 오류가 있는 총 UDP 패킷 수 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4913">**udp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets with checksum errors on socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4914">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4914">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4915">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) UDP 소켓 정보 검색에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4915">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4916">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4916">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4917">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4917">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4918">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4918">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4919">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4919">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4920">초기화, 스레드 및 타이머</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4920">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4921">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4921">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4922">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4922">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4923">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4923">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve UDP socket information from socket 0.*/
status = nx_udp_socket_info_get(&socket_0,
                                &udp_packets_sent,
                                &udp_bytes_sent,
                                &udp_packets_received,
                                &udp_bytes_received,
                                &udp_queued_packets,
                                &udp_receive_packets_dropped,
                                &udp_checksum_errors);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP socket information was retrieved.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_port_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4946">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4946">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4947">UDP 소켓에 바인딩된 포트 번호 선택</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4947">Pick up port number bound to UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4948">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4948">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_port_get(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT *port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4949">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4949">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4950">이 서비스는 소켓에 연결된 포트 번호를 검색합니다. 소켓이 바인딩될 때 NX_ANY_PORT가 지정된 경우 NetX Duo에서 할당한 포트를 찾는 데 유용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4950">This service retrieves the port number associated with the socket, which is useful to find the port allocated by NetX Duo in situations where the NX_ANY_PORT was specified at the time the socket was bound.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4951">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4951">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4952">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 UDP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4952">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4953">**port_ptr** 반환 포트 번호 대상을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4953">**port_ptr** Pointer to destination for the return port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4954">유효한 포트 번호는 (1-0xFFFF)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4954">Valid port numbers are (1- 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4955">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4955">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4956">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓 바인딩에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4956">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4957">**NX_NOT_BOUND**(0x24) 이 소켓은 포트에 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4957">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) This socket is not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4958">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터 또는 포트 반환 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4958">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer or port return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4959">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4959">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4960">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4960">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4961">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4961">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4962">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4962">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4963">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4963">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4964">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4964">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4965">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4965">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the port number of created and bound UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_port_get(&udp_socket, &port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the port variable contains the port this
   socket is bound to. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4979">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4979">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4980">nx_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4980">nx_udp_socket_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4981">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4981">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4982">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4982">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span></span>

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4988">nx_udp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4988">nx_udp_socket_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4989">UDP 소켓에서 데이터그램 수신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4989">Receive datagram from UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4990">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4990">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_receive(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4991">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-4992">이 서비스는 지정된 소켓에서 UDP 데이터그램을 수신합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4992">This service receives an UDP datagram from the specified socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4993">지정된 소켓에 큐에 대기된 데이터그램이 없는 경우 제공된 대기 옵션에 따라 호출자가 일시 중단됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4993">If no datagram is queued on the specified socket, the caller suspends based on the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4994">NX_SUCCESS가 반환되는 경우 애플리케이션은 수신된 패킷이 더 이상 필요하지 않으면 해당 패킷을 해제해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4994">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-4995">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4995">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4996">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 UDP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4996">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4997">**packet_ptr** UDP 데이터그램 패킷 포인터를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4997">**packet_ptr** Pointer to UDP datagram packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4998">**wait_option** 현재 이 소켓에 큐에 대기된 데이터그램이 없는 경우 서비스가 작동하는 방식을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4998">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if a datagram is not currently queued on this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-4999">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-4999">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5000">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5000">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5001">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**(0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5001">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5002">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5002">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5003">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5003">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5004">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓 수신에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5004">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5005">**NX_NOT_BOUND**(0x24) 소켓이 어떤 포트에도 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5005">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5006">**NX_NO_PACKET**(0x01) 수신할 UDP 데이터그램이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5006">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) There was no UDP datagram to receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5007">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort 호출에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5007">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5008">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 소켓 또는 패킷 반환 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5008">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or packet return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5009">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5009">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5010">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5010">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5011">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5011">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5012">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5012">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5013">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5013">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5014">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5014">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5015">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5015">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a packet from a previously created and bound UDP socket.
   If no packets are currently available, wait for 500 timer ticks
   before giving up. */
status = nx_udp_socket_receive(&udp_socket, &packet_ptr, 500);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the received UDP packet is pointed to by
   packet_ptr. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_receive_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5038">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5038">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5039">수신된 각 패킷에 대해 애플리케이션에 알림</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5039">Notify application of each received packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5040">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5040">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_receive_notify(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*udp_receive_notify)(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5041">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5041">Description</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5042">이 서비스는 애플리케이션에서 지정한 콜백 함수를 가리키는 수신 알림 함수 포인터를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5042">This service sets the receive notify function pointer to the callback function specified by the  application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5043">그러면 소켓에 패킷이 수신될 때마다 이 콜백 함수가 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5043">This callback function is then called whenever a packet is received on the socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5044">NX_NULL 포인터를 제공하면 수신 알림 함수를 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5044">If a NX_NULL pointer is supplied, the receive notify function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5045">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5045">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5046">**socket_ptr** UDP 소켓을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5046">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5047">**udp_receive_notify** 소켓에 패킷이 수신되면 호출되는 애플리케이션 콜백 함수 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5047">**udp_receive_notify** Application callback function pointer that is called when a packet is received on the socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5048">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5048">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5049">**NXD_MQTT_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓 수신 알림 함수를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5049">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set socket receive notify function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5050">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5050">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5051">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5051">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5052">초기화, 스레드, 타이머 및 ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5052">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5053">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5053">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5054">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5054">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5055">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5055">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a receive packet callback function for the "udp_socket"
   socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_receive_notify(&udp_socket,
                                      my_receive_notify);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, NetX Duo will call the function named
   "my_receive_notify" whenever a packet is received for
   "udp_socket". */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5068">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5068">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5069">nx_udp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5069">nx_udp_socket_receive</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5070">nx_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5070">nx_udp_socket_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5071">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5071">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5072">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5072">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5073">nx_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5073">nx_udp_source_extract</span></span>

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5078">nx_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5078">nx_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5079">UDP 데이터그램 송신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5079">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5080">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5080">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address, 
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5081">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5081">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5082">이 서비스는 IP4 네트워크에 대해 이전에 만들고 바인딩한 UDP 소켓을 통해 UDP 데이터그램을 송신합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5082">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for IPv4 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5083">NetX Duo는 대상 IP 주소를 기반으로 하여 원본 주소로 적합한 로컬 IP 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5083">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5084">특정 인터페이스와 원본 IP 주소를 지정하려면 애플리케이션에서 **nxd_udp_socket_source_send** 서비스를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5084">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the  **nxd_udp_socket_source_send** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5085">이 서비스는 UDP 데이터그램이 성공적으로 송신되었는지 여부에 관계없이 즉시 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5085">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5086">NetX Duo(IPv4/IPv6)의 동급 서비스는 ***nxd_udp_socket_send*** 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5086">The NetX Duo (IPv4/IPv6) equivalent service is ***nxd_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5087">소켓은 로컬 포트에 바인딩되어 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5087">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5088">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5088">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5089">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 UDP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5089">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5090">**packet_ptr** UDP 데이터그램 패킷 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5090">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5091">**ip_address** 대상 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5091">**ip_address** Destination IPv4 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5092">**port** 1에서 0xFFFF 사이의 유효한 대상 포트 번호입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5092">**port** Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5093">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5093">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5094">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) UDP 소켓 송신에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5094">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5095">**NX_NOT_BOUND**(0x24) 소켓이 어떤 포트에도 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5095">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5096">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**(0x50) 적절한 송신 인터페이스를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5096">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5097">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 잘못된 서버 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5097">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5098">**NX_UNDERFLOW**(0x02) 패킷에 UDP 헤더를 위한 공간이 부족합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5098">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5099">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 패킷 뒤에 추가 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5099">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5100">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5100">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5101">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5101">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5102">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) UDP가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5102">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5103">**NX_INVALID_PORT**(0x46) 포트 번호가 유효한 범위 내에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5103">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within a valid range</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5104">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5104">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5105">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5105">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5106">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5106">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5107">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5107">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5108">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5108">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IP address. */
server_address = IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5);

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nx_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                            server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the application successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to its peer. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5131">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5131">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5132">UDP 소켓을 통해 데이터그램 송신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5132">Send datagram through UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5133">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5133">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_source_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    UINT port,
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5134">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5134">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5135">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 주소를 원본 주소로 사용하여 네트워크 인터페이스에서 이전에 만들고 바인딩한 UDP 소켓을 통해 UDP 데이터그램을 송신합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5135">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket through the network interface with the specified IP address as the source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5136">이 서비스는 UDP 데이터그램이 성공적으로 송신되었는지 여부에 관계없이 즉시 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5136">Note that service returns immediately, regardless of whether or not the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5137">***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** 은 IPv4 및 IPv6 네트워크 둘 다에 작동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5137">***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** works for both IPv4 and IPv6 networks.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5138">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5138">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5139">**socket_ptr** 패킷을 전송할 소켓입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5139">**socket_ptr** Socket to transmit the packet out on.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5140">**packet_ptr** 전송할 패킷을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5140">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5141">**ip_address** 패킷을 송신할 대상 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5141">**ip_address** Destination IP address to send packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5142">**port** 대상 포트입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5142">**port** Destination port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5143">**address_index** 패킷을 송신할 인터페이스와 연결된 주소 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5143">**address_index** Index of the address associated with the interface to send packet on.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5144">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5144">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5145">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 패킷이 성공적으로 송신되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet successfully sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5146">**NX_NOT_BOUND**(0x24) 소켓이 포트에 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5147">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IP 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5147">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5148">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) UDP 처리가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5148">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP processing not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5149">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5149">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5150">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 잘못된 패킷 뒤에 추가 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5150">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet append pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5151">**NX_UNDERFLOW**(0x02) 잘못된 패킷 앞에 추가 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5151">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5152">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5152">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5153">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 잘못된 주소 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5153">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid address index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5154">**NX_INVALID_PORT**(0x46) 포트 번호가 최대 포트 번호를 초과합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5154">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number exceeds maximum port number.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5155">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5155">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5156">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5156">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5157">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5157">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5158">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5158">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5159">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5159">Example</span></span>

```c
#define ADDRESS_INDEX 1

/* Send packet out on port 80 to the specified destination IP on the
   interface at index 1 in the IP task interface list. */
status = nx_udp_socket_source_send(socket_ptr, packet_ptr,
                                   destination_ip, 80,
                                   ADDRESS_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet was successfully transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_unbind"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5182">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5182">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5183">UDP 포트에서 UDP 소켓 바인딩 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5183">Unbind UDP socket from UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5184">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5184">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_unbind(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5185">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5185">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5186">이 서비스는 UDP 소켓 및 UDP 포트 간 바인딩을 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5186">This service releases the binding between the UDP socket and a UDP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5187">수신 큐에 저장된 모든 수신된 패킷은 바인딩 해제 작업의 일부로 해제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5187">Any received packets stored in the receive queue are released as part of the unbind operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5188">다른 소켓을 바인딩 해제된 포트에 바인딩하려고 대기 중인 다른 스레드가 있는 경우 첫 번째 일시 중단된 스레드가 새로 바인딩 해제된 포트에 바인딩됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5188">If there are other threads waiting to bind another socket to the unbound port, the first suspended thread is then bound to the newly unbound port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5189">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5190">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 UDP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5190">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5191">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5191">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5192">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓을 바인딩 해제하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5192">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket unbind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5193">**NX_NOT_BOUND**(0x24) 소켓이 어떤 포트에도 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5193">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5194">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5194">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5195">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5195">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5196">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 이 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5196">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5197">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5197">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5198">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5198">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5199">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5199">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5200">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5200">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5201">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5201">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Unbind the previously bound UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_unbind(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously bound socket is now
   unbound. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_source_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5224">nx_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5224">nx_udp_source_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5225">UDP 데이터그램에서 IP 및 송신 포트 추출</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5225">Extract IP and sending port from UDP datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5226">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_source_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address, 
    UINT *port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5227">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5228">이 서비스는 제공된 UDP 데이터그램의 IP 및 UDP 헤더에서 송신기 IP 및 포트 번호를 추출합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5228">This service extracts the sender's IP and port number from the IP and UDP headers of the supplied UDP datagram.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5229">***Nxd_udp_source_extract*** 서비스는 IPv4 또는 IPv6 네트워크의 패킷에 작동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5229">Note that the service ***nxd_udp_source_extract*** works with packets from either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5230">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5231">**packet_ptr** UDP 데이터그램 패킷 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5231">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5232">**ip_address** 반환 IP 주소 변수를 가리키는 유효한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5232">**ip_address** Valid pointer to the return IP address variable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5233">**port** 반환 포트 변수를 가리키는 유효한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5233">**port** Valid pointer to the return port variable.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5234">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5234">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5235">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 원본 IP/포트 추출에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5235">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful source IP/port extraction.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5236">**NX_INVALID_PACKET**(0x12) 제공된 패킷이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5236">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) The supplied packet is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5237">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 패킷이나 IP 또는 포트 대상이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5237">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet or IP or port destination.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5238">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5238">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5239">초기화, 스레드, 타이머, ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5239">Initialization, threads, timers, ISR</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5240">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5240">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5241">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5242">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract the IP and port information from the sender of the UPD packet. */
status = nx_udp_source_extract(packet_ptr, &sender_ip_address, &sender_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the sender IP and port information has been stored
   in sender_ip_address and sender_port respectively.*/
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5255">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5255">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5256">nx_udp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5256">nx_udp_socket_receive</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5257">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5257">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5258">nx_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5258">nx_udp_socket_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5259">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5259">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nxd_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5265">nxd_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5265">nxd_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5266">ICMPv4 및 ICMPv6 서비스를 사용하도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5266">Enable ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 Services</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5267">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5267">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5268">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5268">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5269">이 서비스는 ICMPv4 및 ICMPv6 서비스를 모두 사용하도록 설정하며 IP 인스턴스를 만든 후에만 호출할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5269">This service enables both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 services and can only be called after the IP instance has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5270">IPv6를 사용하도록 설정하기 전이나 후에 이 서비스를 사용하도록 설정할 수 있습니다(nxd_ipv6_enable 참조).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5270">The service can be enabled either before or after IPv6 is enabled (see *nxd_ipv6_enable*).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5271">ICMPv4 서비스에는 에코 요청/응답이 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5271">ICMPv4 services include Echo Request/Reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5272">ICMPv6 서비스에는 에코 요청/응답, 네트워크 환경 검색, 중복 주소 검색, 라우터 검색, 상태 비저장 주소 자동 구성이 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5272">ICMPv6 services include Echo Request/Reply, Neighbor Discovery, Duplicate Address Detection, Router Discovery, and Stateless Address Auto-configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5273">NetX에서 IPv4에 해당하는 서비스는 nx_icmp_enable입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5273">The IPv4 equivalent in NetX is *nx_icmp_enable*.</span></span>

> [!NOTE] 
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5274">ICMPv6를 사용하도록 설정하기 전에 IPv6 주소를 수동으로 구성하면 수동으로 구성된 IPv6에는 중복 주소 검색 프로세스가 적용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5274">*If the IPv6 address is manually configured prior to enabling ICMPv6, the manually configured IPv6 is not subject to Duplicate Address Detection process*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5275">*nx_icmp_enable* 은 IPv4 작업에 대해서만 ICMP 서비스를 시작합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5275">*nx_icmp_enable* starts ICMP services for IPv4 operations only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5276">ICMPv6 서비스를 사용하는 애플리케이션은 nx_icmp_enable 대신 nxd_icmp_enable을 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5276">Applications using ICMPv6 services must use *nxd_icmp_enable* instead of *nx_icmp_enable*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5277">IPv6 라우터 요청 및 IPv6 상태 비저장 자동 주소 구성을 활용하려면 ICMPv6를 사용하도록 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5277">To utilize IPv6 router solicitation and IPv6 stateless auto-address configuration, ICMPv6 must be enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5278">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5278">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5279">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5279">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5280">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5280">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5281">**NX_SUCCESS**(0X00) ICMP 서비스를 사용하도록 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5281">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ICMP services are successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5282">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5282">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5283">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5283">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5284">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5284">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5285">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5285">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5286">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5286">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5287">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5287">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5288">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5288">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ICMP on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_icmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance is
   enabled for ICMP services. */
```

## <a name="nxd_icmp_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5296">nxd_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5296">nxd_icmp_ping</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5297">ICMPv4 또는 ICMPv6 에코 요청 수행</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5297">Perform ICMPv4 or ICMPv6 Echo Requests</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5298">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5298">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    CHAR *data_ptr, 
    ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr, 
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5299">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5299">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5300">이 서비스는 적절한 실제 인터페이스를 통해 ICMP 에코 요청 패킷을 전송하고 대상 호스트에서 에코 응답을 기다립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5300">This service sends out an ICMP Echo Request packet through an appropriate physical interface and waits for an Echo Reply from the destination host.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5301">NetX Duo는 대상 주소를 기준으로 ping 메시지를 전송할 적절한 인터페이스를 결정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5301">NetX Duo determines the appropriate interface, based on the destination address, to send the ping message .</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5302">애플리케이션은 ***nxd_icmp_source_ping*** 서비스를 사용하여 패킷 전송에 사용할 실제 인터페이스와 정확한 원본 IP 주소를 지정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5302">Applications shall use the service ***nxd_icmp_source_ping*** to specify the physical interface and precise source IP address to use for packet transmission.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5303">IP 인스턴스를 만들고 ICMPv4/ICMPv6 서비스를 사용하도록 설정해야 합니다(***nxd_icmp_enable*** 참조).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5303">The IP instance must have been created, and the ICMPv4/ICMPv6 services must be enabled (see ***nxd_icmp_enable***).</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5304">NX_SUCCESS가 반환되는 경우 애플리케이션은 수신된 패킷이 더 이상 필요하지 않으면 이 패킷을 해제해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5304">If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5305">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5305">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5306">**ip_ptr** IP 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5306">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5307">**ip_address** ping할 대상 IP 주소입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5307">**ip_address** Destination IP address to ping, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5308">**data_ptr** ping 패킷 데이터 영역을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5308">**data_ptr** Pointer to ping packet data area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5309">**data_size** ping 데이터의 바이트 수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5309">**data_size** Number of bytes of ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5310">**response_ptr** 응답 패킷 포인터를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5310">**response_ptr** Pointer to response packet Pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5311">**wait_option** 응답 대기 시간입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5311">**wait_option** Time to wait for a reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5312">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5312">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5313">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5313">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5314">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5314">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through</span></span> 
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5315">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**(0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5315">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5316">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5316">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5317">**NX_SUCCESS**(0X00) ping을 성공적으로 송수신했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5317">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sent and received ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5318">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) IPv6를 사용하지 않도록 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5318">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5319">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) ping 데이터가 패킷 페이로드를 초과합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5319">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Ping data exceeds packet payload</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5320">**NX_NO_RESPONSE**(0x29) 대상 호스트가 응답하지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5320">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Destination host did not respond</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5321">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5321">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5322">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**(0x50) 적절한 송신 인터페이스를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5322">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5323">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP 또는 응답 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5325">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0X14) IP 또는 ICMP 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5325">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP or ICMP component is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5326">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 입력 IP 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5326">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Input IP address is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5331">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5331">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following two examples illustrate how to use this API to send
   ping packets to IPv6 or IPv4 destinations. */

/* The first example: Send a ping packet to an IPv6 host
   2001:1234:5678::1 */
   
/* Declare variable address to hold the destination address. */
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;

char *buffer = “abcd”;
UINT prefix_length = 10;

/* Set the IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 1;

status = nxd_icmp_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address, buffer,
                       strlen(buffer),&response_ptr,
                       NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply has been
   received from IP address 2001:1234:5678::1 and the response
   packet is contained in the packet pointed to by response_ptr.It
   should have the same “abcd” four bytes of data. */

/* The second example: Send a ping packet to an IPv4 host 1.2.3.4 */

/* Program the IPv4 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V4;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4[0]    = 0x01020304;

status = nxd_icmp_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address, buffer,
                       strlen(buffer),&response_ptr, 10);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply was received
   from IP address 1.2.3.4 and the response packet is contained in
   the packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same
   “abcd” four bytes of data. */
```
