## <a name="nxd_icmp_source_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5339">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5339">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5340">ICMPv4 또는 ICMPv6 에코 요청 수행</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5340">Perform ICMPv4 or ICMPv6 Echo Requests</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5341">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5341">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_source_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT address_index,
    CHAR *data_ptr, 
    ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5342">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5343">이 서비스는 지정된 IPv4 또는 IPv6 주소 인덱스를 사용하여 ICMP 에코 요청 패킷을 전송하며, 원본 주소가 연결된 네트워크 인터페이스를 통해 대상 호스트의 에코 응답을 대기합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5343">This service sends out an ICMP Echo Request packet using the specified index of an IPv4 or IPv6 address, and through the network interface the source address is associated with, and waits for an Echo Reply from the destination host.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5344">이 서비스는 IPv4 및 IPv6 주소 둘 다에서 작동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5344">This service works with both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5345">매개 변수 *address_index* 는 사용할 원본 IPv4 또는 IPv6 주소를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5345">The parameter *address_index* indicates the source IPv4 or IPv6 address to use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5346">IPv4 주소의 경우 *address_index* 는 연결된 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 동일한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5346">For IPv4 address, the *address_index* is the same index to the attached network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5347">IPv6의 경우 *address_index* 는 IPv6 주소 테이블의 항목을 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5347">For IPv6, the *address_index* indicates the entry in the IPv6 address table.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5348">IP 인스턴스를 만들고 ICMPv4 및 ICMPv6 서비스를 사용하도록 설정해야 합니다(*nxd_icmp_enable* 참조).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5348">The IP instance must have been created, and the ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 services must be enabled (see *nxd_icmp_enable*).</span></span>

> [!CAUTION] 
> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5349">NX_SUCCESS가 반환되는 경우 애플리케이션은 수신된 패킷이 더 이상 필요하지 않으면 이 패킷을 해제해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5349">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5350">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5350">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5351">**ip_ptr** IP 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5351">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5352">**ip_address** ping할 대상 IP 주소입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5352">**ip_address** Destination IP address to ping, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5353">**address_index** 원본 주소로 사용할 IP 주소를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5353">**address_index** Indicates the IP address to use as source address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5354">**data_ptr** ping 패킷 데이터 영역을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5354">**data_ptr** Pointer to ping packet data area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5355">**data_size** ping 데이터의 바이트 수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5355">**data_size** Number of bytes of ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5356">**response_ptr** 응답 패킷 포인터를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5356">**response_ptr** Pointer to response packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5357">**wait_option** 응답 대기 시간입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5357">**wait_option** Time to wait for a reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5358">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5358">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5359">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5359">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5360">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5360">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5361">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**(0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5361">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5362">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5362">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5363">**NX_SUCCESS**(0X00) ping을 성공적으로 송수신했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5363">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sent and received ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5364">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) IPv6를 사용하지 않도록 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5364">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 is not enabled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5366">**NX_NO_RESPONSE**(0x29) 대상 호스트가 응답하지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5366">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Destination host did not respond</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5367">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5367">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5368">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**(0x50) 적절한 송신 인터페이스를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5368">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5369">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP 또는 응답 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5369">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5371">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0X14) IP 또는 ICMP 구성 요소가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5371">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP or ICMP component is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5372">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 입력 IP 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5372">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Input IP address is invalid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5374">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5374">Threads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5376">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5376">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5377">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5377">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following two examples illustrate how to use this API to send ping
   packets to IPv6 or IPv4 destinations. */

/* The first example: Send a ping packet to an IPv6 host
   FE80::411:7B23:40dc:f181 */

/* Declare variable address to hold the destination address. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
#define GLOBAL_IPv6_ADDRESS 1

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
char *buffer = “abcd”;
UINT prefix_length = 10;

/* Set the IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0xFE800000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x00000000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0x04117B23;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 0x40DCF181;

status = nxd_icmp_source_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                              GLOBAL_IPv6_ADDRESS,
                              buffer,
                              strlen(buffer),
                              &response_ptr,
                              NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply has been received
   from IP address FE80::411:7B23:40dc:f181 and the response packet is
   contained in the packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the
   same “abcd” four bytes of data. */

/* The second example: Send a ping packet to an IPv4 host 1.2.3.4 */

/* Program the IPv4 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V4;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4       = 0x01020304;

status = nxd_icmp_source_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                              buffer,
                              strlen(buffer),
                              &response_ptr,
                              NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply was received from
   IP address 1.2.3.4 and the response packet is contained in the packet
   pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same “abcd” four bytes
   of data. */
```

## <a name="nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5385">nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5385">nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5386">ICMPv6 RA 플래그 변경 콜백 함수 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5386">Set the ICMPv6 RA flag change callback function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5387">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5387">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    VOID(*ra_callback)(NX_IP*ip_ptr, UINT ra_flag));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5388">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5388">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5389">이 서비스는 ICMPv6 라우터 보급 알림 플래그 변경 콜백 함수를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5389">This service sets the ICMPv6 Router Advertisement flag change callback function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5390">사용자 제공 콜백 함수는 NetX Duo에서 라우터 보급 알림 메시지를 받을 때 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5390">The user-supplied callback function is invoked when NetX Duo receives a router advertisement message.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5391">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5391">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5392">**ip_ptr** IP 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5392">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5393">**ra_callback** 사용자 제공 콜백 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5393">**ra_callback** User-supplied callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5394">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5394">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5395">**NX_SUCCESS**(0X00) RA 플래그 콜백 함수를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5395">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set the RA flag callback function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5396">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) IPv6를 사용하지 않도록 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5396">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5397">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5397">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5398">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5398">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5399">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5399">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5400">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5400">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5401">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5401">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5402">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5402">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5403">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5403">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID icmpv6_ra_flag_callback(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT ra_flag)
{
   /* RA flag has changed. The updated value is passed in via the
      ra_flag parameter. */
}

/* Configure the user-defined ICMPv6 RA flag change callback
   function. */
status = nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set(&ip_0,
                                         icmpv6_ra_flag_callback);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates the callback function has
   been successfully configured. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ip_raw_packet_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5411">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5411">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5412">원시 IP 패킷 송신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5412">Send Raw IP Packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5413">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5413">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ip_raw_packet_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *destination
    ULONG protocol, 
    UINT ttl, 
    ULONG tos);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5414">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5414">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5415">이 서비스는 원시 IPv4 또는 IPv6 패킷을 송신합니다(전송 계층 프로토콜 헤더 없음).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5415">This service sends a raw IPv4 or IPv6 packet (no transport-layer protocol headers).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5416">멀티홈 시스템에서 시스템이 적절한 인터페이스를 결정할 수 없는 경우(예: 대상 IP 주소가 IPv4 브로드캐스트, 멀티캐스트 또는 IPv6 멀티캐스트 주소인 경우) 기본 디바이스가 선택됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5416">On a multihome system, if the system is unable to determine an appropriate interface (for example, if the destination IP address is IPv4 broadcast, multicast or IPv6 multicast address), the primary device is selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5417">서비스 \***nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send** _를 사용하여 보내는 인터페이스를 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5417">The service \***nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send** _ can be used to specify an outgoing interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5418">NetX의 동급 서비스는 _ \**_nx_ip_raw_packet_send_ 입니다.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5418">The NetX equivalent is _ *_nx_ip_raw_packet_send_.*\*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5419">IP 인스턴스를 이전에 만든 후 ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** 서비스를 사용하여 원시 IP 패킷 처리를 사용하도록 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5419">The IP instance must be previously created and raw IP packet handling must be enabled using the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5420">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5420">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5421">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5421">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5422">**packet_ptr** 전송할 패킷을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5422">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5423">**destination_ip** 대상 주소를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5423">**destination_ip** Pointer to destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5424">**protocol** IP 헤더에 저장된 패킷 프로토콜입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5424">**protocol** Packet protocol stored to the IP header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5425">**ttl** TTL 또는 홉 제한 값입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5425">**ttl** Value for TTL or hop limit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5426">**tos** TOS 또는 트래픽 클래스 및 흐름 레이블의 값입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5426">**tos** Value for TOS or traffic class and flow label</span></span>

### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5427">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5427">Return Value</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5428">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IP 패킷을 송신했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5428">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Raw IP packet successfully sent</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5429">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**(0x50) 적절한 송신 인터페이스를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5429">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5430">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0X14) 원시 IP 처리가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5430">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP handling not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5431">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IPv4 또는 IPv6 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5431">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5432">**NX_UNDERFLOW**(0x02) 패킷에 IPv4 또는 IPv6 헤더를 위한 공간이 부족합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5432">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for IPv4 or IPv6 header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5433">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 패킷 뒤에 추가 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5433">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5434">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터나 패킷 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5434">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer or packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5436">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**(0x4D) 유효한 IPv6 주소 입력이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5436">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5437">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5437">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5438">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5438">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5439">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5439">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5440">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5440">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5441">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5441">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS dest_address;

/* Set the destination address,in this case an IPv6 address. */
dest_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0x20011234;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x56780000;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 1;

UINT ttl, tos;

ttl = 128;

tos = 0;

/* Enable RAW IP handling on the previously created IP instance.*/
status = nx_raw_ip_packet_enable(&ip_0);

/* Allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr from the IP packet
   pool. */
/* Then transmit the packet to the destination address. */

status = nxd_ip_raw_packet_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr, dest_address,
                                NX_PROTOCOL_UDP, ttl, tos);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates the packet was
   successfully transmitted. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5450">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5450">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5451">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5451">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5452">지정된 원본 주소를 사용하여 원시 패킷 송신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5452">Send raw packet using specified source address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5453">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5453">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *destination_ip,
    UINT address_index,
    ULONG protocol,
    UINT ttl,
    ULONG tos);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5454">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5454">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5455">이 서비스는 지정된 IPv4 또는 IPv6 주소를 원본 주소로 사용하여 원시 IPv4 또는 ipv6 패킷을 송신합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5455">This service sends a raw IPv4 or IPv6 packet using the specified IPv4 or IPv6 address as source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5456">시스템이 적절한 인터페이스를 결정할 수 없는 경우(예: 대상 IP 주소가 IPv4 브로드캐스트, 멀티캐스트 또는 IPv6 멀티캐스트 주소인 경우) 이 서비스는 일반적으로 멀티홈 시스템에서 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5456">This service is typically used on a multihome system, if the system is unable to determine an appropriate interface (for example, if the destination IP address is IPv4 broadcast, multicast or IPv6 multicast address).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5457">매개 변수 *address_index* 를 사용하면 애플리케이션에서 이 원시 패킷을 보낼 때 사용할 원본 주소를 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5457">The parameter *address_index* allows the application to specify the source address to use when sending this raw packet.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5458">IP 인스턴스를 이전에 만든 후 ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** 서비스를 사용하여 원시 IP 패킷 처리를 사용하도록 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5458">The IP instance must be previously created and raw IP packet handling must be enabled using the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5459">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5459">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5460">**ip_ptr** IP 인스턴스 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5460">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5461">**packet_ptr** 송신할 패킷을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5461">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5462">**destination_ip** 대상 IP 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5462">**destination_ip** Destination IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5463">**address_index** 원본 주소로 사용할 IPv4 또는 IPv6 주소에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5463">**address_index** Index to the IPv4 or IPv6 addresses to use as source address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5464">**protocol** 프로토콜 필드의 값입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5464">**protocol** Value for the protocol field</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5465">**ttl** TTL 또는 홉 제한 값입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5465">**ttl** Value for ttl or hop limit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5466">**tos** TOS 또는 트래픽 클래스 및 흐름 레이블의 값입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5466">**tos** Value for tos or traffic class and flow label</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5467">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5467">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5468">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 패킷이 성공적으로 송신되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5468">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet is sent successfully</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5469">**NX_UNDERFLOW**(0x02) 패킷에 IPv4 또는 IPv6 헤더를 위한 공간이 부족합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5469">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for IPv4 or IPv6 header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5470">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 패킷 뒤에 추가 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5470">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5471">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 제어 블록, 패킷 또는 destination_ip에 대한 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5471">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP control block, packet, or destination_ip</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5472">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5472">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5473">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) 원시 처리가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5473">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw processing not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 주소 오류입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Address error</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5475">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 잘못된 인터페이스 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5475">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5476">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**(0x4D) 유효한 IPv6 주소 입력이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5476">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5477">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5477">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5478">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5478">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5479">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5479">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5480">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5480">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5481">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5481">Example</span></span>

```c
#define SOURCE_ADDRESS_INDEX 2

/* Send a raw packet from specified interface. */
status = nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr,
                                       dest_ip,
                                       SOURCE_ADDRESS_INDEX,
                                       NX_IP_RAW,
                                       NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE,
                                       NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, raw packet has been sent out on the
   specified interface. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5491">nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5491">nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5492">IPv6 주소 변경 알림 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5492">Set ipv6 address change notify</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5493">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5493">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*ip_address_change_notify)(NX_IP *, UINT, UINT, UINT, ULONG *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5494">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5494">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5495">이 서비스는 IPv6 주소가 변경될 때마다 NetX Duo가 호출하는 애플리케이션 콜백 루틴을 등록합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5495">This service registers an application callback routine that NetX Duo calls whenever the IPv6 Address is changed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5496">***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_ADDRESS_CHANGE_NOTIFY*** 옵션을 정의한 상태로 NetX Duo 라이브러리가 빌드된 경우 이 서비스를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5496">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built is the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_ADDRESS_CHANGE_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5497">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5497">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5498">**ip_ptr** IP 제어 블록 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5498">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5499">**ip_address_change_notify** 애플리케이션 콜백 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5499">**ip_address_change_notify** Application callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5500">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5500">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5501">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 설정하는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5501">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5502">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) IPv6 주소 변경 알림 기능은 Netx Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5502">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 address change notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5503">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 제어 블록 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5503">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5504">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5504">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5505">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0X14) IPv6 주소 변경 알림이 컴파일되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5505">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IPv6 address change notify is not compiled</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5506">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5506">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5507">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5507">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5508">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5508">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5509">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5509">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5510">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5510">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID ip_address_change_notify(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT status,
                              UINT interface_index,
                              UINT address_index,
                              ULONG *ip_address)
{

   /* Do something when ip address changed. */
}

void ip_address_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

   /* Set the ip address change notify of IP instance. */
   status = nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify (&ip_0, ip_address_change_notify);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the ip address change notify of IP
   instance was successfully set. */
}
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5535">nxd_ipv6_address_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5535">nxd_ipv6_address_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5536">IPv6 주소 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5536">Delete IPv6 Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5537">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5537">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5538">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5539">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스의 IPv6 주소 테이블에서 지정된 인덱스에 있는 IPv6 주소를 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5539">This service deletes the IPv6 address at the specified index in the IPv6 address table of the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5540">NetX의 동급 서비스는 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5540">There is no NetX equivalent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5541">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5541">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5542">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5542">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5543">**address_index** IP 인스턴스 IPv6 주소 테이블에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5543">**address_index** Index to IP instance IPv6 address table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5544">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5544">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5545">**NX_SUCCESS**(0X00) 주소를 삭제했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5545">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Address successfully deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5546">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) IPv6 기능은 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5546">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5547">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**(0x50) 적절한 송신 인터페이스를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5547">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5548">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5548">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5549">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5549">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5550">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5551">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5551">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5552">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5552">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5553">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5553">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5554">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5554">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;

/* Delete the IPv6 address at the specified address table index. */
address_index = 1;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_delete(&ip_0, address_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance
   address is successfully deleted. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5579">nxd_ipv6_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5579">nxd_ipv6_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5580">IPv6 주소 및 접두사 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5580">Retrieve IPv6 Address and Prefix</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5581">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5581">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT address_index, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG *prefix_length,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5582">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5582">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5583">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스의 주소 테이블에서 지정된 인덱스에 있는 IPv6 주소 및 접두사를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5583">This service retrieves the IPv6 address and prefix at the specified index in the address table of the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5584">IPv6 주소가 연결된 실제 인터페이스의 인덱스는 interface_index 포인터에서 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5584">The index of the physical interface the IPv6 address is associated with is returned in the *interface_index* pointer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5585">NetX의 동급 서비스는 ***nx_ip_address_get** _ 및 _*_nx_ip_interface_address_get_\*\*입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5585">The NetX equivalent services are ***nx_ip_address_get** _ and _*_nx_ip_interface_address_get_\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5586">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5586">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5587">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5587">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5588">**address_index** IP 인스턴스 주소 테이블에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5588">**address_index** Index to IP instance address table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5589">**ip_address** 설정할 주소에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5589">**ip_address** Pointer to the address to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5590">**prefix_length** 주소 접두사(서브넷 마스크)의 길이입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5590">**prefix_length** Length of the address prefix (subnet mask)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5591">**interface_index** 인터페이스의 인덱스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5591">**interface_index** Pointer to the index of the interface</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5592">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5592">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5593">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IPv6를 사용하도록 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5593">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5594">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) IPv6 기능은 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5594">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5595">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**(0x50) 인터페이스 주소가 없거나 address_index가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5595">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No interface address, or invalid address_index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5596">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5596">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5597">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5597">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5598">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5598">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5599">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5599">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5600">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5600">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5601">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5601">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5602">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5602">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;
ULONG       prefix_length;
UINT        interface_index;

/* Get the IPv6 address at the specified address table index. If
   found, the address network interface is returned in the
   interface_index input, as well as the address prefix in the
   prefix_length input. */

address_index = 1;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_get(&ip_0, address_index, &ip_address,
                              &prefix_length, &interface_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance
   address is successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5627">nxd_ipv6_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5627">nxd_ipv6_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5628">IPv6 주소 및 접두사 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5628">Set IPv6 Address and Prefix</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5629">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5629">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT interface_index,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG prefix_length,
    UINT *address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5630">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5630">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5631">이 서비스는 제공된 IPv6 주소와 지정된 IP 인스턴스에 대한 접두사를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5631">This service sets the supplied IPv6 address and prefix to the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5632">*address_index* 인수가 null이 아니면 주소가 삽입된 IPv6 주소 테이블에 대한 인덱스가 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5632">If the *address_index* argument is not null, the index into the IPv6 address table where the address is inserted is returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5633">NetX의 동급 서비스는 ***nx_ip_address_set** _ 및 _*_nx_ip_interface_address_set_\*\*입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5633">The NetX equivalent services are ***nx_ip_address_set** _ and _*_nx_ip_interface_address_set_\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5634">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5634">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5635">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5635">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5636">**interface_index** IPv6 주소가 연결된 인터페이스에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5636">**interface_index** Index to the interface the IPv6 address is associated with</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5637">**ip_address** 설정할 주소에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5637">**ip_address** Pointer to the address to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5638">**prefix_length** 주소 접두사(서브넷 마스크)의 길이입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5638">**prefix_length** Length of the address prefix (subnet mask)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5639">**address_index** 주소가 삽입된 주소 테이블에 대한 인덱스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5639">**address_index** Pointer to the index into the address table where the address is inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5640">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5640">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5641">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IPv6를 사용하도록 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5642">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**(0x15) IP 주소 테이블이 꽉 찼습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5642">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x15) IP address table is full</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5643">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) IPv6 기능은 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5643">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5644">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY**(0x52) 제공된 IP 주소는 이 IP 인스턴스에서 이미 사용되고 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5644">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) The supplied IP address is already used on this IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5645">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5645">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5646">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5646">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5647">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IPv6 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5647">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5648">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 인터페이스가 잘못된 네트워크 인터페이스를 가리킵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5648">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface points to an invalid network interface</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5649">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5649">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5650">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5650">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5651">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5651">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5652">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5652">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5653">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5653">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;
UINT        interface_index;

ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* First create an IP instance with packet pool, source address, and
   driver.*/
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance 0",
                     IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                     0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0,_nx_ram_network_driver,
                     pointer, 2048, 1);

/* Then enable IPv6 on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_enable(&ip_0);

/* Set the IPv6 address (a global address as indicated by the 64 bit
   prefix) using the IPv6 address just created on the primary device
   (index zero). The index into the address table is returned in
   address_index. */
interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&ip_0, interface_index, &ip_address,
                              64,&address_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IPv6 address is
   successfully assigned to the primary interface (interface 0). */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5678">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5678">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5679">기본 라우터 테이블에 IPv6 라우터 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5679">Add an IPv6 Router to Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5680">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5680">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_add(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address,
    ULONG router_lifetime,
    UINT index_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5681">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5681">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5682">이 서비스는 지정된 실제 인터페이스의 IPv6 기본 라우터를 기본 라우터 테이블에 추가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5682">This service adds an IPv6 default router on the specified physical interface to the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5683">동급의 NetX IPv4 서비스는 ***nx_ip_gateway_address_set*** 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5683">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_ip_gateway_address_set***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5684">*router_address* 는 유효한 IPv6 주소를 가리켜야 하며, 지정된 실제 인터페이스에서 해당 라우터를 직접 액세스할 수 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5684">*router_address* must point to a valid IPv6 address, and the router must be directly accessible from the specified physical interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5685">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5685">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5686">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5686">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5687">**router_address** 기본 라우터 주소에 대한 포인터입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5687">**router_address** Pointer to the default router address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5688">**router_lifetime** 기본 라우터 수명 시간(초)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5688">**router_lifetime** Default router life time, in seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5689">유효한 값은</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5689">Valid values are:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5690">**0xFFFF:** 시간 초과가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5690">**0xFFFF:** No time out</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5691">**0-0xFFFE:** 시간 초과 값(초)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5691">**0-0xFFFE:** Timeout value, in seconds</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5692">**index_index** 라우터에 연결할 수 있는 네트워크 인덱스의 유효한 메모리 위치에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5692">**index_index** Pointer to the valid memory location for the network index index through which the router can be reached</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5693">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5693">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5694">**NX_SUCCESS**(0X00) 기본 라우터를 추가했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5694">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Default router is successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5695">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**(0x17) 기본 라우터 테이블에 사용할 수 있는 항목이 더 이상 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5695">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more entries available in the default router table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5696">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IPv6 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5696">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5697">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) IPv6 기능은 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5697">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5698">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**(0x4D) 유효한 IPv6 주소 입력이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5698">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5699">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 인스턴스 또는 스토리지 공간이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5699">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5700">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5700">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5701">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 라우터 인터페이스 인덱스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5701">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid router interface index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5702">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5702">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5703">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5703">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5704">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5704">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5705">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5705">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5706">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5706">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example adds a default router for the primary interface at
   fe80::1219:B9FF:FE37:ac to the default router table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;

/* Set the router address version to IPv6 */
router_address.nxd_ip_version   = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;

/* Set the IPv6 address, in host byte order. */
router_address.nxd_ip_address[0] = 0xfe800000;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[1] = 0x0;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[2] = 0x1219B9FF;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[3] = 0xFE3700AC;

/* Set IPv6 default router. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_add(ip_ptr, &router_address,
                                     0xFFFF, PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* Unless invalid pointer input is detected by the error checking
   Service, status return is always NX_SUCCESS. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5718">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5718">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5719">기본 라우터 테이블에서 IPv6 라우터 제거</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5719">Remove IPv6 Router from Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5720">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5720">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete (
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5721">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5721">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5722">이 서비스는 기본 라우터 테이블에서 IPv6 기본 라우터를 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5722">This service deletes an IPv6 default router from the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5723">동급의 NetX IPv4 서비스는 ***nx_ip_gateway_address_clear*** 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5723">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_ip_gateway_address_clear***.</span></span>

### <a name="restrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5724">제한</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5724">Restrictions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5725">IP 인스턴스가 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5725">The IP instance has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5726">*router_address* 는 유효한 정보를 가리켜야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5726">*router_address* must point to valid information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5727">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5727">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5728">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5728">**ip_ptr** Pointer to a previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5729">**router_address** IPv6 기본 게이트웨이 주소에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5729">**router_address** Pointer to the IPv6 default gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5730">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5730">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5731">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 라우터를 삭제했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5731">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Router successfully deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5732">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) IPv6 기능은 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5732">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5733">**NX_NOT_FOUND**(0x4E) 라우터 항목을 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5733">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) The router entry cannot be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5734">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 인스턴스 또는 스토리지 공간이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5734">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5735">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5735">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5736">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**(0x82) 비포인터 입력이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5736">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x82) Invalid non pointer input</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5737">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5737">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5738">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5738">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5739">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5739">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5740">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5740">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5741">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5741">Example</span></span>

```c
/*This example removes a default router:fe80::1219:B9FF:FE37:ac */

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;

/* Set the router_address version to IPv6 */
router_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;

/* Program the IPv6 address, in host byte order. */
router_address.nxd_ip_address[0] = 0xfe800000;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[1] = 0x0;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[2] = 0x1219B9FF;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[3] = 0xFE3700AC;

/* Delete the IPv6 default router. */
nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete(ip_ptr, &router_address);
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5761">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5761">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5762">기본 라우터 항목 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5762">Get default router entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5763">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5763">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT entry_index,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_addr,
    ULONG *router_lifetime,
    ULONG *prefix_length,
    ULONG *configuration_method);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5764">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5764">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5765">이 서비스는 지정된 네트워크 디바이스에 연결된 기본 IPv6 라우팅 테이블에서 라우터 항목을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5765">This service retrieves a router entry from the default IPv6 routing table that is attached to a specified network device.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5766">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5766">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5767">**ip_ptr** IP 제어 블록 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5767">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5768">**interface_index** 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5768">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5769">**entry_index** 항목 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5769">**entry_index** Entry Index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5770">**router_addr** 라우터 IPv6 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5770">**router_addr** Router IPv6 Address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5771">**router_lifetime** 라우터 수명 시간에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5771">**router_lifetime** Pointer to router life time</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5772">**prefix_length** 접두사 길이에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5772">**prefix_length** Pointer to prefix length</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5773">**configuration_method** 항목이 구성된 방법에 대한 정보를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5773">**configuration_method** Pointer to the information on how the entry was configured</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5774">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5774">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5775">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 가져오는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5775">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5776">**NX_NOT_FOUND**(0x4E) 라우터 항목을 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5776">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Router entry not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5777">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 인터페이스 인덱스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5777">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5778">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 제어 블록 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5778">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5779">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5779">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5780">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5780">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5781">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5781">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5782">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5782">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5783">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5783">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5784">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5784">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
NXD_ADDRESS            router_addr;
ULONG                  router_lifetime;
ULONG                  prefix_length;
ULONG                  configuration_method;

/* Get the router entry of specified interface. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get (&ip_0,
                                            PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                            entry_index,
                                            &router_addr,
                                            &router_lifetime,
                                            &prefix_length,
                                            &configuration_method);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the router entry was successfully
   got. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5796">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5796">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5797">기본 라우터 테이블에서 IPv6 라우터 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5797">Retrieve an IPv6 Router from Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5798">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5798">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT interface_index
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address,
    ULONG *router_lifetime,
    ULONG *prefix_length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5799">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5799">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5800">이 서비스는 기본 라우터 테이블에서 지정된 실제 인터페이스의 IPv6 기본 라우터 주소, 수명 및 접두사 길이를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5800">This service retrieves an IPv6 default router address, lifetime and prefix length on the specified physical interface from the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5801">동급의 NetX IPv4 서비스는 **nx_ip_gateway_address_get**\* 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5801">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is \***nx_ip_gateway_address_get\*.**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5802">*router_address* 는 유효한 NXD_ADDRESS 구조체를 가리켜야 하므로 이 서비스는 기본 라우터의 IPv6 주소를 채울 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5802">*router_address* must point to a valid NXD_ADDRESS structure, so this service can fill in the IPv6 address of the default router.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5803">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5804">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5804">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5805">**interface_index** 라우터에 액세스하는 데 사용하는 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5805">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the router is accessible through</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5806">**router_address** 기본 라우터 주소의 반환 값에 대한 스토리지 공간을 가리키는 포인터입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5806">**router_address** Pointer to the storage space for the return value of the default router address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5807">**router_lifetime** 라우터 수명에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5807">**router_lifetime** Pointer to the router lifetime</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5808">**prefix_length** 라우터 주소 접두사 길이에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5808">**prefix_length** Pointer to the router address prefix length</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5809">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5809">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5810">**NX_SUCCESS**(0X00) 기본 라우터를 추가했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Default router is successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5811">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) IPv6 기능은 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5811">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5812">**NX_NOT_FOUND**(0x4E) 기본 라우터를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5812">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Default router not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5813">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5813">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5814">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 라우터 인터페이스 인덱스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5814">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid router interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5815">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 인스턴스 또는 스토리지 공간이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5815">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5816">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5816">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5817">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5817">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5818">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5818">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5819">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5819">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5820">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5820">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example retrieves a default router for the primary device
   from the default router table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;
ULONG       router_lifetime;
ULONG       prefix_length;

/* Get IPv6 default router. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_get(ip_ptr, PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                     &router_address,
                                     &router_lifetime,
                                     &prefix_length);

/* If status returns NX_SUCCESS, the router address and related
   information is returned successfully. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5832">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5832">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5833">기본 IPv6 라우터 수 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5833">Get number of default IPv6 routers</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5834">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5834">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT *num_entries);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5835">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5835">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5836">이 서비스는 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스에 구성된 IPv6 기본 라우터 수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5836">This service retrieves the number of IPv6 default routers configured on a given network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5837">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5838">**ip_ptr** IP 제어 블록 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5838">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5839">**interface_index** 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5839">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5840">**num_entries** 지정된 네트워크 디바이스의 IPv6 라우터 수에 대한 대상입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5840">**num_entries** Destination for number of IPv6 routers on a specified network device</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5841">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5841">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5842">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 가져오는 데 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5842">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5843">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) IPv6 기능은 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5843">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5844">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 디바이스 인덱스 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5844">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index value is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5845">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 IP 제어 블록 포인터 또는 num_entries 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5845">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or num_entries pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5846">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5846">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5847">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5847">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5848">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5848">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5849">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5849">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5850">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5850">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
UINT                   num_entries;

/* Get the router entries of specified interface. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get(&ip_0,
                                                       PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                                       &num_entries);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the router entries was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5862">nxd_ipv6_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5862">nxd_ipv6_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5863">IPv6 기능을 사용하지 않도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5863">Disable the IPv6 feature</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5864">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5864">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5865">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5865">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5866">이 서비스는 지정된 IP 인스턴스에 대해 IPv6를 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5866">This service disables the IPv6 for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5867">또한 기본 라우터 테이블, ND 캐시 및 IPv6 주소 테이블을 지우고, 모든 멀티캐스트 그룹을 탈퇴하고, 라우터 요청 변수를 다시 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5867">It also clears the default router table, ND cache and IPv6 address table, leaves the all multicast groups, and resets the router solicitation variables.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5868">IPv6를 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 이 서비스는 영향을 주지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5868">This service has no effect if IPv6 is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5869">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5869">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5870">**ip_ptr** IP 인스턴스 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5870">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5871">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5871">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5872">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 사용하지 않도록 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5872">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful disable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5873">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) IPv6 기능은 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5873">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5874">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 제어 블록 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5874">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5875">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT**(0x4B) IPv6 모듈이 컴파일되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5875">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) IPv6 module is not compiled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5876">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5876">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5877">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5877">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5878">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5878">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5879">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5879">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5880">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5881">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5881">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable IPv6 feature on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, disables IPv6 feature on IP instance.*/
```
