## <a name="nxd_ipv6_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5906">nxd_ipv6_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5906">nxd_ipv6_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5907">IPv6 서비스를 사용하도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5907">Enable IPv6 Services</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5908">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5908">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5909">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5909">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5910">이 서비스는 IPv6 서비스를 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5910">This service enables IPv6 services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5911">IPv6 서비스를 사용하도록 설정하면 IP 인스턴스가 모든 노드 멀티캐스트 그룹에 조인합니다(FF02::1).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5911">When the IPv6 services are enabled, the IP instance joins the all-node multicast group (FF02::1).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5912">이 서비스는 링크 로컬 주소 또는 전체 주소를 설정하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5912">This service does not set the link local address or global address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5913">애플리케이션은 nxd_ipv6_address_set을 사용하여 디바이스 네트워크 주소를 구성해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5913">Applications should use *nxd_ipv6_address_set* to configure the device network addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5914">NetX의 동급 서비스는 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5914">There is no NetX equivalent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5915">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5915">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5916">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5916">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5917">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5917">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5918">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) IPv6를 사용하도록 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5918">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5919">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**(0x15) IPv6가 이미 사용하도록 설정되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5919">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) IPv6 is already enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5920">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) IPv6 기능은 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5920">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5921">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5921">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5922">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5922">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5923">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5923">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5924">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5924">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5925">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5925">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5926">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5926">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5927">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5927">Example</span></span>

```c
/* First create an IP instance with packet pool, source address, and
   driver.*/
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance 0",
                      IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                      0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0,_nx_ram_network_driver,
                      pointer, 2048, 1);

/* Then enable IPv6 on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_enable(&ip_0);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance is
   enabled for IPv6 services. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5952">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5952">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5953">IPv6 멀티캐스트 그룹에 조인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5953">Join an IPv6 multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5954">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5954">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5955">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5955">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5956">이 서비스를 통해 애플리케이션은 특정 네트워크 인터페이스의 특정 IPv6 멀티캐스트 주소에 조인할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5956">This service allows an application to join a specific IPv6 multicast address on a specific network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5957">링크 드라이버에는 멀티캐스트 주소를 추가하라는 알림이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5957">The link driver is notified to add the multicast address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5958">이 서비스는 ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** 옵션을 정의한 상태로 Netx Duo 라이브러리를 빌드한 경우에 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5958">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5959">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5959">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5960">**ip_ptr** IP 인스턴스 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5960">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5961">**group_address** IPv6 멀티캐스트 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5961">**group_address** IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5962">**interface_index** 멀티캐스트 그룹과 연결된 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5962">**interface_index** The index to the network interface associated with the multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5963">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5963">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5964">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00)가 IPv6 멀티캐스트 주소 수신을 사용하도록 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5964">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully enables receiving on IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5965">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**(0x17) IPv6 멀티캐스트 테이블에 항목이 더 이상 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5965">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more entries in the IPv6 multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5966">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 디바이스 드라이버에서 사용할 수 있는 그룹 주소가 더 이상 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5966">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) No more group addresses available in the device driver</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5967">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) IPv6 기능 또는 IPv6 멀티캐스트 기능이 Netx Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5967">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 multicast feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5968">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 제어 블록 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5968">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5969">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5969">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5970">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IPv6 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5970">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5971">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 인터페이스 인덱스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5971">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5972">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5972">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5973">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5973">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5974">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5974">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5975">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5975">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5976">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5976">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Join multicast group on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join(&ip_0,
                                           &group_address,
                                           PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, interface of index on IP instance
   has joined the multicast group. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5988">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5988">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5989">IPv6 멀티캐스트 그룹에서 탈퇴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5989">Leave an IPv6 multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5990">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5990">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5991">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-5992">이 서비스는 특정 네트워크 디바이스에서 특정 IPv6 멀티캐스트 주소를 제거합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5992">This service removes the specific IPv6 multicast address from the specific network device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5993">링크 드라이버는 IPv6 멀티캐스트 주소를 제거할 때에도 알림을 받습니다. 이 서비스는 ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** 옵션을 정의한 상태로 Netx Duo 라이브러리를 빌드한 경우에 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5993">The link driver is also notified of the removal of the IPv6 multicast address.This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5994">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5994">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5995">**ip_ptr** IP 인스턴스 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5995">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5996">**group_address** IPv6 멀티캐스트 주소입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5996">**group_address** IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5997">**interface_index** 그룹과 연결된 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5997">**interface_index** The index to the network interface associated with group</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-5998">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5998">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-5999">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 멀티캐스트에서 탈퇴했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-5999">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6000">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**(0X16) 항목을 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6000">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Entry not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6001">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) IPv6 기능 또는 IPv6 멀티캐스트 기능이 Netx Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6001">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 multicast feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6002">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 제어 블록 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6002">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6003">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6003">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6004">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) IPv6 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6004">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6005">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 인터페이스 인덱스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6005">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6006">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6006">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6007">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6007">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6008">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6008">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6009">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6009">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6010">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6010">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Leave multicast address on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave(&ip_0,
                                            &group_address,
                                            primary_interface);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, interface of index on IP instance
   has left the multicast group. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6023">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6023">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6024">상태 비저장 주소 자동 구성을 사용하지 않도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6024">Disable stateless address autoconfiguration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6025">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6025">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6026">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6026">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6027">이 서비스는 지정된 네트워크 디바이스에서 IPv6 상태 비저장 주소 자동 구성 기능을 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6027">This service disables the IPv6 stateless address auto configuration feature on a specified network device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6028">IPv6 주소가 구성된 경우에는 영향을 주지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6028">It has no effect if the IPv6 address has been configured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6029">이 서비스는 ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** 옵션이 정의된 상태로 Netx Duo 라이브러리가 빌드된 경우에 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6029">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6030">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6030">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6031">**ip_ptr** IP 인스턴스 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6031">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6032">**interface_index** IPv6 상태 비저장 주소 자동 구성을 사용하지 않도록 설정해야 하는 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6032">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the IPv6 stateless address autoconfiguration should be disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6033">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6033">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6034">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 상태 비저장 주소 자동 구성 기능을 사용하지 않도록 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6034">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully disables stateless address autoconfigure feature.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6035">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) IPv6 기능 또는 IPv6 상태 비저장 주소 자동 구성 컨트롤 기능이 Netx Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6035">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 stateless address autoconfig control feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6036">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 인터페이스 인덱스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6036">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6037">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 제어 블록 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6037">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6038">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6038">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6039">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6040">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6040">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6041">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6041">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6042">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6042">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6043">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6043">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Disable stateless address auto configuration on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable(&ip_0,
                                                       PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, disables stateless address auto
   configuration on IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6068">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6068">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6069">상태 비저장 주소 자동 구성을 사용하도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6069">Enable stateless address autoconfiguration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6070">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6070">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6071">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6072">이 서비스는 지정된 네트워크 디바이스에서 IPv6 상태 비저장 주소 자동 구성 기능을 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6072">This service enables the IPv6 stateless address auto configuration feature on a specified network device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6073">이 서비스는 ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** 옵션이 정의된 상태로 Netx Duo 라이브러리가 빌드된 경우에 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6073">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6074">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6074">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6075">**ip_ptr** IP 인스턴스 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6075">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6076">**interface_index** IPv6 상태 비저장 주소 자동 구성을 사용하도록 설정해야 하는 네트워크 인터페이스에 대한 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6076">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the IPv6 stateless address autoconfiguration should be enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6077">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6077">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6078">**NX_SUCCESS**(0X00) 상태 비저장 주소 자동 구성 기능을 사용하도록 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6078">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully enables stateless address autoconfig feature.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6079">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**(0x15) 이미 사용하도록 설정되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6079">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) Already enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6080">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4B) IPv6 기능 또는 IPv6 상태 비저장 주소 자동 구성 컨트롤 기능이 Netx Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6080">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 stateless address autoconfig control feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6081">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 인터페이스 인덱스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6081">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6082">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 제어 블록 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6083">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6083">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6084">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6084">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6085">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6085">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6086">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6086">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6087">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6087">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6088">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6088">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE

/* Enable stateless address auto configuration on this
   IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable(&ip_0,
                                                      PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, enables stateless address auto
   configuration on IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6113">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6113">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6114">인접 캐시에서 IPv6 주소 항목 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6114">Delete IPv6 Address entry in the Neighbor Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6115">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6115">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6116">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6117">이 서비스는 제공된 IP 주소에 대한 IPv6 네트워크 환경 검색 캐시 항목을 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6117">This service deletes an IPv6 neighbor discovery cache entry for the supplied IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6118">동급의 NetX IPv4 함수는 ***nx_arp_static_entry_delete*** 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6118">The equivalent NetX IPv4 function is ***nx_arp_static_entry_delete***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6119">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6120">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6121">**ip_address** 삭제할 IPv6 주소에 대한 포인터입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6121">**ip_address** Pointer to IPv6 address to delete, in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6122">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6122">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6123">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 주소를 삭제했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6123">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully deleted the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6124">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**(0x16) IPv6 네트워크 환경 캐시에서 주소를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6124">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Address not found in the IPv6 neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6125">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) IPv6 기능은 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6125">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6126">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 인스턴스 또는 스토리지 공간이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6126">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6127">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6127">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6128">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6128">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6129">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6129">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6130">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6130">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6131">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6131">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6132">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6132">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example deletes an entry from the neighbor cache table. */

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Delete an entry in the neighbor cache table with the specified IPv6
   address and hardware address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete(&ip_0,
                                   &ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the entry was deleted from the neighbor cache
   table. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6149">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6149">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6150">네트워크 환경 캐시에 IPv6 주소/MAC 매핑 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6150">Add an IPv6 Address/MAC Mapping to Neighbor Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6151">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6151">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *dest_ip,
    UINT interface_index, 
    char *mac);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6152">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6152">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6153">이 서비스는 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스 인덱스(interface_index)의 하드웨어 MAC 주소에 매핑된 지정된 IP 주소 *ip_address* 에 대한 네트워크 환경 검색 캐시에 항목을 추가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6153">This service adds an entry to the neighbor discovery cache for the specified IP address *ip_address* mapped to the hardware MAC address on the specified network interface index (interface_index).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6154">동급의 NetX IPv4 서비스는 ***nx_arp_static_entry_create*** 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6154">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_static_entry_create***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6155">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6155">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6156">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6156">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6157">**dest_ip** IPv6 주소 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6157">**dest_ip** Pointer to IPv6 address instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6158">**interface_index** 대상 IPv6 주소에 연결할 수 있는 실제 네트워크 인터페이스를 지정하는 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6158">**interface_index** Index specifying physical network interface where the destination IPv6 address can be reached</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6159">**mac** 하드웨어 주소에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6159">**mac** Pointer to hardware address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6160">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6160">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6161">**NX_SUCCESS**(0X00) 항목을 추가했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6161">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6162">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL**(0x43) 캐시가 잘못되었거나 사용 가능한 네트워크 환경 캐시 항목이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6162">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Invalid cache or no neighbor cache entries available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6163">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) IPv6 기능은 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6163">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6164">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 인스턴스 또는 스토리지 공간이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6164">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6166">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 인터페이스 인덱스 값이 올바르지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6166">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index value.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6167">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6167">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6168">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6168">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6169">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6169">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6170">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6170">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6171">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6171">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example adds an entry on the primary network interface to
   the neighbor cache table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTEFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UCHAR hw_address[6] = {0x0, 0xcf,0x01,0x02, 0x03, 0x04};
CHAR  *mac;

mac = (CHAR *)&hw_address[0];

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Create an entry in the neighbor cache table with the specified
   IPv6 address and hardware address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_entry_set(&ip_0,
                                &ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0],
                                PRIMARY_INTERFACE, mac);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the entry was added to the neighbor
   cache table. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6188">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6188">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6189">IPv6 주소에 대한 하드웨어 주소 찾기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6189">Locate Hardware Address for an IPv6 Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6190">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6190">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6191">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6191">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6192">이 서비스는 제공된 IPv6 주소와 연결된 IPv6 네트워크 환경 검색 캐시에서 실제 하드웨어 주소를 찾으려고 시도합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6192">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied IPv6 address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6193">네트워크 환경에 연결할 수 있는 네트워크 인터페이스의 인덱스는 interface_index 매개 변수에도 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6193">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned in the parameter *interface_index.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6194">동급의 NetX IPv4 서비스는 ***nx_arp_hardware_address_find*** 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6194">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_hardware_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6195">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6195">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6196">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6196">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6197">**ip_address** 찾을 IP 주소에 대한 포인터입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6197">**ip_address** Pointer to IP address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6198">**physical_msw** 실제 주소의 상위 16비트(47-32)에 대한 포인터입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6198">**physical_msw** Pointer to the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address, in host byte order</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6199">**physical_lsw** 실제 주소의 하위 32비트(31-0)에 대한 포인터입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6199">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6200">**interface_index** IPv6 주소에 연결할 수 있는 네트워크 디바이스를 지정하는 인터페이스 인덱스의 올바른 메모리 위치를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6200">**interface_index** Pointer to the valid memory location for the interface index specifying the network device on which the IPv6 address can be reached.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6201">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6201">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6202">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 주소를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6202">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully found the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6203">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**(0x16) 네트워크 환경 캐시에 매핑이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6203">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping not in the neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6204">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) IPv6 기능은 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6204">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6205">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**(0x4D) 제공된 IP 주소는 버전 6이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6205">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) The supplied IP address is not version 6.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6206">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 인스턴스 또는 스토리지 공간이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6206">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6207">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6207">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6208">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6208">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6209">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6209">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6210">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6210">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6211">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6211">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6212">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6212">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs an IP address on the primary network in order
   to obtain the hardware address it is mapped to in the neighbor
   cache able. */

NXD_ADDRESS  ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw, physical_lsw;
UINT  interface_index;

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Obtain the hardware address mapped to the supplied global IPv6
   address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                            &physical_msw,
                                            &physical_lsw
                                            &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the hardware address returned in
   variables physical_msw and physical_lsw, the index of the network
   interface through which the neighbor can be reached is stored in
   interface_index. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_invalidate"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6229">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6229">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6230">네트워크 환경 검색 캐시 무효화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6230">Invalidate the Neighbor Discovery Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6231">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6231">Prototype</span></span>

UINT nxd_nd_cache_invalidate(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6232">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6232">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6233">이 서비스는 전체 IPv6 네트워크 환경 검색 캐시를 무효화합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6233">This service invalidates the entire IPv6 neighbor discovery cache.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6234">이 서비스는 ICMPv6를 사용하도록 설정하기 전이나 후에 호출할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6234">This service can be invoked either before or after ICMPv6 has been enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6235">이 서비스는 IPv4 연결에는 적용되지 않으므로 동급의 NetX 서비스가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6235">This service is not applicable to IPv4 connectivity, so there is no NetX equivalent service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6236">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6236">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6237">**ip_ptr** IP 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6237">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6238">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6238">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6239">**NX_SUCCESS**(0X00) 캐시가 무효화되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cache successfully invalidated</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6240">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) IPv6 기능은 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6240">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6241">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) IP 인스턴스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6241">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6242">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6242">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6243">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6243">Allowed From</span></span>

/* This example invalidates the host neighbor cache table. */

/* Invalidate the cache table bound to the IP instance. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_invalidate (&ip_0);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, all entries in the neighbor cache table
   are invalidated. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6265">실제 주소의 IPv6 주소 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6265">Retrieve IPv6 Address for a Physical Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6266">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6266">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6267">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6268">이 서비스는 제공된 물리적 주소와 연결된 IPv6 네트워크 환경 검색 캐시에서 IPv6 주소를 찾으려고 시도합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6268">This service attempts to find an IPv6 address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6269">네트워크 환경에 연결할 수 있는 네트워크 인터페이스의 인덱스도 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6269">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6270">동급의 NetX IPv4 서비스는 ***nx_arp_ip_address_find*** 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6270">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_ip_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6271">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6271">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6272">**ip_ptr** 이전에 만든 IP 인스턴스에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6272">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6273">**ip_address** 올바른 NXD_ADDRESS 구조체를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6273">**ip_address** Pointer to valid NXD_ADDRESS structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6274">**physical_msw** 찾을 물리적 주소의 상위 16비트(47-32)입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6274">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6275">**physical_lsw** 찾을 물리적 주소의 하위 32비트(31-0)입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6275">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6276">**interface_index** IPv6 주소에 도달할 수 있는 네트워크 디바이스 인덱스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6276">**interface_index** Pointer to the network device index through which the IPv6 address can be reached</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6277">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6277">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6278">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 주소를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6278">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully found the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6279">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**(0x16) 네트워크 환경 캐시에서 실제 주소를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6279">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Physical address not found in the neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6280">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x4b) IPv6 기능은 NetX Duo 라이브러리에 기본 제공되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6280">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0X07) IP 인스턴스 또는 스토리지 공간이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6283">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**(0x4D) MAC 주소가 0입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6283">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) MAC address is zero.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6284">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6284">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6285">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6285">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6286">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6286">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6287">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6287">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6288">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6288">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs a hardware address to search on for the
   matching IPv6 global address in the neighbor cache table. */

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw = 0xcf;
ULONG physical_lsw = 0x01020304;
UINT  interface_index;

/* Obtain the IPv6 address mapped to the supplied hardware
   Address on the primary device. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                      physical_msw, physical_lsw,
                                      &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the global IPv6 address returned in
   variable ip_address. */
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6306">TCP 연결 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6306">Make a TCP Connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6307">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6307">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr
    NXD_ADDRESSS *server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6308">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6308">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6309">이 서비스는 지정된 서버의 포트에 대해 이전에 만든 TCP 클라이언트 소켓을 사용하여 TCP 연결을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6309">This service makes TCP connection using a previously created TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6310">이 서비스는 IPv4 또는 IPv6 네트워크에서 작동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6310">This service works on either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6311">유효한 TCP 서버 포트의 범위는 0에서 0xFFFF까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6311">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6312">NetX Duo는 서버 IP 주소에 따라 적절한 실제 인터페이스를 결정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6312">NetX Duo determines the appropriate physical interface based on the server IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6313">동급의 NetX IPv4 서비스는 ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect*** 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6313">The NetX IPv4 equivalent is ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6314">소켓이 로컬 포트에 바인딩되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6314">The socket must have been bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6315">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6316">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 TCP 소켓을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6316">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6317">**server_ip** IPv4 또는 IPv6 대상 주소를 가리키는 포인터입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6317">**server_ip** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 destination address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6318">**server_port** 연결할 서버 포트 번호(1-0xFFFF)입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6318">**server_port** Server port number to connect to (1 through 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6319">**wait_option** 연결이 설정되는 동안 대기 옵션입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6319">**wait_option** Wait option while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6320">대기 옵션은 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6320">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT**(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**(0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6323">**틱 단위의 시간 제한**(0x00000001~0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6323">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6324">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6325">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 소켓 연결에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6325">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**(0x1A) 요청된 일시 중단이 tx_thread_wait_abort 호출에 의해 중단되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 서버 IPv4 또는 IPv6 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND**(0x24) 소켓이 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED**(0x35) 소켓이 닫힘 상태가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS**(0x37) 대기하도록 지정되지 않았으며, 연결하려고 시도하는 중입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, connection attempt is in progress</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 잘못된 인터페이스 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**(0x50) 네트워크 인터페이스에 올바른 IPv6 주소가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) The network interface does not have valid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) TCP가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT**(0x46) 잘못된 포트입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED**(0x38) 연결이 실패합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Connection fails.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6341">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6341">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6342">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6342">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS peer_ip_address;
ULONG       peer_port;

/* Set Peer IPv6 address */
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 0x101;

/* Set peer port number */
peer_port = 2563;

/* Connect to the peer */
status = nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(socket_ptr,
                                       &peer_ip_address,
                                       peer_port, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6367">피어 TCP 소켓 IP 주소 및 포트 번호 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6367">Retrieves Peer TCP Socket IP Address and Port Number</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6368">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6368">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get
    (NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *peer_ip_address,
    ULONG *peer_port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6369">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6369">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6370">이 서비스는 IPv4 또는 IPv6 네트워크를 통해 연결된 TCP 소켓의 피어 IP 주소 및 포트 정보를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6370">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6371">동급의 NetX IPv4 서비스는 ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get*** 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6371">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6372">*socket_ptr* 는 이미 연결된 상태인 TCP 소켓을 가리켜야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6372">Note that *socket_ptr* must point to a TCP socket that is already in the connected state.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6373">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6373">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6374">**socket_ptr** 피어 호스트에 연결된 TCP 소켓을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6374">**socket_ptr** Pointer to TCP socket connected to peer host</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6375">**peer_ip_address** IPv4 또는 IPv6 피어 주소를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6375">**peer_ip_address** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 peer address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6376">반환된 IP 주소는 호스트 바이트 순서로 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6376">The returned IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6377">**peer_port** 피어 포트 번호를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6377">**peer_port** Pointer to peer port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6378">반환된 포트 번호는 호스트 바이트 순서로 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6378">The returned port number is in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6379">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6379">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6380">**NX_SUCCESS**(0X00) 소켓 정보를 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6380">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Socket information successfully retrieved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED**(0x38) 소켓이 피어에 연결되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket not connected to peer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) TCP가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 포인터 입력입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6385">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6385">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6386">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6386">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6387">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6387">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6388">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6388">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6389">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6389">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS  peer_ip_address;
ULONG        peer_port;

/* Get TCP socket information. */
status = nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(socket_ptr, &peer_ip_address,
                                      &peer_port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the service returns valid peer info: */
if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V4)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4 */

if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V6)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6 */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_packet_info_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6414">UDP 패킷에서 네트워크 매개 변수 추출</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6414">Extract network parameters from UDP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6415">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6415">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT *protocol,
    UINT *port,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6416">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6416">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6417">이 서비스는 IPv4 또는 IPv6 UDP 네트워크를 통해 수신된 패킷에서 네트워크 매개 변수를 추출합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6417">This service extracts network parameters from a packet received on either IPv4 or IPv6 UDP networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6418">동급의 NetX 서비스는 ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract*** 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6418">The NetX equivalent service is ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6419">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6420">**packet_ptr** 패킷을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6420">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6421">**ip_address** 송신기 IP 주소를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6421">**ip_address** Pointer to sender IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6422">**protocol** 반환될 프로토콜을 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6422">**protocol** Pointer to protocol to be returned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6423">**port** 송신기 포트 번호를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6423">**port** Pointer to sender’s port number.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6424">**interface_index** 이 패킷을 수신하는 네트워크 인터페이스의 인덱스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6424">**interface_index** Pointer to the index of the network interface from which this packet is received</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6425">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6425">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6426">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 패킷 인터페이스 데이터를 성공적으로 추출했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6426">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet interface data successfully extracted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6427">**NX_INVALID_PACKET**(0x12) 패킷은 IPv4도 아니고 IPv6도 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6427">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is neither IPv4 or IPv6.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6428">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 포인터 입력입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6428">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6429">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6429">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6430">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6430">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6431">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6431">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6432">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6432">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6433">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6433">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6434">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6434">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract network data from UDP packet interface.*/
status = nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(packet_ptr, &ip_address,
                                    &protocol, &port,
                                    &interface_index);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet data was successfully retrieved.*/
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6458">UDP 데이터그램 송신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6458">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6459">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6459">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6460">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6461">이 서비스는 IP4 또는 IPv6 네트워크에 대해 이전에 만들고 바인딩한 UDP 소켓을 통해 UDP 데이터그램을 송신합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6461">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6462">NetX Duo는 대상 IP 주소를 기반으로 하여 원본 주소로 적합한 로컬 IP 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6462">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6463">특정 인터페이스와 원본 IP 주소를 지정하려면 애플리케이션에서 ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** 서비스를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6463">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6464">이 서비스는 UDP 데이터그램이 성공적으로 송신되었는지 여부에 관계없이 즉시 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6464">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6465">동급의 NetX(IPv4) 서비스는 ***nx_udp_socket_send*** 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6465">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6466">소켓은 로컬 포트에 바인딩되어 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6466">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6467">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6467">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6468">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 UDP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6468">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6469">**packet_ptr** UDP 데이터그램 패킷 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6469">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6470">**ip_address** 대상 IPv4 또는 IPv6 주소를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6470">**ip_address** Pointer to destination IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6471">**port** 1에서 0xFFFF 사이의 유효한 대상 포트 번호입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6471">**port** Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6472">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6472">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6473">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) UDP 소켓 송신에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6473">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 서버 IPv4 또는 IPv6 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6475">**NX_NOT_BOUND**(0x24) 소켓이 어떤 포트에도 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6475">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6476">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**(0x50) 적절한 송신 인터페이스를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6476">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6477">**NX_UNDERFLOW**(0x02) 패킷에 UDP 헤더를 위한 공간이 부족합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6477">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6478">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 패킷 뒤에 추가 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6478">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6479">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 소켓 포인터, 주소 포인터 또는 패킷 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer, address pointer, or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6481">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) UDP가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6481">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6482">**NX_INVALID_PORT**(0x46) 포트 번호가 유효한 범위 내에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6482">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within a valid range</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6483">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6483">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6484">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6484">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6485">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6485">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6486">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6486">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6487">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6487">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the
   IPv6 address just created on the primary device (index 0). We
   don’t need the index into the address table, so the last argument
   is set to null. */

interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, interface_index,
                              &ip_address, 64, NX_NULL);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                             &server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```
