## <a name="nxd_udp_socket_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6510">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6510">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6511">UDP 데이터그램 송신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6511">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6512">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6512">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_socket_source_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port, 
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6513">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6514">이 서비스는 IP4 또는 IPv6 네트워크에 대해 이전에 만들고 바인딩한 UDP 소켓을 통해 UDP 데이터그램을 송신합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6514">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6515">*address_index* 매개 변수는 나가는 패킷에 사용할 원본 IP 주소를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6515">The parameter *address_index* specifies the source IP address to use for the outgoing packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6516">이 함수는 UDP 데이터그램이 성공적으로 송신되었는지 여부에 관계없이 즉시 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6516">Note that the function returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6517">소켓은 로컬 포트에 바인딩되어 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6517">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6518">동급의 NetX(IPv4) 서비스는 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6518">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6519">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6519">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6520">**socket_ptr** 이전에 만든 UDP 소켓 인스턴스를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6520">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6521">**packet_ptr** UDP 데이터그램 패킷 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6521">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6522">**ip_address** 대상 IPv4 또는 IPv6 주소 포트를 가리키는 포인터입니다. 유효한 대상 포트 번호는 1-0xFFFF 사이입니다(호스트 바이트 순서).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6522">**ip_address** Pointer to destination IPv4 or IPv6 address port Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6523">**address_index** 패킷에 사용할 원본 주소를 지정하는 인덱스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6523">**address_index** Index specifying the source address to use for the packet</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6524">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6524">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6525">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) UDP 소켓 송신에 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6525">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6526">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**(0x21) 서버 IPv4 또는 IPv6 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6526">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6527">**NX_NOT_BOUND**(0x24) 소켓이 어떤 포트에도 바인딩되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6527">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6528">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**(0x50) 적절한 송신 인터페이스를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6528">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6529">**NX_NOT_FOUND**(0x4E) 적절한 인터페이스를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6529">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) No suitable interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6530">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 소켓 포인터, 주소 또는 패킷 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6530">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer, address, or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6531">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6531">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6532">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**(0x14) UDP가 사용하도록 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6532">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6533">**NX_INVALID_PORT**(0x46) 포트 번호가 유효한 범위 내에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6533">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within valid range.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6534">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**(0x4C) 지정된 네트워크 인터페이스가 유효합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6534">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6535">**NX_UNDERFLOW**(0x02) 패킷에 UDP 헤더를 위한 공간이 부족합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6535">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6536">**NX_OVERFLOW**(0x03) 패킷 뒤에 추가 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6536">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6537">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6537">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6538">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6538">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6539">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6539">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6540">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6540">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6541">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6541">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;
UINT address_index;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the IPv6
   address just created on the primary device (index 0). The address index
   is needed for nxd_udp_socket_source_send. */

status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, 0,
                              &ip_address, 64, &address_index);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_source_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                                    &server_address, 12, address_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted the
   packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_source_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6565">UPD 패킷 원본 정보 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6565">Retrieve UPD Packet Source Information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6566">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6566">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_source_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address, 
    UINT *port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6567">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6567">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6568">이 서비스는 호스트 UDP 소켓을 통해 받은 UDP 패킷에서 원본 IP 주소와 포트 번호를 추출합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6568">This service extracts the source IP address and port number from a UDP packet received through the host UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6569">동급의 NetX(IPv4) 서비스는 ***nx_udp_source_extract*** 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6569">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent is ***nx_udp_source_extract***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6570">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6570">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6571">**packet_ptr** 받은 UDP 패킷에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6571">**packet_ptr** Pointer to received UDP packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6572">**ip_address** 패킷 원본 IP 주소를 저장할 NXD_ADDRESS 구조를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6572">**ip_address** Pointer to NXD_ADDRESS structure to store packet source IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6573">**port** UDP 소켓 포트 번호를 가리키는 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6573">**port** Pointer to UDP socket port number</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6574">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6574">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6575">**NX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 원본을 성공적으로 추출했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6575">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful source extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6576">**NX_INVALID_PACKET**(0x12) 패킷이 올바르지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6576">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6577">**NX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 잘못된 소켓 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6577">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5f002-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 이 서비스의 잘못된 호출자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6579">허용 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6579">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6580">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6580">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6581">가능한 선점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6581">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5f002-6582">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6582">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="5f002-6583">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5f002-6583">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT         port;

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket and
   allocate the packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Extract the IP address and port of the packet received on the UDP
   socket specified in the packet interface. */
status = nxd_udp_source_extract(&packet_ptr, &ip_address, &port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the source IP address and port of the
   packet received on the UDP socket was successfully extracted. */
```
